T02divav33u:1: p.1.1/.evaṃ mayā śrutam/ ekasin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma/
T02divav33u:3: p.1.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ mahā^nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/ atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya
T02divav33u:5: p.1.3/.tena khalu samayena tasminn udapāne prakṛtir nāma mātaṅga^dārikā
T02divav33u:6: udakam uddharate sma/ atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām etad
T02divav33u:7: avocat/ dehi me bhagini pānīyaṃ pāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:8: p.1.4/.evaṃ kite prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/
T02divav33u:9: mātaṅga^dārikāham asmi bhadantānanda/ na^ahaṃ te bhagini kulaṃ vā jātiṃ vā
T02divav33u:10: pṛcchāmi/ api tu sacette parityaktaṃ pānīyaṃ dehi pāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:11: p.1.5/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmantam ānandāya pānīyam adāt/
T02divav33u:13: p.1.6/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikāyuṣmanta ānandsya śarīre mukhe svare sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca nimittam udgṛhītvā yoniśo manasikāreṇāviṣṭā
T02divav33u:14: saṃrāgacittam utpādayati (1) sma/ āryo me ānandaḥ svāmī ayād iti/ mātā ca me mahā^vidyādharī sā śakṣyaty āryam ānandam ānayitum/
T02divav33u:15: p.2.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pānīyaghaṭam ādāya yena caṇḍāla^gṛhaṃ
T02divav33u:16: tena^upasaṃkramya pānīya^ghaṭam ekānte nikṣipya svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/
T02divav33u:17: p.2.2/.yat khalv evam amba jānīyā ānando nāma śramaṇo
T02divav33u:18: mahāśramaṇa^gautamasya śrāvaka upasthāyakas tam ahaṃ svāminam icchāmi/
T02divav33u:20: p.2.3/.sā tām avocat/ śaktā +ahaṃ putri ānandam ānayituṃ/ sthāpayitvā yo mṛtaḥ syād yo vā vīta^rāgaḥ/ api ca rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śramaṇa^gautamam atīva sevate bhajate paryupāsate/ yadi jānīyāt so +ayaṃ
T02divav33u:21: caṇḍāla^kulasyānarthāya pratipadyeta/ śramaṇaś ca gautamo vīta^rāgaḥ
T02divav33u:23: p.2.4/.evam uktā prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā mātaram idam avocat/ sa ced amba
T02divav33u:24: śramaṇo gautamā vīta^rāgastasya^antikāc chramaṇam ānandaṃ na pratilapsye jīvitaṃ parityajeyaṃ sa cet pratilipsye jīvāmi/
T02divav33u:25: p.2.5/.mā te putri jīvitaṃ parityajasi ānayāmi śramaṇam ānandam/
T02divav33u:26: p.2.6/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātā madhye gṛhāṅganasya
T02divav33u:27: gomayenopalepanaṃ kṛtvā vedīm ālipya darbhān saṃstīrya^agniṃ
T02divav33u:28: prajvālya^aṣṭaśatam arka^puṣpāṇāṃ gṛhītvā mantrān āvartayamānā ekaikam
T02divav33u:29: arka^puṣpaṃ parijapya agnau pratikṣipati sma/ tatra^iyaṃ vidyā bhavatiḥ
T02divav33u:30: p.3.1/.amale vimale kuṅkume sumane/ yena baddhā +asi vidyut/ icchayā devo varṣati vidyotati gajeti vismayaṃ mahā^rājasya samabhivardhāyituṃ devebhyo manuṣyebhyo gandharvebhyoḥ śikhi^grahā devā viśikhi^gra(@)hā devā
T02divav33u:31: ānandasya^āgamanāya saṃgamanāya kramaṇāya grahaṇāya juhomi svāhā/
T02divav33u:32: p.3.2/.atha^āyuṣmata ānandasya cittam ākṣiptaṃ/ sa vihārān niṣkramya yena
T02divav33u:34: p.3.3/.adrākṣīc caṇḍālī āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ dūrād eva^āgacchantaṃ/ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prakṛtiṃ duhitaram idam avocat/ ayam asau putri śramaṇa ānanda āgacchati śayanaṃ prajñapaya/
T02divav33u:35: p.3.4/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā hṛṣṭa^tuṣṭā pramudita^manā āyuṣmata ānandasya śayyāṃ prajñapayati
T02divav33u:37: upasaṃkramya vedīm upaniśrityā +asthāt/ ekānta^sthitaḥ sa punar āyuṣmān
T02divav33u:38: ānandaḥ prārodīd/ aśrūṇi pravartayamāna evam āha/ vyasana^prāpto +aham
T02divav33u:39: asmi na ca me bhagavān samanvāharati/
T02divav33u:40: p.3.6/.atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ samanvāharati sma/ samanvāhṛtya
T02divav33u:41: saṃbuddha^mantraiś caṇḍāla^mantrān pratihanti sma/ tatra^iyaṃ vidyāḥ/
T02divav33u:44: p.4.1cd/.ītayo yatra śāmyanti bhayāni calitāni ca/
T02divav33u:45: p.4.2ab/.tad vai devā namsyanti sarva^siddhāś ca yoginaḥ/
T02divav33u:48: niṣkramya yena svako vihāras tena^upasaṃkramitum ārabdhaḥ/
T02divav33u:49: p.4.4/.adrākṣīt prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā/ ānandam āyuṣmantaṃ pratigacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ svāṃ jananīm idam avocat/ ayam asau mātaḥ
T02divav33u:50: śramaṇa ānandaḥ pratigacchati/ tām āha mātā/ niyataṃ putri śramaṇena
T02divav33u:51: gautamena samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati/ tena mama mantrāḥ pratihatā bhaviṣyanti/
T02divav33u:52: prakṛtir āha/ kiṃ punar amba balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā
T02divav33u:54: tām āha mātā/ balavattarāḥ śramaṇasya gautamasya mantrā na^asmākaṃ/ ye putri mantāḥ sarva^lokasya prabhavanti tān mantrān śramaṇo gautama ākāṅkṣamāṇaḥ pratihanti/ na punar lokaḥ prabhavati śramaṇasya gautamasya
T02divav33u:55: mantrān pratihantuṃ/ evaṃ balavattarāḥ avamaṇasya gautamasya mantrāḥ/
T02divav33u:56: p.4.5/.atha^āyuṣmān ānando yena bhagavāṃs tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte +asthāt/
T02divav33u:57: p.4.6/.ekānta^sthitam āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavān idam avocat/ udgṛhṇa tvam ānanda imāṃ ṣaḍakṣarīvidyāṃ dhāraya vācaya paryavāpnuhi/ ātmano hitāya sukhāya bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upasikānāṃ hitāya sukhāya/
T02divav33u:58: iyam ānanda ṣaḍkṣarīvidyā ṣaḍbhiḥ samyak saṃbuddhair bhāṣitā caturbhiś ca
T02divav33u:59: mahā^rājaiḥ śakreṇa devānām indreṇa brahmaṇā ca sahāpatinā/ mayā ca^etarhi
T02divav33u:60: śākyamuninā samyak^saṃbuddhena bhāṣitā/ tvam apy etarhy ānanda tāṃ dhāraya
T02divav33u:61: vācaya paryavāpnuhi/ yad uta tad yathā:
T02divav33u:62: p.5.1/.aṇḍare pāṇḍare kāraṇḍe keyūre +arci^haste khara^grīve bandhu^mati
T02divav33u:63: cīra^mati dharavidha cilimile viloḍaya viṣāṇi loke/ viṣa cala cala/
T02divav33u:64: gola^mati gaṇḍavile cilimile sa^atinimne yathā saṃvibhakta^gola^mati
T02divav33u:66: p.5.2/.yaḥ kaś cid ānanda^ṣaḍakṣaryā vidyayā paritrāṇaṃ svastyayanaṃ
T02divav33u:67: kuryāt sa yadi vadha^arho bhavet daṇḍena mucyate/ daṇḍa^arhaḥ prahāreṇa
T02divav33u:70: p.5.3/.na^aham ānanda taṃ samanupaśyāmi sa^deva^loke samāra^loke
T02divav33u:72: sa^asurāyāṃ yas tv anayā ṣaḍakṣayaṃ vidyayā rakṣāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ rakṣā^sūtre
T02divav33u:73: bāhau baddhe svastyayane kṛte +abhibhavituṃ śakroti varjayitvā paurāṇaṃ
T02divav33u:75: p.6.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt śiraḥ^snātā
T02divav33u:77: tena^upasaṃkramya nagara^dvāre kapāṭa^mūle niśrityā +asthāt/ āyuṣmantam ānandam āgamayamānā/ niyatam anena mārgeṇa^ānando bhikṣurāgam iṣyati^iti/
T02divav33u:78: p.6.2/.atha^āyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātra^cīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat/ dadarśa prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārika^āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ/
T02divav33u:79: dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/ yad yad eva
T02divav33u:80: kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayamāṇā/
T02divav33u:81: p.6.3./.dadarśāyuṣmānānandaḥ prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikāṃ/ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca punar jehrīymāṇarūpo +apragalbhāyamānarūpo duḥkhī durmanāḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ śrāvastyā vinirgamya yena jetavanaṃ tanopasaṃkrāntaḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvekānte +asthād/ ekānta^sthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat/ iyaṃ me bhagavan prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhā gacchantam
T02divav33u:82: anugacchati, tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/ yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśāmi
T02divav33u:83: tasya tasyaiva dvāre tūṣṇībhūtā tiṣṭhati/ trāhi me bhagavan trāhi me sugata/
T02divav33u:84: p.6.4/.evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat/ mā bher mā bher
T02divav33u:85: iti/ atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/ hiṃ te prakṛte
T02divav33u:86: mātaṅga^dārike ānandena bhikṣuṇā/ prakṛtir āha/ svāminaṃ bhadantam ānandam
T02divav33u:87: icchāmi/ bhagavān āha/ (7) anujñātāsi prakṛte mātāpitṛbhyām ānandāya/
T02divav33u:88: anujñātāsmi bhagavann anujñātāsmi sugata/ bhagavān āha/ tena hi sammukhaṃ mamānujñāpayya
T02divav33u:89: p.7.1/.atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ
T02divav33u:90: pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt
T02divav33u:91: prakrāntā/ yena svakau mātāpitarau tena^upasaṃkrāntā/ upasaṃkramya mātāpitroḥ pādān śirasā vanditvā^ekānte +asthād/ ekānta^sthitā svakau mātā pitarāv idam avocat/ sammukhaṃ me +amba tāta śramaṇasya gautamasyānandāyotsṛjatam/
T02divav33u:92: p.7.2/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau prakṛtim ādāya yana bhagavāms tena^upasaṃkrāntau/ uapsaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā
T02divav33u:93: vanditvā^ekānte nyaṣīdatāṃ/ atha prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā banditvā ekānte +asthād/ ekānta^sthitā bhagavantam etad avocat/
T02divav33u:95: p.7.3/.atha bhagavān prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv idam avoct/
T02divav33u:96: anujñātā yuvābhyāṃ prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikānandāyeti/ tāv āhutuḥ/ anujñātā bhagavann anujñātā sugata/ tena hi yūyaṃ prakṛtim apahāya gacchata
T02divav33u:98: p.7.4/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarau bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato +antikāt prakrāntau/
T02divav33u:99: p.7.5/.atha prakṛter mātaṅga^dārikāyā mātāpitarāv aciraprakrāntau viditvā
T02divav33u:100: bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idm avocat/ arthikāsi prakṛte ānandena
T02divav33u:101: bhikṣuṇā/ prakṛtir āha/ arthikāsmi bhagavann arthikāsmi sugata/ tena hi prakṛte ya ānandasya veśaḥ sa tvayā dhārayitavyaḥ/ sā āha/ dhārayāmi bhagavan dhārayāmi sugata/ pravrājayatu māṃ sugata pravrājayatu māṃ bhagavān/
T02divav33u:102: p.8.1/.atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām idam avocat/ ehi tvaṃ bhikṣuṇi cara brahma^caryam/
T02divav33u:103: p.8.2/.evam ukte prakṛtir mātaṅga^dārikā bhagavatā muṇḍā kāṣāya^prāvṛtā/
T02divav33u:104: atha bhagavān prakṛtiṃ mātaṅga^dārikām ehi bhikṣuṇīvādena pravrājayitvā
T02divav33u:105: dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma, samādāpayati sma, samuttejayati sma,
T02divav33u:106: saṃpraharṣayati sma/ yeyaṃ kathā dīrgha^rātraṃ saṃsārasamāpannānāṃ pratikūlā śravaṇīyā/tad yathā/ dānakathā śīlakathā svargakathā kāmeṣv ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ bhayaṃ saṃkleśavyavadānaṃ bodhipakṣāṃs tān dharmān bhagvān prakṛtyai bhikṣuṇyai saṃprakāśayati sma/
T02divav33u:107: p.8.3/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā dharmyaya kathayā saṃdarśitā
T02divav33u:108: samādāpitā samuttejitā saṃpraharṣitā hṛṣṭa^cittā kalyāṇacittā muditacittā vinīvaraṇacittā ṛjucittā +akhilacittā bhavyā dharma^deśitam ājñātum/
T02divav33u:109: p.9.1/.yadā ca bhagavān jñātaḥ prakṛtiṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ hṛṣṭa^cittāṃ
T02divav33u:110: kalyāṇacittāṃ muditacittāṃ vinivaraṇacittāṃ bhavyāṃ pratibalāṃ sāmutkarpikīṃ dharma^deśanām ājñātuṃ tadā yeyaṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhānāṃ caturārya^satyaprativedhikī sāmutkarṣikī dharma^deśanā, yad uta duḥkhaṃ
T02divav33u:111: samudayo nirodho mārgaḥ, tāṃ bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyā vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma/
T02divav33u:113: caturārya^satyānyabhijñātāsit/ duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgaṃ// tad yathā vastām apagatakālakaṃ rajanopagataṃ raṅga^udake prakṣiptaṃ samyag eva raṅgaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād evam eva prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tasminnevāsane niṣaṇṇā
T02divav33u:114: caturārya^satyāni abhisamayati sma, tad yathā duḥkhaṃ sumudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgam/
T02divav33u:115: p.9.3/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī kṛṣṭa^dharmā prāpta^dharmā vidita^dharmā
T02divav33u:118: +apara^pratyayā +ananyaneyā śāstuḥ śāsane +anudharma^cāriṇī ājāneyamānā dharmeṣu bhagavataḥ pādayoḥ śirasā nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat/
T02divav33u:119: p.9.4/.atyayo me bhagavann atyayo me sugata/ yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā +akuśalā duṣprajña^jātīyā yāham ānandaṃ bhikṣuṃ
T02divav33u:121: atyayam atyayato dṛṣṭvā deśayāmi/ atyayam atyayata āviṣkaromi/ āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye/ atas tasyā mama bhagavann atyayam atyayato jānātu pratigṛhṇātu anukampām upādāya/ bhagavān āha/ āyatyāṃ saṃvarāya sthitvā tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayam atyayato +adhyāgamaḥ/ yathā bālā yathā mūḍhā yathā +avyaktā yathā
T02divav33u:123: amudācarasi^iti/ yataś ca tvaṃ prakṛte +atyayaṃ jānāsi atyayaṃ paśyasi
T02divav33u:124: āyatyāṃ ca saṃvaram āpadyase, aham api te +atyayam atyayato gṛhṇāmi/
T02divav33u:125: vṛddhir eva te prakṛte pratikāṅkṣatavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ/
T02divav33u:126: p.10.1/.atha prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī bhagavatā^abhinanditā anuśiṣṭā ekāvyapakṛṣṭā +apramattā ātāpinī smṛtim atī saṃprajānā prahitāni viviktāni
T02divav33u:127: viharati sma/ yad arthaṃ kula^duhitaraḥ keśān avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā^āgārād anāgārikāṃ pravrajanti tadanuttara^brahmacarya^paryavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñaya sākṣāt kṛtya^upasaṃpadya
T02divav33u:128: pravedayate sma/ kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ
T02divav33u:130: p.10.2/.aśrauṣuḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatayo bhagavatā kila canḍāla^dārikā pravrājiteti/ śrutvā ca punar avadhyāyanti/ kathaṃ hi nāma
T02divav33u:131: caṇḍāla^dārikā bhikṣūṇāṃ samyakcaryāṃ cariṣyati/ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/ kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā
T02divav33u:133: p.11.1/.aśrauṣīd rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavatā caṇḍāla^dārikā
T02divav33u:134: pravrājiteti/ śrutvā ca punar avadhyāyāti/ kathaṃ hi nāma caṇḍāla^dārikā
T02divav33u:135: bhikṣūṇāṃ samyak^caryāṃ cariṣyati/ bhikṣuṇīnām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ
T02divav33u:138: p.11.2/.vimṛṣya ca bhadaraṃ yānaṃ yojayitvā bhadraṃ yānam abhiruhya saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvasteyair brāhmaṇa^gṛhapatibhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrāvastyā niryāti sma/ yena jetavanam anāthapiṇḍadasya^ārāmas
T02divav33u:139: tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/ tasya khalu yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā sa yānād avatīrya pattikāya^parivṛtaḥ pattikāya^puraskṛtaḥ padbhyām
T02divav33u:141: praviśya yena bhagavāṃs tena^upasaṃkrāntaḥ/ upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau
T02divav33u:142: śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ/ te +api saṃbahulāḥ śrāvasteyakā brāhmaṇa^kṣatirya^gṛhapatayo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā^ekānte
T02divav33u:143: niṣaṇṇāḥ/ apy aikatyā bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃrañjanīṃ saṃmodinīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/ apy aikasyā bhagavataḥ purataḥ svakasvakāni mātā^paitṛkāṇi nāma^gotrāṇi anuśrāvya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/ apy aikatya yena bhagavāṃs tena^añjaliṃ praṇamya^ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/ apy aikatyās tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ/
T02divav33u:144: p.11.3/.atha bhagavān rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam ārabhya teṣāṃ ca saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvasteyakānāṃ brāhmaṇa^kṣatriya^gṛhapatīnāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrvanivāsam ārabhya bhikṣūnām antrayate sma/
T02divav33u:145: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavas tathā^āgatasya sammukhaṃ prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ
T02divav33u:148: etasya bhagavan kāla etasya sugata samayo yad bhagavān prakṛter bhikṣuṇyāḥ pūrva^nivāsam ārabhya
T02divav33u:149: dharma^kathāṃ kathāyet/ yad bhagavataḥ (12) śrutvā bhikṣavo dhārayiṣyanti/
T02divav33u:150: bhagavān āha/ tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta
T02divav33u:151: bhāṣiṣye/ evaṃ sādhu bhagavann iti te bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣuḥ/
T02divav33u:155: mātaṅga^rājaḥ prativasati sma/ saṃbahulaiś ca mātaṅga^sahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ/
T02divav33u:156: sa punar bhikṣavas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rajaḥ pūrva^janma^adhītān vedān samanusmarati sma sa^aṅga^upāṅgān sarahasyān sanighaṇṭa^kaiṭabhān
T02divav33u:158: itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi/ padako vaiyākaraṇo lokāyata^yajña^mantre mahā^puruṣa^lakṣaṇe niṣṇāto niṣkāṅkṣo bhāṣyaṃ ca yathārdharmaṃ veda^vrata^padāny anuśrutaṃ ca bhāṣate sma/
T02divav33u:159: p.12.2/.tasya triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājasya śārdūakarṇo nāma kumāro +abhūd
T02divav33u:160: utpannaḥ/ rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca sarva^guṇaiś
T02divav33u:164: pūrva^janmādhītān vedān adhyāpayati sma/ yad uta sa^aṅga^upāṅgān
T02divav33u:166: itihāsa^pañca^mānanyāni ca śāstrāṇi bhāṣyaṃ ca yathā^dharmaṃ
T02divav33u:168: p.12.4/.atha triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya^etad abhavat/ ayaṃ mama putraḥ
T02divav33u:169: śārdūlakarṇo nāma kumāraḥ/ upeto rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/ sarva^guṇa^upeto +abhirūpo (13) darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ paramayā ca
T02divav33u:171: samayo +ayaṃ yan ny aham asya niveśana^dharmaṃ kariṣye/ tat kuto ny
T02divav33u:172: avaṃ śārdūlakarṇasya putrasya śīlavatīṃ guṇavatīṃ rūpavatīṃ pratirūpāṃ prajāvatīṃ labheyam
T02divav33u:173: p.13.1/.tasmin khalu samaye puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇa utkūṭaṃ nāma
T02divav33u:176: p.13.2/.puṣkarasārī punar brāhmaṇa upetaḥ mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho
T02divav33u:178: yugapad upādhyāyo +adhyāpako mantra^dharas trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragaḥ
T02divav33u:184: p.13.3/.puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā bhūtā/
T02divav33u:185: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca guṇataś ca/ sarva^guṇa^upetā
T02divav33u:186: +abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā śīlavatī guṇavatī/
T02divav33u:188: uttara^pūrveṇa^utkūṭo nāma droṇa^mukhaḥ, tatra puṣkarasāro nāma brāhmaṇaḥ
T02divav33u:189: prativasati/ upeto mātṛtaḥ pitṛto (14) yāvat tatraivedike pravacane
T02divav33u:190: vistareṇa/ sa ca^utkūṭaṃ droṇa^mukhaṃ paribhṅkte/ sasapta^utsadaṃ
T02divav33u:193: p.14.1/.tasya puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā
T02divav33u:194: upetā rūpataś ca kulataś ca śīlataś ca sarva^guṇa^upetā +abhirūpā
T02divav33u:195: darśanīyā prāsādikā paramayā varṇa^puṣkalatayā samanvāgatā/ śīlavatī guṇavatī putrasya me śārdūlakarṇasya pratirūpā patnī bhaviṣyatiti/
T02divav33u:196: p.14.2/.atra triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja etam evārthaṃ bahulaṃ rātrau cintayitvā vitarkya tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt pratyūṣa^kāla^samaye
T02divav33u:197: sarva^śvetaṃ vaḍavā ratham abhiruhya mahatā śvapākagaṇenāmātyagaṇena parivṛtaś caṇḍāla^kula^nagarān niṣkramya^uttarena prāgacchadyenotkūṭaṃ
T02divav33u:201: nānā^dvijanikūjitaṃ nandanam iva devānāṃ tad upasaṃkrāntaḥ/ upasaṃkramya brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam āgamayamāno +asthāt/ brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī māṇavakān mantrān vācayitum ihāgamiṣyati^iti/
T02divav33u:202: p.14.4/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tasyā eva rātryā atyayāt sarva^śvetaṃ
T02divav33u:204: puraskṛta utkūṭān niryti sma, brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitum/
T02divav33u:205: p.15.1/.adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ sūryam
T02divav33u:206: iva^udayantaṃ tejasā jvalantam iva hutavahaṃ yajñam iva brāhmaṇa^parivṛtaṃ
T02divav33u:207: śakram iva deva^gaṇaparivṛtaṃ haimavantam ivauṣadhibhiḥ samudram iva ratnaiś candram iva nakṣatrair vaiśravaṇam iva yakṣa^gaṇair brahmāṇam iva deva^rṣigaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṃ śobhamānaṃ/ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā
T02divav33u:209: p.15.2/.ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svāgatam āyāhi/ kāryaṃ ca te vakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ evam ukte brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī triśaṅkumātaṅga^rājam idam
T02divav33u:211: p.15.3/.na hi bhos triśaṅko śakyaṃ brāhmaṇena saha bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/
T02divav33u:212: p.15.4/.ahaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śaknomi bhoḥ kāraṃ kartuṃ/ yacchakyaṃ me kartuṃ bhavati naiva tacchakyaṃ te kartuṃ/ api tu catvāro bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣasya kāryasamārambhāḥ pūrva^samārabdhā bhavanti/ yad uta ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vātmīyārthaṃ (16) vā sarva^bhūta^saṃgrahārthaṃ vā/
T02divav33u:213: idaṃ ca^atra mahattaraṃ kāryaṃ yat te vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/ yāvantaṃ
T02divav33u:215: p.16.1/.idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bhṛśaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca kveṣaṃ ca mrakṣyaṃ ca tatpratyayāt saṃjanayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ
T02divav33u:216: kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dṛṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
T02divav33u:217: p.16.2/.dhig grāmyaviṣaya/ caṇḍāla/ nedaṃ śvapākavacanaṃ yuktaṃ/ yastvaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ veda^pāragaṃ hīnaś caṇḍāla^yonijo bhūtvā icchasy avamardituṃ/
T02divav33u:219: p.16.3ab/.prakṛtiṃ tvaṃ na jānāsi; ātmānaṃ ca^abhimanyase/
T02divav33u:220: p.16.3cd/.bāla^agre sarṣapaṃ mā bho sthāpaya(mā)kleśam āgamaḥ/
T02divav33u:222: p.17.1ab/. na hi cāmī^karaṃ mūḍha bhaved bhasma kadācana/
T02divav33u:224: p.17.2ab/.caṇḍāla^yonijas tvaṃ hi dvijātiḥ punar apy ahaṃ/
T02divav33u:225: p.17.2cd/.hīnaḥ śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ mūḍha prāthayase kathaṃ//
T02divav33u:227: p.17.3cd/.na hi śreṣṭhaḥ prahīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati//
T02divav33u:228: p.17.4ab/.śreṣṭhāḥ śreṣṭhair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ/
T02divav33u:229: p.17.4cd/.vidyayā ye tu sampannāḥ saṃśuddhaś caraṇena ca//
T02divav33u:230: p.17.5ab/.jātyā caivān abhikṣiptā mantraiḥ paramatāṃ gatāḥ/
T02divav33u:232: p.17.6ab/.nighaṇṭakaiṭabhān vedān brāhmaṇa ye hy adhīyate/
T02divav33u:233: p.17.6cd/.tais tādṛśair hi sambandhaṃ kurvantīha dvijātayaḥ//
T02divav33u:234: p.17.7ab/.na hi śreṣṭho hi hīnena sambandhaṃ kartum icchati/
T02divav33u:236: p.17.8ab/.yad asmābhiś ca sambandham iha tvaṃ kartum icchasi/
T02divav33u:238: p.17.8ef/.gaccha tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ kim asmān avamanyase//
T02divav33u:239: p.18.1ab/.caṇḍālāḥ saha caṇḍālaiḥ pukkaśāḥ saha pukkaśaiḥ/
T02divav33u:240: p.18.1cd/.kurvantīhaiva sambandhaṃ jātibhir jātir eva ca//
T02divav33u:241: p.18.2ab/.brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyaiḥ saha/
T02divav33u:242: p.18.2cd/.sārdhaṃ vaiśyās tathā vaiśyaiḥ śūdrāḥ śūdrais tathā saha//
T02divav33u:244: p.18.3cd/.na hi kurvanti caṇḍālāḥ sambandhaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ saha//
T02divav33u:246: p.18.4cd/.kathaṃ hīnaś ca śreṣṭhena sambandhaṃ kartum icchasi//
T02divav33u:247: p.18.5/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam
T02divav33u:249: p.18.6cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
T02divav33u:251: p.18.7cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā na viśeṣo +asti vai tathā//
T02divav33u:252: p.18.8ab/.na hi brāhmaṇa; ākāśān maruto vā samutthitaḥ/
T02divav33u:253: p.18.8cd/.bhitvā vā pṛthivīṃ jāto jāta^vedā yathāraṇeḥ//
T02divav33u:254: p.18.9ab/.brāhmaṇā yonito jātāś caṇḍālā; api yonitaḥ/
T02divav33u:255: p.18.9cd/.śreṣṭhatve vṛṣalatve ca kiṃ vā paśyasi kāraṇaṃ//
T02divav33u:257: p.18.10cd/.varṇās tathā^eva vā^apy anye kā nu tatra viśeṣatā//
T02divav33u:258: p.19.1ab/.yat kiñ cit pāpakaṃ karma kilviṣaṃ kalir eva ca/
T02divav33u:263: p.19.3cd/.mantrair hi prokṣitāḥ santaḥ svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ//
T02divav33u:264: p.19.4ab/.yady eṣa mārgaḥ svartāya kasmān na brāhmaṇā hy amī/
T02divav33u:265: p.19.4cd/.ātmānam athavā bandhūn mantraiḥ saṃprokṣayanti vai//
T02divav33u:266: p.19.5ab/.mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca^eva bhrātaraṃ bhaginīṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:267: p.19.5cd/.putraṃ duhitaraṃ bhāryāṃ dvijā na prokṣayanty amī//
T02divav33u:268: p.19.6ab/.mitraṃ jñātiṃ sakhīṃ vā^api ye vā viṣayavāsinaḥ/
T02divav33u:269: p.19.6cd/.prokṣitās te +api vā mantraiḥ sarve yāsyanti sadgatiṃ//
T02divav33u:270: p.19.7ab/.sarve yajñaiḥ samāhutā gamiṣyanti satāṃ gatiṃ/
T02divav33u:271: p.19.7cd/.paśubhiḥ kiṃ nu bho yaṣṭair ātmānaṃ kiṃ na yakṣyase//
T02divav33u:272: p.19.8ab/.na prokṣaṇair na mantraiś ca svargaṃ gacchanty ajaiḍakāḥ/
T02divav33u:273: p.19.8cd/.na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya mithyāprokṣaṇam ucyate//
T02divav33u:274: p.19.9ab/.brāhmaṇair audracittais tu paryāyo hy eṣa cintitaḥ/
T02divav33u:275: p.19.9cd/.māṃsaṃ khāditukāmais tu prokṣaṇaṃ kalpitaṃ paśoḥ//
T02divav33u:276: p.19.10ab/.anyac ca^ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇair yat prakalpitaṃ/
T02divav33u:279: p.20.1cd/.brahmāghnatā ca catvāraḥ pātakā brāhmaṇeṣv amī//
T02divav33u:281: p.20.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ yo hared vipraḥ sa tena +abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
T02divav33u:283: p.20.3cd/.surāṃ tu yaḥ pived vipraḥ sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
T02divav33u:285: p.20.4cd/.guru^dārāṃ tu yo gacchet sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
T02divav33u:286: p.20.5ab/.na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ hy ekaṃ hanyād anyān anekaśaḥ/
T02divav33u:287: p.20.5cd/.hayātta brāhmaṇaṃ yo vai sa tena^abrāhmaṇo bhavet//
T02divav33u:288: p.20.6ab/.ity ete pātakā hy uktā brāhmaṇeṣu catur^vidhāḥ/
T02divav33u:290: p.20.7ab/.kṛtvā caturṇam ekaikaṃ bhaved abrāhmaṇas tu saḥ/
T02divav33u:291: p.20.7cd/.labhate na ca sāmīcīṃ brāhmaṇāṇāṃ samāgame/
T02divav33u:292: p.20.7ef/.āsanaṃ ca^udakaṃ ca^eva vyutthānaṃ sa na ca^arhati//
T02divav33u:293: p.20.8ab/.tasya niḥsaranaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇaiḥ patitasya tu/
T02divav33u:294: p.20.8cd/.vrataṃ vai sa samādāya punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
T02divav33u:296: p.20.9cd/.khāṭvāṅgam ucchritaṃ kṛtvā mṛtaśīrṣe ca bhojanaṃ//
T02divav33u:298: p.21.1cd/.pūrṇe dvādaśame varṣe punar brāhmaṇatāṃ vrajet//
T02divav33u:299: p.21.2ab/.iti niḥsaraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ brāhmaṇais tu tapasvibhiḥ/
T02divav33u:301: p.21.3/ tad idaṃ brāhmaṇa te bravīmi, saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad idam ucyate brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra ity vā/ sarvam idam ekam eveti vijñaya putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ
T02divav33u:302: māṇavikāmanuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/ yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/ idaṃ ca khalu punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor
T02divav33u:304: brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī abhiṣaktaḥ kupitaś caṇḍībhūto +anāttamanāḥ kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca catpratyayaṃ janayitvā lalāṭe triśikhāṃ bhṛkuṭiṃ kṛtvā kaṇṭhaṃ
T02divav33u:305: (22) dhamayitvā +akṣiṇī parivartya nakula^piṅgalāṃ dūṣṭim utpādya triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/
T02divav33u:307: p.22.1cd/.ekaiva jātir loke +asmin sāmānyā na pṛthag^vidhā//
T02divav33u:310: p.22.3/.rājānaḥ khalu vṛṣala prati[vi]bhāgajñā bhavanti/ tad yathā deśa^dharme vā nagara^dharme vā grāma^dharme vā nigamadhama vā
T02divav33u:311: śulka^dharme vā āvāha^dharme vā vivāha^dharme vā pūrva^karmasu vā/ catvāra ime vṛṣala varṇāḥ/ yad uta brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/ teṣāṃ
T02divav33u:312: vivāha^dharmeṣu catasro bhāryā brāhmaṇasya bhavanti/ tad yathā brāhmaṇī
T02divav33u:313: kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ tisraḥ kṣatriyasya bhāryā bhavanti/ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ vaiśyasya dve bhārye bhavataḥ/ vaiśyā śūdrī ceti/ śūdrasya av ekā bhāryā bhavati śūdrī eva/ evaṃ brāhmaṇasya vṛṣala catvāraḥ putrā bhavanti/tad yathā brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ceti/ kṣatriyasya trayaḥ putrāḥ, kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/ vaiśyasya dvau putrau, vaiśyaḥ śūdra iti/ śūdrasya tv eka eva putro bhavati yad uta śūdra eva/
T02divav33u:314: p.22.4/.te brāhmaṇāḥ punar vṛṣala brahmaṇaḥ putrāḥ/ aurasā mukhato jātāḥ/
T02divav33u:315: urasto bāhutaḥ kṣatriyāḥ/ nābhito vaiśyāḥ/ padbhyāṃ śūdrāḥ/
T02divav33u:316: p.22.5/.brahmaṇā^ayaṃ khalu vṛṣala lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni nirmitāni/
T02divav33u:317: p.23.1ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:319: p.23.2/.sa tvaṃ vṛṣala caturthe +api varṇe na saṃdṛśyase/ ahaṃ ca^agre
T02divav33u:320: varṇe śreṣṭhe varṇe parame varṇe pravare varṇe/ paramārthaṃ ca saṃyogamākāṅkṣasi praṇaśya tvaṃ vṛṣala kṣipraṃ /
T02divav33u:323: p.23.3/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇasya puṣkarasāriṇas triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāja idam avocat/ idam atra brāhmaṇa śṛṇu yad bravīmi/
T02divav33u:325: p.23.4ab/.tasya jyeṣṭhā vayaṃ putrāḥ kṣatriyās tad anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:327: p.23.5ab/.sapāda^jaṅghāḥ sanakhāḥ samāṃsāḥ sapārśvapṛṣṭhāś ca narā bhavanti/
T02divav33u:328: p.23.5cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
T02divav33u:329: p.23.6ab/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravatosti kaścit tad brūhi yac ca^anumataṃ yathā
T02divav33u:331: p.23.6cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro hi nāsti varṇāś ca catvāra ito na santi//
T02divav33u:332: p.24.1ab/. yathā hi dāurukā bālāḥ krīḍamānā mahā^pathe/
T02divav33u:334: p.24.2ab/.idaṃ kṣīram idaṃ dadhi; idaṃ māṃsam idaṃ ghṛtaṃ/
T02divav33u:335: p.24.2cd/.na ca bālasya vacanāt pāṃśavo +annaṃ bhavanti hi//
T02divav33u:336: p.24.3ab/.varṇās tathāiva catvāro yathā brāhmaṇa bhāṣase/
T02divav33u:337: p.24.3cd/.pāṃśupuñjābhidhānena yogo [yaḥ ko] py eṣa na vidyate//
T02divav33u:338: p.24.4ab/.na keśena na karṇābhyāṃ na śīrṣaṇa na cakṣuṣā/
T02divav33u:339: p.24.4cd/.na mukhena na nāsayā na grīvaya na bāhunā//
T02divav33u:342: p.24.6ab/.na svareṇa na varṇena na sarvāṃśair na maithunaiḥ/
T02divav33u:344: p.24.7ab/.yathā hi jātiṣv anyāsu liṅgaṃ yoniḥ pṛthak pṛthak/
T02divav33u:345: p.24.7cd/.sāmānyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra kiṃ vā jātiṣu manyase//
T02divav33u:346: p.24.8ab/.saśīrṣakāś ca^atha narāsthi^yuktāḥ sacarmakāḥ sendriyasodarāś ca/
T02divav33u:347: p.24.8cd/.ekāṃśato nāsti yato viśeṣo varṇā na yuktāś caturo +abhidhātuṃ//
T02divav33u:348: p.24.9ab/.athāsti kaścit pravaro viśeṣas tad brūhi yaccānumataṃ yathā te/
T02divav33u:349: p.24.9cd/.atho viśeṣaḥ pravaro +atra nāsti varṇā na yuktāś
T02divav33u:351: p.25.1ab/.doṣo hy ayaṃ ca^atra bhaved ayukto yad yat tvayā ca^abhihitaṃ
T02divav33u:353: p.25.1cd/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya yac ca^atra manye
T02divav33u:355: p.25.2ab/.yac ca^atra yuktaṃ viṣamaṃ samaṃ vā tāt te pravakṣyāmi
T02divav33u:357: p.25.2cd/.doṣo hi yaś ca^api bhaved ayukto vakṣyāmi te hy uttarata^uttaraṃ
T02divav33u:359: p.25.3ef/.śrutvā tu mattaḥ pratipadya saumya karma^adhipatyaprabhavā
T02divav33u:361: p.25.4/.anumānam api te brāhmaṇa yadi pramāṇaṃ, tatra yad bravīṣi brahmā eka iti tasmāt prajā api eka^jātyā eva/ vayam apy eka^jātyā bhavāmaḥ/ yac ca vravīṣi brahmaṇā^ayaṃ lokaḥ sarva^bhūtāni ca nirmitāni^iti/ sa cette brāhmaṇa idaṃ pramāṇaṃ, tad idaṃ te brāhmaṇa ayuktaṃ yad bravīṣi catvāro varṇā brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā śūdrāś ceti/
T02divav33u:362: p.25.4/.api tu brāhmaṇa mithyā mama vaco bhavet yadi brāhmaṇa saṃvādena
T02divav33u:363: munuṣyajāter nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ yad uta śīrṣato vā mukhato vā
T02divav33u:364: karṇato vā nāsikāto vā (26) bhrūto vā rūpato vā saṃsthānato vā varṇato vā ''kārato vā yonito vā ''hārato vā sambhāvato vā nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
T02divav33u:365: p.26.1/.tad yathā^api bhoḥ puṣkarasārin gavāś ca gardabho ṣṭramṛgapakṣyajaiḍakā^nāmaṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukānāṃnānā^karanaṃ
T02divav33u:366: prajñāyate/ yad uta pādato +api mukhatopi varṇato +api saṃsthānato +api
T02divav33u:367: āhārato +api yonisambhavato +api nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate naca^evaṃ teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ tat tasmāt sarvam idam ekam iti/
T02divav33u:370: nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ na
T02divav33u:375: p.26.4/.yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvagbhāgataś ca gulmataś ca
T02divav33u:376: sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca viśeṣa upalabhyate/ na
T02divav33u:378: p.26.5/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn amīṣāṃ kṣīravṛkṣāṇām udumbaraplakṣāśvatthanyagrodhavalgukety evam ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ
T02divav33u:379: prajñāyate/ yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca tvag bhāgataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ na tv eva
T02divav33u:381: p.26.6/.tad yathā puṣkarasārinn amīṣām api phalabaiṣajyavṛkṣāṇām āmalakīharītakīvibhītakī pharasaka^ādīnām anyāsām api vividhānām oṣadhīnāṃ
T02divav33u:382: grāma^jānāṃ pārvatīyānāṃ tṛṇa^vanaspatīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ yad uta mūlataś ca skandhataś ca (27) gulmataś ca sārataś ca patrataś ca
T02divav33u:383: puṣpataś ca phalataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ
T02divav33u:385: sumanā vārṣikādhanaṣkārika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ yad uto rūpato
T02divav33u:387: na tv eva caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/
T02divav33u:388: p.27.2/.tad yathā brāhmaṇām īṣām api jalajānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ
T02divav33u:389: padma^utpala^saugandhika^mṛdu^gandhika^ādīnāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ yad uta rūpataś ca gandhataś ca saṃsthānataś ca vaṇataś ca nānā^karaṇaṃ
T02divav33u:390: prajñāyate/ natveva varṇānāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate/ tad yathā puṣkarasārin amī brāhmaṇā iti kṣatriyā iti vaiśyā iti śūdrā iti/ tasmād ekam eva^idaṃ sarvam
T02divav33u:392: p.27.3ab/.apy anyat te pravakṣyāmi brāhmaṇaiḥ kalpitaṃ yath|ā/
T02divav33u:393: p.27.3cd/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā//
T02divav33u:394: p.27.4ab/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ/
T02divav33u:396: p.27.5ab/.aśrūṇy avocad varṣā +asya nadyaḥ prasrāvam eva ca/
T02divav33u:397: p.27.5cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai; evaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ//
T02divav33u:398: p.28.1/.parīkṣasva tvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sva^lakṣaṇaṃ/ yasmād brahmaṇo brāhmaṇā
T02divav33u:399: utpannās tasmāt kṣatriyā api vaiśyā api śūdrā apy utpannāḥ/
T02divav33u:400: p.28.2ab/.evaṃ prasūtir yadi tatvataḥ syāt tato hi syād varṇa^kṛto
T02divav33u:402: p.28.2cd/.yadi brāhmaṇā brahma^lokaṃ vrajeyus trayaś ca varṇā na vrajeyuḥ
T02divav33u:404: p.28.2ef/.evaṃ bhaved varṇa^kṛto viśeṣo na cenna catvāro bhavanti varṇāḥ//
T02divav33u:405: p.28.3ab/.yasmād dhi varṇaś caturtha evaṃ prayāti svargaṃ svakṛtena
T02divav33u:407: p.28.3cd/.yatas tapaś ca^ārṣam iha praśastaṃ tasmād dvijāter na viśeṣaṇaṃ
T02divav33u:409: p.28.4ab/.yadi brāhmaṇaḥ syād ihaika eva dvijihvaś catuḥ^śravaṇas
T02divav33u:411: p.28.4cd/.catur^viṣāṇo bahupād dviśīrṣa evaṃ kṛte varṇa^kṛto viśeṣaḥ//
T02divav33u:412: p.29.1ab/.rāgaiś ca nāma paraghātanaṃ ca evaṃ prakāraṃ ca viheṭhanaṃ ca/
T02divav33u:413: p.29.1cd/.sattvasya vai karmaṇo dhvaṃsanaṃ ca etāny akalyāṇakṛtāni
T02divav33u:415: p.29.2ab/.yuddhaṃ vivādṃ kalahāny abhīkṣṇaṃ goprokṣaṇaṃ cintitaṃ brāhmaṇair hi/
T02divav33u:416: p.29.2cd/.atharvaṇaḥ karmaṇā trāsanaṃ ca etāni mantrāṇi kṛtāni vipraiḥ//
T02divav33u:417: p.29.3ab/.pāpecchatā bahu^jana^vañcanaṃ ca śāṭhyaṃ ca dhaurtyaṃ ca tathā^eva kalpaṃ/
T02divav33u:418: p.29.3cd/.evaṃ pareṣām ahitaṃ vicintya kadā ca te svargam ito vrajeyuḥ//
T02divav33u:419: p.29.4ab/.ye brāhmaṇā ugratapā vinītā vratena śīlena sadā hy upetāḥ/
T02divav33u:420: p.29.4cd/.ahiṃsakā ye dama saṃyame ratās te brāhmaṇā brahma^puraṃ
T02divav33u:422: p.29.5ab/.saha^asthi^māṃsaḥ sanakhaḥ sacarmā duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ mūtra^purīṣam
T02divav33u:424: p.29.5cd/.pañca^indriyair nāsti yato viśeṣas tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka
T02divav33u:426: p.29.6/.tad yathā nāma brāhmaṇa kasya^cit puruṣasya catvāraḥ putrā
T02divav33u:427: bhaveyuḥ/ sa teṣāṃ nāmāni kuryān nandaka iti vā jīvaka iti vā aśoka iti vā śatāyur iti vā
T02divav33u:428: iṣṭāś ca (30) punar bho etasya puruṣasya putrā bhaveyuḥ/
T02divav33u:429: tatra yo nandakaḥ sa nandet/ yo jīvakaḥ sa īvet/ yo +aśokaḥ sa na śocet/
T02divav33u:431: p.30.1/.nāmataḥ punar brāhmaṇa teṣāṃ nānā^karaṇaṃ prajñāyate na jātitaḥ/
T02divav33u:432: tatkasya hetoḥ/ iha khalu punar brāhmaṇa pitṛtaḥ putro jāyte/ tasmāc ca tatredaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
T02divav33u:433: p.30.2ab/.mātā bhastrā pituḥ putro yena jātaḥ sa eva saḥ/
T02divav33u:434: p.30.2cd/.yady evaṃ bho vijānāsi na te (putrā) parabhūtāḥ kvacit//
T02divav33u:435: p.30.3/.parīkṣasva brāhmaṇa saṃyageva ko +atra brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ
T02divav33u:437: p.30.4ab/.sarve kāṇāś ca kubjāś ca sarve +apasmāriṇopi vā/
T02divav33u:438: p.30.4cd/.kilāsinaḥ kuṣṭhinaś ca gaurāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ pṛthak pṛthak//
T02divav33u:440: svakarmaṇā/ evaṃ gate brāhmaṇa naiva bhavati viśeṣaḥ/ ko jāti^kṛto
T02divav33u:442: p.30.6/.yasmān na jāter viśeṣaṇo +asti tasmān na vai varṇa^catuṣka eva/
T02divav33u:443: p.31.1/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātram idaṃ lokasya yad idaṃ brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā caṇḍāla iti vā/
T02divav33u:444: ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:445: p.31.2/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārīdam avocat/ kiṃ punarbhavatā ṛgvedo +adhītaḥ, yajurvedo
T02divav33u:447: kalpādhyāyo pi/ adhyātmam api mṛgacakraṃ vā nakṣatra^gaṇo vā
T02divav33u:448: tithi^kramagaṇo vā tvayādhītaḥ/ karma^cakraṃ vā tvayādhigataṃ/ athavā
T02divav33u:449: +aṅgavidyā vā vastravidyā vā śivāvidyā śakunividyā vā tvayādhītā/ athavā rāhucairtaṃ vā
T02divav33u:450: śukra^caritaṃ vā grahacaritaṃ vā tvayādhītaṃ/ athavā lokāyateṃ bhavatā
T02divav33u:451: bhāṣyapravacanaṃ vā pakṣādhyāyo vā nyāyo vā tvayādhītaḥ/
T02divav33u:452: p.32.1/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rāhaḥ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇam etad
T02divav33u:453: avocat/ etac ca mayā brāhmaṇādhītaṃ bhūyaś ca^uttaraṃ /
T02divav33u:454: yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād aham asmi mantreṣu pāraṃ prāpta iti/ tatra te brāhmaṇa
T02divav33u:455: saha dharmeṇānumānaṃ pravakṣyāmi/ na khalv evaṃ brāhmaṇa prāthamakalpikānāṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/ yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/
T02divav33u:456: p.32.2/.atha brāhmaṇa sattvānāmasadṛśānāṃ ca^ubhayathā sadṛśānāṃ tato +anye sattvāḥ śālikṣetrāṇi kelāyanti gopāyanti vāpayanti vā/ te +amī
T02divav33u:457: kṣatriyā iti saṃjñā udapādi/ athātra brāhmaṇa tad anyatamānāṃ sattānām etad abhavat/ parigraho rogaḥ parigraho gaṇḍaḥ parigrahaḥ śalyaḥ/ yannu vayaṃ svaparigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśakānupasaṃhṛtya tṛṇa^kuṭikāṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā
T02divav33u:459: p.32.3/.atha te sattvās taṃ svakaṃ parigraham apahāyāraṇyāyatanaṃ gatvā
T02divav33u:460: tṛṇa^kāṣṭhaśākhāpatraparṇapalāśakais tṛṇa^kuṭiṃ vā parṇakuṭikāṃ vā kṛtvā
T02divav33u:461: tatra^eva praviśya dhyāyanti sma/ te tatra sāyam āsanahetoḥ prāntavāṭikāṃ prātaraśanahetoś ca grāmaṃ piṇḍāya praviśanti sma/
T02divav33u:462: p.32.4/.atha teṣāṃ grāma^vāsināṃ sattvānām etad abhavat/ duṣkarakārakā vata bhoḥ sattvā ye svakaṃ parigraham utṛjya grāma^nigamajana^padebhyo
T02divav33u:463: bahir nirgatās teṣāṃ bahirmanaskā brāhyaṇā iti saṃjñā udapādi/ te ca punar
T02divav33u:464: grāma^vāsinaḥ sattvās tān atīva satkurvanti sma/ teṣāṃ ca dātavyaṃ
T02divav33u:466: p.33.1/.atha teṣām eva sattvānām anyatame sattvās tāni dhyānāny asaṃbhāvayanto grāmeṣv avatīrya mantra^padān svādhyāyanti sma/ tāṃs te grāma^nivāsina āhuḥ --- na levalam ime sattvā ime +adhyāpakāḥ, teṣām adhyāpakā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
T02divav33u:467: p.33.2/.ayaṃ hetur ayaṃ pratyayo brāhmaṇānāṃ loke prādurbhāvāya/
T02divav33u:469: artha^pratisaṃyuktān kurvanti sma/ teṣāṃ vaiśyā iti saṃjñā udapādi/
T02divav33u:470: p.33.3/.athānyatame sattvāḥ kṣudreṇa karmaṇā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti sma/ teṣāṃ śūdrā iti saṃjñā
T02divav33u:471: p.33.4/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhamṇa anyatamaḥ sattvo vadhūm ādāya ratham
T02divav33u:472: āruhyānyatam asminn araṇyapradeśe gataḥ/ tatra ca ratho bhagnaḥ/ tasmān mātaṅgama [mā tvaṃ gamaḥ] iti saṃjñā udapādi/
T02divav33u:473: p.33.5/.kṣetraṃ karṣanti ye teṣāṃ karṣakā iti saṃjñā prvṛttā/ bhāṣyeṇa ca parṣadaṃ rañjayati dharmeṇa śīlabratasamācāreṇa samyak, tasya rājā iti
T02divav33u:475: p.33.6/.tato +anye sattvā vāṇijyayā jīvikāṃ kalpayanti teṣāṃ vaṇija iti saṃjñā (34) udapādi/ tataś ca^anye sattvāḥ pravrajanti sma/ pravrajitvā parān jayanti kleśān jayanti^iti teṣāṃ pravrajitā iti loke saṃjñā udapādi/
T02divav33u:476: p.34.1/.api tu brāhmaṇa ekaiva saṃjñā loka udapādi/ tāṃ te pravakṣyāmi/
T02divav33u:477: p.35.1/.brahmā loke +asmin imān vedān vācayati/ brahmā devānāṃ parama^tāpasaḥ/ indrasya kauśikasya vedān vācayati sma/ indraḥ kauśiko +araṇemi gautamaṃ vedān vācayati/ araṇemi gautamaḥ śvetaketuṃ vedān
T02divav33u:478: vācayati/ śvetaketuḥ śukaṃ paṇḍitaṃ vedān vācayati/ śukaḥ paṇḍitaś ca
T02divav33u:479: vedān vibhajati sma/ tad yathā puṣyo bahv^ṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chantogānām eka^viṃśatir adhvaryavaḥ/
T02divav33u:480: kratur artha^vaṇikānāṃ/ bahv^ṛcānām ete brāhmaṇāḥ/ sarve te vyākhyāyante/
T02divav33u:481: puṣya eko bhūtvā pañca^viṃśatidhā bhinnaḥ/ tad yathā śuklā valkalā māṇḍavyā iti/ tatra daśa śuklāḥ/ aṣṭau valkalāḥ/ sapta māṇḍavyāḥ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa bahv^ṛcānāṃ śākhā/ puṣya eko bhūtvā pañca^viṃśatidhā bhinnaḥ/
T02divav33u:482: p.35.2/.anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ chandogānāṃ/ brāhmaṇāḥ sarva ete
T02divav33u:483: chandogāḥ/ paṃktir ety ekā bhūtvā sa^aśīti^sahasradhā bhinnā/ tad yathā śīlavalkā araṇemikā laukākṣāḥ kauthumā brahma^samā mahā^samā mahā^yāgikāḥ
T02divav33u:485: p.36.1/.tatra śīlavalkā viṃśatiḥ/ araṇemikā viṃśatiḥ/ laukākṣāś
T02divav33u:486: catvāriṃśat/ kauthumānāṃ śataṃ/ brahma^samānāṃ śataṃ/ mahā^samānāṃ
T02divav33u:487: pañca^śatāni/ mahā^yāgikānāṃ śataṃ/ sa^atyam ugrāṇāṃ śataṃ /
T02divav33u:488: samanta^vedānāṃ śataṃ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa^chandogānāṃ śākhā/ paṃktir ity ekā
T02divav33u:490: p.36.2/.anumānam api pramāṇam adhvaryūṇāṃ/ ete brāhmaṇā eka^viṃśaty
T02divav33u:491: adhvaryavo bhūtvā eka^uttaraśatadhā bhinnāḥ/ tad yathā kaṭhāḥ kaṃinā vājasaneyino jātukarṇāḥ proṣṭhapadā ṛṣayaḥ/ tatra daśa kaṭhā daśa kaṇimā ekādaśa vājasaneyinaḥ/trayodaśa jātukarnāḥ/ ṣoḍaśa proṣṭhapadāḥ/ eka catvāriṃśad ṛṣayaḥ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇādhvaryūṇāṃ śākhā/ eka^viṃśatyadhvaryavo
T02divav33u:495: ete mantrāḥ sarve te +atharvaṇikāḥ/ kratur eko bhūtvā dvidhā bhinnaḥ/ dvidhā bhūtvā caturdhā
T02divav33u:497: bhinnaḥ/ itīyaṃ brāhmaṇātharvaṇikānāṃ śākhā/ kratur ekaḥ ṣoḍaśa^uttaradvādaśa^śatadhā bhinnaḥ/
T02divav33u:498: p.36.4/.anumānam api brāhmaṇa pramāṇaṃ pratītya etāni dvādaśa^bhedaśatāni
T02divav33u:499: ṣoḍaśabhedāś ca ye brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāḥ/ chandasi vā vyākaraṇe vā lokāyate vā (37) padamīmāṃsāyāṃ vā na caiṣāmūhāpohaḥ
T02divav33u:500: prajñāyate/ yad uta eka^jātyo nāmeti viditvā bandhur bhavitum arhati/ tat te vrāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam etal lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā
T02divav33u:501: kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya yāvantaṃ
T02divav33u:503: p.37.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tuṣṇīṃbhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparo +asthāt/
T02divav33u:504: p.37.2/.dadarśa triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājo brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇaṃ tṛṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srasta^skandham adhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/ dṛṣṭvā ca punar idam abravīt/ yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syād asadṛśena saha sambandho bhaviṣyati^iti/ na punastvayā brāhmaṇa^evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/ (38)tat kasya hetoḥ/ ye pramāṇaśrutiśīlapraññādayo guṇā agyrā lokasya te mama putrasya śārdūlakarṇasya saṃvidyante/ yad api te brāhmaṇa evaṃ syāt --- ye vājapiyaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti/ aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ
T02divav33u:505: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yajanti, sarve te kāyasya bhedātsugatau
T02divav33u:506: svarga^loke deveṣūpapadyanta iti/ na punarbrāhmaṇa tvaya^evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/
T02divav33u:507: tat kasya hetoḥ/vājapeyaṃ brāhmaṇa yajñaṃ yajamānā aśvamedhaṃ
T02divav33u:509: śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ ca yajamānā bahudhā mantrān pravartayantaḥ prāṇihiṃsāṃ ca pravartayanti/ tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi na hy eṣa mārgaḥ svargāya/ ahaṃ te brāhmaṇa mārgaṃ svargāya vyākhāmi/ tac chṛṇu/
T02divav33u:511: p.38.1cd/.praśaṃsāṃ vitta^lābhaṃ ca pretya svarge ca modanaṃ//
T02divav33u:512: p.38.2/.yair brāhmaṇa itaḥ pūrvaṃ vājapeyo yajña iṣṭaḥ/ yair aśvamedho yaiḥ puruṣa^medho yaiḥ śāmyaprāśo yair nirargaḍo yajña iṣṭaḥ, parigṛhītas tair nirargalaṃ ca kāmaiḥ kāmaḥ/ ito nākaḥ paryeṣyate/ ye brāhmaṇa itaḥ
T02divav33u:513: paścād vājapeyaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti ye +aśvamedhaṃ puruṣa^medhaṃ ye śāmyaprāśaṃ nirargaḍaṃ yajñaṃ yakṣyanti te nirarthakaṃ mahā^vighātaṃ
T02divav33u:515: p.38.3/.tasmāt te brāhmana bravīmi --- ehi tvaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ yojayasvā/ tat kasya hetoḥ/ dharmeṇa hi caṇḍālā ajugupsanīyā bhavanti/ api
T02divav33u:517: p.39.1ab/.śraddhā śīlaṃ tapastyāgaḥ śrutir jñānaṃ dayaiva ca/
T02divav33u:519: p.39.2/.pramāṇam aṣṭaprakāraṃ svargāya/ tad ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ prakāraiḥ svargagamanam iṣyate/ ye prāyeṇa jānanti viśeṣeṇa khalv apy anekair vividhari yajñaiḥ/ aṣṭau cemā brāhmaṇa nirdiṣṭā mātṛtulyā bhaginyo loke
T02divav33u:520: pravartante/ tad yathā aditir devānāṃ mātā/ divit dānavānāṃ/ manur
T02divav33u:521: mānavānāṃ/ surabhiḥ saurabheyānāṃ/ vinatā suparṇānāṃ/ kadrur nāgānāṃ/
T02divav33u:522: pṛthivī bhūtānāṃ mātā sarva^bījānāṃ/ marutāṃ mahāmahaḥ/ mahā^kāśyapaṃ manasā vidanti ṛṣayaḥ/
T02divav33u:523: p.39.3/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin brāhmaṇānāṃ saptagotrāṇi vyākhyāsyāmi
T02divav33u:524: tāni śrūyantāṃ/ tad yathā gautamā vātsyāḥ kautsāḥ kauśikāḥ kāśyapā vāśiṣṭhā māṇḍavyā ity etāni brāhmaṇa saptagotrāṇi/ eṣām ekaikaṃ gotraṃ
T02divav33u:525: saptadhā bhinnaṃ/ atra ye gautamās te kauthumāste gargās te bharadvājāsta ārṣṭiṣeṇās te vaikhānasās te (40) vajrapādāḥ/ tatra ye vātsyāsta ātreyās te maitreyās te bhārgavās te sāvarṇyā ste salolās te bahujātāḥ/ tatra ye kautsās te maudgalyāyanās te gauṇāyanās te lāṅgalāste lagnāste daṇḍalagnāste soma^bhuvāḥ[vah}/ tatra ye kauśikās te kātyāyanās te
T02divav33u:526: darbhakātyāyanās te valkalinas te pakṣiṇas te laukākṣās te lohita^āyanāḥ
T02divav33u:528: tatra ye kāśyapās te maṇḍanās te iṣṭās te śauṇḍāyanās te rocaneyās te +anapekṣās te +agniveśyāḥ/ tatra ye vaḥśiṣṭhās te jātukarṇyās te
T02divav33u:529: dhānyāyanās te pārāśarās te vyāghranakhās ta āṇḍāyanasta aupamanyavāḥ/
T02divav33u:530: tatra ye māṇḍavyās te bhāṇḍāyanās te dhaumrāyaṇās te kātyāyanās te khalv avāhanās te sugandhārāyaṇās te kāpiṣṭhalāyanāḥ/
T02divav33u:531: p.40.1/.ity etāni brāhmaṇa evam ekonapañcāśad gotrāṇi brāhmaṇaiḥ paurāṇaiḥ samyag dṛṣṭāni chandasi vyākaraṇe padamīmāṃsāyāṃ/ anyāni ca gotrāṇi
T02divav33u:532: vistarato mayā vācitāni/ tāni anyair na jñāyante/
T02divav33u:533: p.40.2/.yad utaikatvam iti viditvā bhavān bandhur bhavitum arhati/ tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi sāmānyaṃ saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃ lokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ /
T02divav33u:534: pppppputrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃduhitaram utsṛja bhāryā^arthāya/ yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:535: p.41.1/.idaṃ punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī tṛṣṇīṃ bhūto madgubhūtaḥ srastaskandho +adhomukho niṣpratibhaḥ pradhyānaparaḥ sthito +abhūt/ adrākṣīt triśaṅkur mātaṅga^rājaḥ
T02divav33u:536: puṣkarasāriṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tūṣṇīṃ bhūtaṃ madgubhūtaṃ srastaskandham abhomukhaṃ niṣpratibhaṃ pradhyānaparaṃ sthitaṃ/ dṛṣṭvā ca punar idam
T02divav33u:538: p.41.2ab/.yādṛśaṃ vāpyate bījaṃ tādṛśaṃ labhyate phalaṃ/
T02divav33u:539: p.41.2cd/.prajāpater hi caikatve nirviśeṣo bhavaty ataḥ//
T02divav33u:540: p.41.3ab/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ nānātvaṃ kriyābhedaś ca dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:541: p.41.3cd/.brāhmaṇe vānya^jātau vā naiṣāṃ kiñcid viśiṣyate//
T02divav33u:542: p.41.4ab/.na hy ātmanaḥ samutkarṣaḥ śreṣṭha tvam iha yujyate/
T02divav33u:545: p.41.5cd/.bhavet te bhaginī bhāryā naitad brāhmaṇa yujyate//
T02divav33u:546: p.41.6ab/.yadi tāvad ayaṃ loko brahmaṇā janitaḥ svayaṃ/
T02divav33u:548: p.41.7ab/.atha vaiśyasya vaiśyā vai śūdrā śūdrasya vā punaḥ/
T02divav33u:549: p.41.7cd/.na bhāryā bhaginī yuktā brahmaṇā janitā yadi//
T02divav33u:550: p.41.8ab/.na sattvā brahmaṇo jātāḥ kleśajāḥ karmajāstvamī/
T02divav33u:551: p.41.8cd/.nīcaiś ca^uccaiś ca dūśyante sattvā nānā^āśrayāḥ pṛthak//
T02divav33u:552: p.41.9ab/.teṣāṃ ca jātisāmānyād brāhmaṇe kṣatriye tathā/
T02divav33u:553: p.41.9cd/.atha vaiśye ca śūdre ca samaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate//
T02divav33u:555: p.42.1cd/.itihāso nighaṇṭaś ca kutaś chando nirarthakaṃ//
T02divav33u:556: p.42.2ab/.asmākam apy adhyayane maitrī vidyā tathā śikhī/
T02divav33u:558: p.42.3ab/.manojavā ca gāndhārī ghorī vidyā vaśaṅkarī/
T02divav33u:559: p.42.3cd/.kāka^vāṇī ca mantraṃ ca; indrajālaṃ ca bhañjanī//
T02divav33u:561: p.42.4cd/.maṇi^puṣpāś ca; ṛṣayo bhāsvarāś ca maharṣayaḥ//
T02divav33u:565: p.42.6cd/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa manyase//
T02divav33u:568: p.43.2ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
T02divav33u:569: p.43.2cd/.kṣatriyā reṇukā nāma jajñe rāmaṃ mahā^muniṃ/
T02divav33u:571: p.43.3ab/.na hy asau brāhmaṇīputraḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
T02divav33u:572: p.43.3cd/.ye ca te manujā; āsan tejasā tapasā yutāḥ/
T02divav33u:573: p.43.4ab/.paṇḍitāś ca vinītāś ca loke ca; ṛṣisammatāḥ/
T02divav33u:574: p.43.4cd/.na hi te brāhmaṇīputrāḥ kiṃ vā brāhmaṇa vakṣyasi//
T02divav33u:575: p.43.5ab/.saṃjñā kṛteyaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyās tathā/
T02divav33u:576: p.43.5cd/.vaiśyāx ca^eva tathā śūdrāḥ saṃjñeyaṃ saṃprakīrtitā//
T02divav33u:577: p.43.6/.tasmāt te brāhmaṇa bravīmi saṃjñāmātrakam idaṃlokasya yad uta brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdara iti vā/ ekam idaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me (44) śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram
T02divav33u:578: anuprayaccha bharyarthāya/ yāvantaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvantam anupradāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:579: p.44.1/.idaṃ ca punarvacanaṃ śrutvā triśaṅkor mātaṅga^rājasya bbrāhmaṇaḥ puskarasārī triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/ kiṃ gotro bhavān/ āha ātreyagotro +asmi/ hiṃpūrvaḥ/ āha/ ātreyaḥ/ kiṃcaraṇaḥāha
T02divav33u:580: kāleyamaitrāyaṇīyaḥ/ kati pravarāḥ/ āha trayaḥ pravarāḥ/ tad yathā vātsyāḥ
T02divav33u:581: kautsyā bharadvājāś ca/ ke bhavantaḥ sabrahma^cāriṇaḥ/ chandogāḥ/ kati chantogānāṃ bhedāḥ/ ṣaṭ/ te katame/ āha/ tad yathā/ kauthumāḥ/ ca^arāyaṇīyāḥ/
T02divav33u:583: p.44.2/.kiṃ bhavato mātṛjaṃ gotraṃ/ āha/ pārāśarīyaṃ/ paṭhatu bhavān sāvitrīṃ/ kathaṃ bhavati/ katyakṣarā sāvitrī/ kathigaṇḍā/ katipadā/
T02divav33u:584: p.44.3/.caturviṃśatyakṣarā sāvitrī/ trigaṇḍā/ aṣṭākṣarapadā/ uccārayatu bhavān sāvitrīṃ/atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sotpattikāṃ sāvitrīṃ pravakṣyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/
T02divav33u:586: p.44.5/.bhūta^pūrvaṃ brāhmaṇātīte +adhvani vasur nāma ṛṣir bhūva/
T02divav33u:587: pañcābhijña ugratejā mahānubhāvo dhyānānāṃ lābhī/ tena tatra takṣakaduhitā
T02divav33u:588: kapilā nāma āsāditā bhāryā^arthaṃ/ sa tatra saṃrakta^cittas tayā kanyayā sārdhaṃ maithunam agacchat/ sa ṛṣi (45) ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo
T02divav33u:589: vañcitaḥ/ ṛddhiparihīnaḥ sa vipratisārī ātmano duścaritaṃ vigarhamāṇas
T02divav33u:590: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāvitrīṃ bhāṣate sma/ tad yathā/
T02divav33u:591: p.45.1/.oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ/ tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi/
T02divav33u:593: p.45.2/.iti hi brāhmaṇa ajñāna^śodhanārtham imam eva mantraṃ sa brāhmaṇo divā^rātraṃ japati sma/ iyaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sāvitrī/ pūrvajaḥ prajāpatiḥ
T02divav33u:595: p.45.3cd/.gambhīrāv abhāse tatra hy ātmārāmas taporataḥ/
T02divav33u:596: p.45.4/.devasya śreṣṭhakaṃ bhījanam apanābhyo paviṣṭa imaṃmantram ajapat/
T02divav33u:598: p.45.5/.oṃ citraṃ hi vaiśyakanyakā/ atha sā kanyā arthataḥ pravīṇā/
T02divav33u:599: p.46.1/.iyaṃ vaiśyānāṃ sāvitrī/ om atapaḥ sutapaḥ/ jīvema śaradāṃ śataṃ/
T02divav33u:600: paśyema śaradāṃ śataṃ/ iyaṃ śūdrāṇāṃ sāvitrī/ oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ/
T02divav33u:601: p.46.2ab/.kāmā hi loke paramāḥ prajānāṃ kleśaprahāṇe bhūtā antarāyāḥ/
T02divav33u:602: p.46.2cd/.tasmād bhavantaḥ prajahantu kāmān tato +atulaṃ prāpsy atha brahma^lokaṃ/
T02divav33u:603: p.46.3/.itīyaṃ brāhmaṇa brahmaṇā sahāpatinā sāvitrī bhāṣitā, pūrvakaiś ca samyak saṃbuddhair
T02divav33u:605: p.46.4/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko nakṣatra^vaṃśaṃ/ atha kiṃ/ bhoḥ kathayatu bhavān/ śrūyatāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^vaṃśaṃ kathayiṣyāmi/ tad
T02divav33u:607: p.46.5/.kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā ārdrā punarvashḥ puṣyaḥ aśleṣā maghā pūrvaphalgunī uttaraphalgunī hastā citrā svātī viśākhā anurādhā jyeṣṭhā
T02divav33u:608: mūlā pūrvāṣāḍhā uttarāṣāḍhā abhijit śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā pūrvabhādrapadā uttarabhādrapadā revatī aśvinī bharaṇī /
T02divav33u:612: p.46.7/.kṛttikā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatraṃ ṣaṭtāraṃ kṣura^saṃsthānaṃ
T02divav33u:621: pada^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ madhy?āhāram aditidaivataṃ vāśiṣṭhaṃ gotreṇa/ puṣya^nakṣatraṃ tritāraṃ vardhamāna^saṃsthānaṃ
T02divav33u:632: padaka^saṃsthānaṃ pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ godhūmamatsyāhāram aryamādaivataṃ kauśikaṃ gotreṇa/ hasta^nakṣatraṃ pañca^tāraṃ
T02divav33u:640: p.49.1.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi dakṣiṇādvārakāṇi/
T02divav33u:646: mūlaphalāhāraṃ nairṛtidaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ gotreṇa/ pūrvāṣāḍhā^nakṣatraṃ catustāraṃ govikrama^saṃsthānaṃ
T02divav33u:653: tritāraṃ yavamadhya^saṃsthānaṃ triṃśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ pakṣimāṃsāhāraṃ viṣṇudaivataṃ kātyāyanīyaṃ
T02divav33u:654: p.50.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi paścimadvārakāṇi/
T02divav33u:664: tilaka^saṃsthānaṃ triśan^muhūrta^yogaṃ dadhyāhāraṃ pūṣadaivatam aṣṭabhaginīyaṃ gotreṇa/ aśvinī^nakṣatraṃ dvitāraṃ turagaśīrṣa^saṃsthānaṃ
T02divav33u:668: p.51.1/.ity etāni bhoḥ puṣkarasārin sapta^nakṣatrāṇi uttara^dvārakāṇi/
T02divav33u:670: ṣaṇ^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^catvāriṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni/ tad yathā/ rohiṇī punarvasu uttaraphalgunī viśākhā uttarāṣāḍhā uttarabhādrapadā ceti/
T02divav33u:671: p.51.3/.pañca^nakṣatrāṇi pañca^daśa^muhūrta^yogāni/ tad yathā/ ārdrā aśleṣā svātī jyeṣṭhā śatabhiṣā ceti/ eko +abhijit ṣaṇ^muhūrta^yogaḥ/
T02divav33u:673: p.52.1/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ pūrva^dvārikāṇāṃ
T02divav33u:674: kṛttikā prathamā nāmāśleṣā paścimā nāma/ amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ
T02divav33u:675: dakṣiṇa^dvārikāṇāṃ maghā prathamā nāma viśākhā paścimā nāma/ amīṣāṃ paścimadvārikāṇāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām anurādhā prathamā nāma śravaṇā paścimā nāma/ amīṣāṃ saptānāṃ nakṣatrāṇām uttara^dvārikāṇāṃ dhaniṣṭhā prathamā nāma bharaṇī paścimā nāma/
T02divav33u:676: p.53.2/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ sapta balāni/
T02divav33u:677: katamāni sapta/ yad uta trīṇi pūrvāṇi viśākhānurādhā punarvashḥ svātiś ca/
T02divav33u:678: trīṇi dāruṇāni/ ārdrā aśleṣā bharaṇī ceti/ catvāri sammānanīyāni/ yad uta trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ceti/ pañca mṛdukāni/ śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabhiṣā
T02divav33u:679: jyeṣṭhā mūlā iti/ pañca dhāraṇīyāni/ hastā citrā aśleṣā maghā abhijic ceti/ catvāri kṣipra^karaṇīyāni/ yad uta kṛttikā mṛgaśirā puṣyā aśvinī ceti/
T02divav33u:681: p.52.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭaviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ trayo yogā
T02divav33u:682: bhavanti/ ṛṣabhānusārī yogaḥ/ vatsānusārī yogaḥ/ yuganaddho yogaḥ/ tatra nakṣatraṃ yadi purastād gacchati candraś ca pṛṣṭhataḥ, ayam ucyate ṛṣabhānusārī yoga iti/ yad uta candraḥ purastād gacchati nakṣatraṃ ca
T02divav33u:683: pṛṣṭhataḥ, tadā bhavati vatsānusārī yogaḥ/ yadi punaś candro nakṣatraṃ
T02divav33u:685: samau yugapad gacchataḥ, tadāyam ucyate yuganaddho yoga iti/
T02divav33u:687: p.53.1/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin grahān pravakṣyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ tad yathā śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ sūryas tārādhipatiś ceti/
T02divav33u:689: p.53.2/.evaṃ viparivartamāne loke nakṣatreṣu pravibhakteṣu kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhiś ca bhavati/ tad ucyate/
T02divav33u:690: p.53.3/.hemantānāṃ dvitīye māsi rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso
T02divav33u:691: bhavati/ aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyām aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ dvādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ varṣāṇāṃ paścime māse rohiṇyām aṣṭamyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtā
T02divav33u:693: p.53.4/.kiṃ bhos triśaṅko rātridivasānāṃ prasthānaṃ/ divasānudivasaṃ/ kiṃ pakṣasya prasthānaṃ/ (54)pratipad/ kiṃ saṃvatsarasya prasthānaṃ/ pauṣaḥ/
T02divav33u:699: p.54.2/.tad yathā bhoḥ puṣkarasārin striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ
T02divav33u:700: sūtrodyāmaḥ/ evaṃ dīrghas tatkṣaṇaḥ/ viṃśatyadhikaṃ tatkṣaṇaśatam ekaḥ
T02divav33u:701: kṣaṇaḥ/ ṣaṣṭikṣaṇā eko lavaḥ/ triṃśallavā eko muhūrtaḥ/ etena kramasambandhena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekaṃ rātridivasam anumīyate/ teṣāṃ muhūrtānām imāni nāmāni bhavanti/
T02divav33u:702: p.54.3/.āditya udayati ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ caturojā nāma muhūrto
T02divav33u:703: bhavati/ ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śveto nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:704: dvādaśa^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ samṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavati/ ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ śarapatho nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:705: p.55.1/.pañca^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām atisamṛddho nāma muhūrto bhavat/
T02divav33u:706: catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyām udgato nāma muhūrto bhavati/ tripauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sumukho nāma muhūrto bhavati/ sthite madhyāhne vajrako nāma muhūrto bhavati/ parivṛtte madhyāhne tripuruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ rohito nāma
T02divav33u:708: p.55.2/.catuḥ^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ balo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:709: pañca^pauruṣāyāṃ chayayaṃ vijayo nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ṣaṭpauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sarva^raso nāma muhūrtaḥ/ dvādaśa^paruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ vasur nāma muhūrtaḥ/
T02divav33u:710: ṣaṣṭipauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ sundaro nāma muhūrtaḥ/ avataramāṇa āditye ṣaṇṇavati^pauruṣāyāṃ chāyāyāṃ parabhayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:712: p.55.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin rātryā muhūrtāni vyākhyāsyāmi/astaṃgata āditye raudro nāma muhūrtaḥ/ tatas tārāvacaro nāma
T02divav33u:713: muhūrtaḥ/ saṃyamo nāma muhūrtaḥ (56) sāṃpraiyako nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ananto nāma muhūrtaḥ/ gardabhā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ rākṣaso nāma muhūrtaḥ/ sthite
T02divav33u:714: +ardharātre +avayavo nāma muhūrtaḥ/ atikrānte +ardharātre brahmā nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ditir nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ātapāgnir nāma muhūrta/ abhijin nāma muhūrtaḥ/ ity etāni rātrer
T02divav33u:715: muhūrtanāmāni/ iti bhoḥ puṣkarasārin imāni triśan muhūrtāni yair
T02divav33u:718: tatra triṃśatitamo bhāgo muhūrtasya lavaḥ/ ṣaṣṭitamo bhāgo lavasya kṣaṇaḥ/ viṃśatyuttarabhāgaśataṃ kṣaṇasya tatkṣaṇaḥ/ tad yathā striyā nātidīrghahrasvaḥ kartinyāḥ sūtrodyāmaḥ/ evaṃ dīrghas tatkṣaṇaḥḥ/ viṃśatyuttarakṣaṇaśataṃ tatkṣaṇasyaikaḥ kṣaṇaḥ/ ṣaṣṭikṣaṇā eko lavaḥ/ triṃśallavā eko muhūrtaḥ/
T02divav33u:719: etena kramayogena triṃśan^muhūrtam ekam aho^rātraṃ/ triṃśad ahorātrāṇy eko māsaḥ/
T02divav33u:720: dvādaśa^māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ/ caturojāḥ śvetaḥ samṛddhaḥ śarapatho
T02divav33u:721: +atisamṛddha udgataḥ (57) sumukho vajrako rohito balo vijayaḥ sarva^raso
T02divav33u:722: vasuḥ sundaraḥ para^bhayaḥ/ raudras tārāvacaraḥ saṃyamaḥ sāṃpraiyako
T02divav33u:723: +annanto gardabho rākṣaso +avayavo brahmā ditir arko vidhamano āgneya ātapāgnir abhijit/
T02divav33u:726: p.57.2ab/.kālotpattim api te brāhmaṇa vakṣyāmi śṛṇu/
T02divav33u:727: p.57.2cd/.kālasya kiṃ pramāṇam iti tad ucyate/
T02divav33u:728: p.57.3/.dvāvakṣinimeṣāv eko lavaḥ/ asṭau lavā ekā kāṣṭhā/ ṣoḍaśakāṣṭhā ekā kalā/ kalānāṃ triṃśadeko nāḍikā/ tatra dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/
T02divav33u:729: p.57.4/.nāḍikāyāḥ punaḥ kiṃ pramāṇaṃ/ tad ucyate/
T02divav33u:730: p.57.5/.droṇaṃ salilasyaikaṃ/ taddharaṇato dve palaśate bhavataḥ/
T02divav33u:731: nālikāchidrasya kiṃ pramāṇaṃ/ suvarṇa^mātraṃ/ upari catur^aṅgulā
T02divav33u:732: suvarṇa^śalākā kartavyā/ (58) vṛttaparimaṇḍalā samāntāc caturasrā āyatā/
T02divav33u:733: yadā ca^evaṃ śīryeta tat toyaṃ ghaṭasya tadaikā nāḍikā/ etena nālikāpramāṇena vibhakte dve nāḍika eko muhūrtaḥ/ etena bho brāhmaṇa
T02divav33u:734: triṃśan muhūrtāḥ/ yai rātridivasā anumīyanta iti/
T02divav33u:735: p.58.1/.tataḥ ṣoḍaśa nimeṣā ekā kāṣṭhā/ ṣoḍaśa kāṣṭhā ekā kalā/ ṣaṣṭikalā eko muhūrtaḥ/ triṃśan^muhūrtā ekam ahorātram/ triṃśad ahorātrāṇy eko
T02divav33u:738: śata^sahasrāṇi aṣṭāśīti^sahasrāṇi sa evaṃ māpitaḥ/ tac ca brāhmaṇa
T02divav33u:741: p.58.3/.sṛṇu brāhmaṇa krośayojanānām utpattiṃ/ sapta paramāṇava eko +aṇur
T02divav33u:742: bhavati/ saptāṇavaḥ sarva^sūkṣmaṃ dṛsyate/ tad ekaṃ vātāyanarajaḥ/
T02divav33u:743: vātāyanarajāṃsi sapta, śaśa^karajaḥ/ sapta śaśa^karajāṃsy eḍa^karajaḥ/
T02divav33u:744: sapta eḍa^karajāṃśyekaṃ gorajaḥ/ saptagorajāṃsy ekā yūkā/ saptayūkā ekā likṣā/ saptalikṣā eko yavaḥ/ sapta yavā ekāṅguliḥ/ dvādaśāṅgulayo
T02divav33u:746: dve vitastī eko hastaḥ/ catvāro hastā ekaṃ dhanuḥ/ dhanuḥ^sahasram ekaḥ
T02divav33u:747: krośaḥ/ catvāraḥ krośā eko māgadhayojanaḥ/ yojanasya pramāṇaṃ piṇḍitāṃ/
T02divav33u:749: caikonatriṃśatkoṭi^sahasrāṇi dvādaśa ca śata^sahasrāṇi/ evaṃ māpitaṃ yojanam iti/
T02divav33u:750: p.59.2/.śṛṇu brāhmaṇa suvarṇasya parimāṇotpattiṃ/ tatkathayatu bhavān/
T02divav33u:751: p.59.3/.dvādaśa yavā māṣakaḥ/ ṣoḍaśa māsakā ekaḥ karṣaḥ/suvarṇasya
T02divav33u:752: parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitam iti/ dve koṭī pañca^viṃśatiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāny
T02divav33u:753: aṣṭau ca paramāṇavaḥ/ evaṃ māpitā brāhmaṇa suvarṇasya parimāṇa^utpattiḥ/
T02divav33u:754: p.59.4/.śṛṇu brāhmaṇa palapramāṇaṃ/ catuḥṣaṣṭi^māṣakāḥ palaṃ māgadhakaṃ/
T02divav33u:755: māgadhakayā tulayā palasya parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitaṃ/ paramāṇūnām aṣṭakoṭayaḥ saptacatvāriṃśac ca śata^sahasrāṇi sapta ca sahasrāṇi dve śate +aśītiś ca
T02divav33u:756: paramāṇavaḥ/ evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa palasya parimāṇam iti/
T02divav33u:758: māgadhakaḥ/ prasthaḥ/ tat rasa^parimāṇaṃ/ māgadhakayā tulayā prasthāsya
T02divav33u:759: parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitaṃ/ dve koṭiśate tisraś ca koṭaya ekonatiṃśac ca
T02divav33u:760: śata^sahasrāṇi catuḥsaptati (60) sahasrāṇi sapta ca śatāni viṃśatiś ca
T02divav33u:761: paramāṇavaḥ/ evaṃ māpitā brāhmaṇa rasa^mānasya^utpattir iti/
T02divav33u:763: eka^karṣeṇonāni māgadhaḥ prasthaḥ/ māpitaṃ dhānya^parimāṇaṃ/ māgadhakayā tulayā prasthasya parimāṇaṃ piṇḍitaṃ/ koṭiśatam aṣṭapañcāśac ca koṭayo dvir aśītiś ca śata sahasrāṇi eka^ṣaṣṭiś ca sahasrāṇi pañca^śatāni triṃśac ca paramāṇavaḥ/ evaṃ māpitaṃ brāhmaṇa dhānyasya parimāṇam iti/
T02divav33u:765: p.60.2/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ atha khalu bho brāhmaṇa nakṣatra^vyākaranaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac
T02divav33u:767: p.61.1/.kṛttikāsu jāto mānavo yaśasvī bhavati/ rohiṇyāṃ jātaḥ subhago
T02divav33u:768: bhavati bhogavāṃś ca/ mṛgaśirasi jāto yuddhārthī bhavati/ ārdrāyāṃ jāta utso +anna^pānānāṃ bhavati/ punarvasau jātaḥ kṛṣimān bhavati gorakṣaś ca/
T02divav33u:769: puṣye jātaḥ śīlavān bhavati/ aśleṣāyāṃ jātaḥ kāmuko bhavati/ maghāyāṃ jāto matimān bhavati, mahā^ātmā ca/ pūrvaphalgunyāṃ jāto +alpa^ayuṣko
T02divav33u:770: bhavati/ uttaraphalgunyāṃ jāta upavāsaśīlo bhavati, svargaparāyaṇaś ca/
T02divav33u:771: haste jātaś cauro bhavati/ citrāyāṃ jāto nṛtyagītakuśalo bhavati,
T02divav33u:772: ābharaṇa^vidhijñaś ca/ svātyāṃ jāto gaṇako bhavati, gaṇaka^mahāmātro vā/
T02divav33u:773: viśākhāyāṃ jāto rāja^bhaṭo bhavati/ anurādhāyāṃ jāto vāṇijako bhavati
T02divav33u:774: sārthikaḥ/ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ jāto +alpa^ayuṣko bhavati, alpa^bhogaś ca/ mūle jātaḥ putravān bhavati, yaśasvī ca/ pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto yogācāro bhavati/
T02divav33u:775: uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ jāto bhakteśvaraḥ kulīnaś ca bhavati/ abhijiti jātaḥ kīrtimān puruṣo bhavati/ śravaṇe jāto (62) rāja^pūjito bhavati/
T02divav33u:776: dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ jāto dhanāḍhyo bhavati/ śatabhiṣāyāṃ jāto mūliko bhavati/
T02divav33u:777: pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ jātaś caura^senāpatir bhavati/ uttarabhādrapadāyāṃ jāto gandhiko bhavati,
T02divav33u:778: gandharvaś ca/ revatyāṃ jāto nāviko bhavati/ aśvinyāṃ jāto +aśvavāṇijako
T02divav33u:779: bhavati/ bharaṇyāṃ jāto vadhyaghātako bhavati/ ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin
T02divav33u:782: p.62.1/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ /
T02divav33u:784: p.62.2ab/.kṛttikāsu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
T02divav33u:786: p.62.3ab/.rohiṇyāṃ tu niviṣṭaṃ vai nagaraṃ tad vinirdiśet/
T02divav33u:789: p.62.4ab/.mṛgaśīrṣe niviṣṭaṃ tu strībhir gobhir dhanais tathā/
T02divav33u:790: p.62.4cd/.mālyabhogaiś ca saṅkīrṇam adbhutaiś ca puraskṛtaṃ//
T02divav33u:793: p.63.2ab/.punarvasau niviṣṭe tu nagaraṃ dīpyate śriyā/
T02divav33u:795: p.63.3ab/.srīmatpuṣye niviṣṭe tu prajā duṣṭā prasīdati/
T02divav33u:796: p.63.3cd/.yuktāḥ śriyā ca dharmiṣṭhās tathiva cirajīvinaḥ//
T02divav33u:798: p.63.4cd/.vanaspatis tathā kṣipraṃ puṣyet tatra punaḥ punaḥ//
T02divav33u:801: p.63.6ab/.maghāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
T02divav33u:803: p.64.1ab/.phalgunyāṃ tu striyo mālyaṃ bhojanācchādanaṃ śubhaṃ/
T02divav33u:805: p.64.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ dhānyāni ca dhanāni ca/
T02divav33u:806: p.64.2cd/.mūrkhā janā jitāḥ strībhir niviṣṭe nagare bhavet//
T02divav33u:807: p.64.3ab/.haste ca viniviṣṭe tu vidyāvanto mahā^dhanāḥ/
T02divav33u:808: p.64.3cd/.parasparaṃ ca rucitaṃ śayanaṃ nagare bhavet//
T02divav33u:809: p.64.4ab/.citrāyāṃ ca niviṣṭe tu strī^jitāḥ sarva^mānavāḥ/
T02divav33u:810: p.64.4cd/.śrīmat^kāntaṃ ca nagaraṃ jvalantaṃ tad vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:812: p.64.5cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca prabhūtā nagare bhavet//
T02divav33u:813: p.64.6ab/.viśākhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ jvalati śriyā/
T02divav33u:822: p.65.3cd/.lubdhāḥ krūrāś ca mūrkhāś ca nivasanti narādhamāḥ//
T02divav33u:825: p.65.5ab/.abhijiti niviṣṭe tu nagare tatra moditāḥ/
T02divav33u:829: p.65.7ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ niviṣṭaṃ tu strī^jitaṃ puram ādiśet/
T02divav33u:836: p.66.2cd/.pūrṇaṃ ca dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ ratnāḍhyaṃ ca vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:837: p.66.3ab/.pure niviṣṭe raivatyāṃ sundarī janatā bhavet/
T02divav33u:839: p.66.4ab/.aśvinyāṃ viniviṣṭaṃ tu nagaraṃ śivam ādiśet/
T02divav33u:843: p.66.6ab/.purāṇi rāṣṭraṇi tathā gṛhāṇi nakṣatra^yogaṃ prasamīkṣya vidvān/
T02divav33u:844: p.66.6cd/.iṣṭe praśaste ca niveśayet tu pūrve ca janme +adhigataṃ
T02divav33u:848: p.67.2/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ(28Åh) nakṣatrāṇāṃ
T02divav33u:853: sarva^prajāyāḥ/ mṛgaśirā videhānāṃ rājopasevakānāṃ ca/ evam ārdrā kṣatriyāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ ca/ punarvasuḥ sauparṇānāṃ/ puṣya^nakṣatraṃ
T02divav33u:854: sarveṣām avadāta^vadāta^vasanānāṃ/ rāja^padasevakānāṃ ca/ aśleṣā nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ ca/ maghā^nakṣatraṃ gauḍikānāṃ/ pūrvaphalgunī caurāṇāṃ/
T02divav33u:856: avantīnāṃ/ hastā saurāṣṭrikāṇāṃ/ citrā pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ/ svātī sarveṣāṃ pravrajyāsamāpannānāṃ/ viśākhā audakānāṃ/ anurādhā vāṇijakānāṃ śākaṭikānāṃ
T02divav33u:857: ca/ jyeṣṭhā dauvālikānāṃ/ (68) mūlā pathikānāṃ/ pūrvāṣāḍhā vāhlīkānāṃ ca/
T02divav33u:858: uttarāṣāḍhā kāmbojānāṃ/ abhijit sarveṣāṃ dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ tāmraparṇikānāṃ
T02divav33u:859: ca/ śravaṇā ghādakānāṃ caurāṇāṃ ca/ dhaniṣṭhā kuru^pāñcālānāṃ/
T02divav33u:860: śatabhiṣā maulikānām ārthavaṇikānāṃ ca/ pūrvabhādrapadā gandhikānāṃ yavana^kāmbojānāṃ ca/ uttarabhādrapadā gandharvāṇāṃ/ revatī nāvikānāṃ ca/
T02divav33u:861: aśvinī aśvavāṇijānāṃ ca/ bharaṇī bhadrapadakarmaṇāṃ bhadrakāyākānāṃ ca/
T02divav33u:865: p.68.2/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko ṛtuvarṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ tad ahaṃ vakṣye
T02divav33u:867: p.68.3/.kṛttikāsu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:869: śravaṇāyuktaproṣṭhapadāyām agnodako varṣārātro bhavati/ paścād varṣaṃ saṃjanayati/ hemante grīṣme grīṇi ca^atra (69) bhaya^pragrahāṇi bhavanti/
T02divav33u:870: agni^bhayaṃ śastra^bhayaṃ ca^udaka^bhayaṃ ca bhavati/ uktaṃ kṛttikāsu/
T02divav33u:871: p.69.1/.rohiṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:872: eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:873: parivarjayitavyāni/ eṣa ca varṣārātraḥ sāroparodhaḥ sasyaṃ ca saṃpādayati/
T02divav33u:874: dvau ca^atra rogau prabalau bhavataḥ/ kukṣirogaś cakṣūrogaś ca/
T02divav33u:875: caura^bahulāś ca^atra diśo bhavanti/ uktaṃ ca rohiṇyāṃ/
T02divav33u:876: p.69.2/.mṛgaśirasi grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:877: catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/ sāroparodho varṣārātraḥ/ paścād varṣaṃ saṃjanayati/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra (70) rājāno bhavanti/ kṣemiṇaḥ sunītikāś ca diśo bhavanti/ muditāś ca^atra janapadā bhavanti/ uktaṃ
T02divav33u:879: p.70.1/.ārdrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭādaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:880: parivarjayitavyāni/ nidhayaś ca rakṣayitavyāḥ/ caura^bahulāś ca^atra diśo
T02divav33u:881: bhavanti/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ trayaś ca^atra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti/ jvaraḥ śvāso galagrahaś ca/ bālānāṃ dārakadārikāṇāṃ ca maraṇaṃ
T02divav33u:883: p.70.2/.punarvasau grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati/
T02divav33u:884: navatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ mahā^meghān utpādayati/ āṣāḍhāyāṃ praviṣṭāyāṃ mṛdūni pravarṣati/ anantaraṃ ca nirantareṇa pravarṣati/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ punarvasau/
T02divav33u:885: p.71.1/.puṣye grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati dvātriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ atra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:886: parivarjayitavyāni/ vyaktaṃ pradhāna^varṣāṇi bhavanti/ sasyaṃ ca niṣpādayati/ brāhmaṇa^kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca virodho bhavati/ daṃṣṭriṇaś ca^atra
T02divav33u:887: prabalā bhavanti/ tatra trayo rogāś ca bhavanti/ gaṇḍāḥ piṭakāḥ pāmāni ca
T02divav33u:889: p.71.2/.aśleṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:890: eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:891: parivarjayitavyāni/ viṣamāś ca vāyavo vānti/ saṃvignāś ca^atra jñānino rājānaś ca bhavanti/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/ jāyāpatikānāṃ rājāmātyānāṃ ca virodho bhavati/ uktam aśleṣāyāṃ/
T02divav33u:892: p.71.3/.maghāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:893: catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni (72) pravarṣati/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/
T02divav33u:894: mṛgapakṣipaśumanuṣyāṇāṃ ca^atra garbhā vinaśyanti/ jana^maraṇaṃ ca^atra
T02divav33u:896: p.72.1/.pūrvaphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:897: catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/ tac ca sasyaṃ janayitvā para^cakra^pīḍitā manuṣyā na sukhenopabhuñjate/
T02divav33u:898: paśūnāṃ maṇuṣyāṇāṃ ca^atra garbhāḥ sukhino bhavanti/ uktaṃ
T02divav33u:900: p.72.2/.uttaraphalgunyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni ca sampādayati/
T02divav33u:901: nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra rājāno bhavanti/ brahma^kṣatriyayoś ca virodho bhavati/ kṣipraṃ ca anītikāḥ prajā vinaśyanti/ ca^uktam uttaraphalgunyāṃ/
T02divav33u:902: p.72.3/.haste grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ekonapañcāśadāḍhakāni (73) pravarṣati/ devaś ca tad yathā parikṣipati/
T02divav33u:903: patitāni ca sasyāni janasyārasāgrāṇi anudagrāṇi alpa^sārāṇy alpodakāni/
T02divav33u:905: p.73.1/.citrāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:906: catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/ sāroparodhas tataḥ paścād varṣaṃ
T02divav33u:907: saṃjanayati/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ muditāś ca^atra janapadā
T02divav33u:909: p.73.2/.svātyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:910: eka^viṃśatyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ caurāś
T02divav33u:912: p.73.3/.viśākhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aśītyāḍhakāni (74) pravarṣati/ eṣā varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/
T02divav33u:913: rājānaś ca^atra chidra^yuktā bhavanti/ agnidāhāś ca^atra prabalā bhavanti/
T02divav33u:914: daṃṣṭriṇaś ca^atra balavanto +api kṣayaṃ gacchanti/ uktaṃ viśākhāyāṃ/
T02divav33u:915: p.74.1/.anurādhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ eṣo varṣaḥ sasyaṃ sampādayati/ mitrāṇi ca^atra
T02divav33u:917: p.74.2/.jyeṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ tatra kṛṣi^karmān tāni pratisaṃhartavyāni/
T02divav33u:919: pratisaṃhartavyāḥ/ lāṅgalāni pratisaṃhartavyāni/ avaśyam anena janapadena
T02divav33u:920: vinaṣṭavyaṃ bhavati/ para^cakra^pīḍito bhavati/ uktaṃ jyeṣṭhāyāṃ/
T02divav33u:921: p.74.3/.mūle grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni (75) pravarṣati/ eṣo varṣaḥ sasyaṃ sampādayati/
T02divav33u:922: caura^bahulāś ca^atra diśo bhavanti/ trayaś ca^atra vyādhayo balavanto bhavanti/ vāta^gaṇḍaḥ pārśvaśūlam akṣirogaś ca/ puṣpa^phalāni ca^atra
T02divav33u:923: samṛddhāni bhavanti/ nikṣiptaśastrāś ca^atra rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ mūle/
T02divav33u:924: p.75.1/.pūrvasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ dvau ca^atra grāhau bhavataḥ /
T02divav33u:925: proṣṭhapade vā +aśvayujau vā pakṣe/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/
T02divav33u:926: dvau ca^atra rogau prabalau bhavataḥ/ kukṣirogo +akṣirogaś ca /
T02divav33u:929: p.75.2/.uttarasyām āṣāḍhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/ tatra sthalāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/
T02divav33u:930: nimnāni parivarjayitavyāni/ mahā^srotāṃsi ca^atra pravahanti/ agrodakā
T02divav33u:931: ca^atra varṣā bhavati/ sarva^sasyāni niṣpādayati/ trayaś ca^atra rogāḥ prabalā bhavanti/ gaṇḍaḥ kacchaḥ kaṇṭha^roga iti/ uktam uttarāṣāḍhāyām//
T02divav33u:932: p.75.3/.abhijiti grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra pravarṣati
T02divav33u:933: catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhākāni (76) pravarṣati/ maṇḍalavarṣaṃ ca devaḥ pravarṣati/
T02divav33u:934: paścād varṣaḥ sasyaṃ janayati/ audakānāṃ bhūtānām utsargo bhavati/ uktam
T02divav33u:936: p.76.1/.śravaṇe tu grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuṣṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ maṇḍalavarṣaṃ ca devo varṣati/ paścād varṣā sasyaṃ sampādayati/ audakānāṃ bhūtānām utsargo bhavati/ vyādhi^bahulāś ca narā bhavanti/ rājānaś ca tīvra^daṇḍā bhavanti/ uktaṃ śravaṇe/
T02divav33u:937: p.76.2/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:938: eka^pañcāśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ vibhaktāś ca^atra varṣā bhavanti/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni parivarjayitavyāni/ durmukho rātrau varṣo bhavati/ sasyāni sampādayati/ ekaś ca^atra rogo bhavati/
T02divav33u:939: gaṇḍa^vikāraḥ/ śastra^samādānāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ uktaṃ dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ/
T02divav33u:940: p.76.3/.śatabhiṣāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati ṣoḍaśāḍhakāni (77) pravarṣati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:941: parivarjayitavyāni/ eṣo varṣaḥ sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/ cakra^samārūḍhā
T02divav33u:942: janapadā bhavanti/ manuṣyā dārakadārikāś ca skandhe kṛtvā deśa^antaraṃ
T02divav33u:944: p.77.1/.pūrvasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati catuḥṣaṣṭy^āḍhakāni pravarṣati/ varṣāmukhe ca^atra ekonaviṃśati rātriko +avagraho bhavati/ puṣpa^sasyaṃ ca nāśayati/ etāś ca varṣā
T02divav33u:945: bahu^caurā bhavanti/ dvau ca^atra mahā^vyādhī bhavataḥ/ prathamaṃ pittatāpajvaro bhavati/ paścād balavān mahā^graho bhavati/ martyānāṃ nārīṇāṃ ca maraṇaṃ bhavati/ uktaṃ pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ/
T02divav33u:946: p.77.2/.uttarasyāṃ bhādrapadāyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/ mahā^srotāṃsi pravahanti/
T02divav33u:947: grāma^nagara^nigamāḥ srotasā uhyante/ catvāraś ca^atra vyādhayaḥ prabalā bhavanti/ tad yathā kukṣirogo +akṣirogaḥ (78) kāśo jvaraś ceti/ bālānāṃ dārakadārikāṇāṃ maraṇāṃ bhavati/ atra sthalāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ nimnāni
T02divav33u:948: parivarjayitavyāni/ etāś ca varṣāḥ puṣpāṇi phalāni ca sampādayanti/ uktam
T02divav33u:950: p.78.1/.revatyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati
T02divav33u:951: eka^ṣaṣṭyāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni
T02divav33u:952: parivarjayitavyāni/ eṣā paribhuñjate/ nikṣiptaśastra^daṇḍāś ca rājāno bhavanti/ anudvignāś ca janapadā bhavanti/ udvignāś ca dānapatayo
T02divav33u:953: bhavanti/ deva^nakṣatra^samāyuktāś ca janapadā bhavanti/ mitrāṇi samāyuktāni bhavanti/
T02divav33u:955: p.78.2/.aśvinyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati aṣṭacatvāriṃśadāḍhakāni pravarṣati/ yac ca madhye varṣā bhavati/ tatra nimnāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ sthalāni parivarjayitavyāni/ eṣā varṣā sarva^sasyāni sampādayati/ (79) bhaya^samāyuktāś ca^atra janapadā
T02divav33u:956: bhavanti/ caurāś ca prabalā bhavanti/ uktam aśvinyāṃ/
T02divav33u:957: p.79.1/.bharaṇyāṃ grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse yady atra devaḥ pravarṣati pūrṇam āḍhakaśataṃ pravarṣati/ tatra sthalāni kṛṣi^kartavyāni/ nimnāni
T02divav33u:958: parivarjayitavyāni/ durbhikṣas ca^atra bhavati/ jarāmaraṇaṃ janānāṃ bhavati/ rājānaś ca^atra anyonyaghātakā bhavanti/ putrapautrāṇāṃ ca kalaho
T02divav33u:962: p.79.3/.amīṣāṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aśṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ rāhugrahe phalavipākaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:963: p.79.4./kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin yadi candra^graho bhavati kaliṅgamagadhānām upapīḍā bhavati/ yadi rohiṇyāṃ candra^graho bhavati prajānām upapīḍā bhavati/ yadi mṛgaśirasi candra^graho bhavati videhānāṃ janapadānām upapīḍā bhavati/ rājopasevakanāṃ ca/ evam ārdrāyāṃ punarvasau
T02divav33u:964: puṣye ca vaktavyaṃ/ aśleṣāyāṃ yadi candra^graho bhavati nāgānāṃ haimavatānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/ yadi maghāsu candra^graho bhavati gauḍikānām upapīḍā
T02divav33u:965: bhavati/ yadi pūrvaphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate caurāṇām upapīḍā (80) bhavati/
T02divav33u:966: yady uttaraphalgunyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnām upapīḍā bhavati/ yadi hasteṣu somo gṛhyate saurāṣṭrikāṇām upapīḍā bhavati/ yadi citrāyāṃ somo
T02divav33u:967: gṛhyate pakṣiṇāṃ dvipadānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/ yadi svātyāṃ somo gṛhyate sarveṣāṃ pravrajyāsamāpannānām upapīḍā bhavati/ yady anurādhāsu somo
T02divav33u:968: gṛhyate vaṇijānām upapīḍā bhavati śākaṭikānāṃ ca/ yadi jyeṣṭhāyāṃ somo
T02divav33u:969: gṛhyate dauvālikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yadi mūle somo gṛhyate +adhvagānāṃ pīḍā
T02divav33u:970: bhavati/ yadi pūrvāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate +avantīnāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yady uttarāṣāḍhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kāmbojakānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ bāhlīkānāṃ ca/
T02divav33u:971: yady abhijiti somo gṛhyate dakṣiṇāpathikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ tāmraparṇikānāṃ
T02divav33u:972: ca/ yadi śravaṇeṣu somo gṛhyate caurāṇāṃ ghātakānāṃ ca^upapīḍā bhavati/
T02divav33u:973: yadi dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ somo gṛhyate kurupāñcālanāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yadi śatabhiṣāyāṃ somo gṛhyate maulikānām ātharvaṇikānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/ yadi pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate gāndhikānāṃ yavana^kāmbojakānāṃ ca pīḍā bhavati/ yady uttarabhādrapadāyāṃ somo gṛhyate (81) gandharvāṇāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yadi revatyāṃ somo gṛhyate nāvikānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yady aścviṇijānāṃ pīḍā bhavati/ yadi bharaṇyāṃ somo gṛhyate bharukacchānāṃ pīḍā
T02divav33u:975: p.81.1/.evaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatre candra^graho bhavati tasya tasya
T02divav33u:976: deśasya pīḍā bhavati/ ity ukto rāhugrahaphalavipākādhyāyaḥ/
T02divav33u:980: p.81.3cd/.ṣaṭtārāṃ kṛttikāṃ vidyād āśrayaṃ tāsu kārayet/
T02divav33u:982: p.81.4ab/.sarpirviloḍayet tatra gavāṃ veśma ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:983: p.81.4cd/.ajaiḍakāś ca kretavyā gavāṃ ca vṛṣam utsṛjet//
T02divav33u:984: p.81.5ab/.aśmasāramayaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ sarvam atra tu kārayet/
T02divav33u:988: p.82.1ab/.gṛhaṃ ca māpayet atra tathā +avāsaṃ prakalpayet/
T02divav33u:989: p.82.1cd/.navaṃ ca chādayed vastraṃ krayaṇaṃ na^atra kārayet//
T02divav33u:992: p.82.3ab/.śastrāṇi kṣurakarmāṇi sarvāṇy atra tu kārayet/
T02divav33u:993: p.82.3cd/.tejasāni ca bhāṇḍāni kārayec ca krīṇīta ca//
T02divav33u:994: p.82.4ab/.āyuṣyaṃ ca śiraḥ^snānāṃ strīṇāṃ viṣkambhaṇāni ca/
T02divav33u:995: p.82.4cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ced devasya na^atra vairaṃ praśāmyati//
T02divav33u:997: p.82.5cd/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca yajña^śīlo +atra jāyate//kṛttikāsu
T02divav33u:999: p.82.6cd/.kṣetravastuvihārāṃś ca navaṃ veśma ca kārayet//
T02divav33u:1000: p.82.7ab/.prayojayec cakrān vārān dāsāṃś ca^eva gṛhe paśūn/
T02divav33u:1002: p.83.1ab/.ṛṇaṃ na dadyāt tatra^eva vairam atra tu vardhate/
T02divav33u:1003: p.83.1cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ ca surāyogaṃ dvayam eva vivarjayet//
T02divav33u:1004: p.83.2ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate/
T02divav33u:1007: p.83.3ab/.saumyaṃ mṛgaśiro vidyād ṛju tisraś ca tārakāḥ/
T02divav33u:1008: p.83.3cd/.mṛdūni yāni karmāṇi tāni sarvāṇi kārayet/
T02divav33u:1009: p.83.3ef/.yāni karmāṇi rohiṇyāṃ tāni sarvāṇi kārayet//
T02divav33u:1010: p.83.3ab/.sakṣīrān vāpayed vṛkṣān bījāni kṣīravanti ca/
T02divav33u:1013: p.83.4cd/.uṣṭrāṃś ca balīvardāṃś ca damayed api kṛṣṭaye//
T02divav33u:1014: p.83.5ab/.ācchādayen navaṃ vāsaś ca^alaṅkāraṃ ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1015: p.83.5cd/.dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇy evātra kārayet//
T02divav33u:1016: p.83.6ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya suvṛṣṭiṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:1017: p.83.6cd/.svapnaśīlas tathā trāsī medhāvī sa ca jāyate//mṛgaśirasi//
T02divav33u:1018: p.84.1ab/.ārdrāyāṃ mṛgayed arthān bhadraṃ karma ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1021: p.84.2cd/.ūheta(ūhayet) prathamāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ vikrīṇīyāc ca na^atra gāṃ/
T02divav33u:1026: p.84.4ab/.punarvasau tu yukte +atra kuryād vai vrata^dhāraṇaṃ/
T02divav33u:1029: p.84.5cd/.punaḥ punar yadīccheta tatra karmāṇi kārayet//
T02divav33u:1030: p.85.1ab/.cikitsanaṃ na kurvīta yadīcchen na parābhavaṃ/
T02divav33u:1031: p.85.1cd/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya janma ca^atra praśasyate//
T02divav33u:1032: p.85.2ab/.alīlaś ca^atra jāyeta strī^lolaś ca^api mānavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1034: p.85.3ab/.dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ puṣye nityaṃ prayojayet/
T02divav33u:1037: p.85.4cd/.rājānam abhipiñced ca; alaṃkuryāt svakāṃ tanu//
T02divav33u:1039: p.85.5cd/.purohitaṃ ca kurvīta dhvaja^agraṃ ca prakārayet//
T02divav33u:1041: p.85.6cd/.na ca rogo na cauraś ca kṣemaṃ ca^atra sadā bhavet//
T02divav33u:1043: p.85.7cd/.vaireṇātropanāhaiś ca ye janās tān vivarjayet/
T02divav33u:1044: p.85.7ef/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca mahā^bhogaḥ prajāyate//puṣye//
T02divav33u:1045: p.86.1ab/.sidhyate dāruṇaṃ karma; aśleṣāyāṃ ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1049: p.86.2ef/.krodhanaḥ svapnaśīlaś ca kuhakaś ca^atra jāyate//aśleṣāyāṃ//
T02divav33u:1055: p.86.5cd/.suhṛc ca dvārikaś ca^eva rasa^kāmaś ca jāyate/
T02divav33u:1057: p.86.6ab/.saṃgrāmaṃ jīyate tatra yadi pūrvaṃ pravartate/
T02divav33u:1058: p.86.6cd/.dāruṇāni ca karmāṇi tāni vidvān vivarjayet//maghāsu//
T02divav33u:1063: p.87.3ab/.veśmāni kārayet tatra vaśya(vaiśya)m atra prayojayet/
T02divav33u:1064: p.87.3cd/.bhāgaṃ ye ca^upajīvanti teṣāṃ karma prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1067: p.87.4ef/.naṣṭaṃ viddhaṃ kṛtaṃ ca^api na tad asti^iti
T02divav33u:1070: p.87.5cd/.medhāvī darśanīyaś ca yaśasvī ca^atra jāyate//
T02divav33u:1071: p.87.6ab/.athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā sarvam asti^iti nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:1077: p.88.2cd/.cauryaṃ ca sidhyate tatra tac ca vidvān vivarjayet//
T02divav33u:1078: p.88.3ab/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya varṣā viśrāvaṇī bhavet/
T02divav33u:1079: p.88.3cd/.athātra jātaṃ jānīyāc chūraṃ cauraṃ vicakṣaṇaṃ/
T02divav33u:1081: p.88.4ab/.citrāyām āhataṃ vastraṃ bhūṣaṇāni ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1082: p.88.4cd/.rājānaṃ bhūṣitaṃ paśyet senāvyūhaṃ ca darśayet//
T02divav33u:1083: p.88.5ab/.hiraṇyaṃ rajataṃ dravyaṃ nagarāṇi ca māpayet/
T02divav33u:1085: p.88.6ab/.gaṇakānāṃ ca vidyāṃ ca vādyaṃ nartanagāyanaṃ/
T02divav33u:1086: p.88.6cd/.pūrvikāṃ rūpakārāṃś ca rathakārāṃś ca śikṣayet/
T02divav33u:1087: p.88.6ef/.citra^karāṃś ca lekhakān pustakarma ca kārayet//
T02divav33u:1090: p.89.2ab/.mṛdu^śīlaś ca bhīruś ca calacittaḥ kutūhalī/
