T02divav33u:1091: p.89.2cd/.āyuṣmān subhagaś ca^eva strī^lolaś ca^atra jāyate//citrāyāṃ//
T02divav33u:1092: p.89.3ab/.svātyāṃ prayojayed yodhān aśvān aśvatarīṃ kharān/
T02divav33u:1095: p.89.4cd/.āvāhaṃś ca vivāhaṃś ca sauhṛdyaṃ ca^atra kārayet//
T02divav33u:1096: p.89.5ab/.nirvāsanam amitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ na pravased gṛhāt/
T02divav33u:1101: p.89.7ab/.śālayas tila^māṣāś ca ye ca vṛkṣāḥ suśākhinaḥ/
T02divav33u:1102: p.90.1ab/.ropayet tān viśākhāsu gṛhakarma ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1103: p.90.1cd/.śiraḥ^snānāni kurvīta medhyaṃ prāyaś ca kārayet//
T02divav33u:1105: p.90.2cd/.manasvī darśanīyaś ca medhāvī ca^atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1107: p.90.3ab/.anurādhāsu kurvīta mitraiḥ sadbhiś ca saṅgatiṃ/
T02divav33u:1109: p.90.4ab/.kṣauraṃ ca kārayet atra śastra^karmāṇi kārayet/
T02divav33u:1110: p.90.4cd/.saṃyuktāntaprayogāṃś ca sandhiṃ kuryāc ca nityaśaḥ/
T02divav33u:1115: p.90.6cd/.nagaraṃ nigamaṃ grāmaṃ māpayed ārabheta ca/
T02divav33u:1116: p.90.6ef/.kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca sarvakarmāṇi kārayet//
T02divav33u:1118: p.91.1cd/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca vidvatsu ca kutūhalī//
T02divav33u:1119: p.91.2ab/.prāsādam ārohec ca^atra gajam aśvaṃ rathaṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:1122: p.91.3cd/.dāruṇāny atra sidhyanti tāni vidvān vivarjayet/
T02divav33u:1125: p.91.4cd/.sūlādyāni ca sarvāṇi bījāny atra prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1126: p.91.5ab/.ṛṇaṃ vai yat purāṇaṃ syād artho ca^asyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ/
T02divav33u:1127: p.91.5cd/.mūle siddhartham ārabhyaṃ tathā sarvaṃ varāṅgakaṃ//
T02divav33u:1129: p.91.6cd/.nadīṣu snapanaṃ ca^eva mūle sarvān prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1130: p.92.1ab/.dāruṇāny atra sidhyanti maṅgalāni ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1131: p.92.1cd/.kiṇvayogān surāyogān na kuryāc chatrubhiḥ saha//
T02divav33u:1132: p.92.2ab/.dhana^vān bahu^putraś ca mūlavān atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1133: p.92.2cd/.athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā naitad asti^iti nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:1135: p.92.3ab/.āṣāḍhāyāṃ ca pūrvasyāṃ saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca/
T02divav33u:1137: p.92.4ab/.utpādyāni ca puṣpāṇi tathā mūlaphalāni ca/
T02divav33u:1138: p.92.4cd/.ārāmāṃś ca prakurvīta bhaikṣakāṃś ca prayojayet/
T02divav33u:1139: p.92.4ef/.yāni ca^ugrāṇi karmāṇi sidhyanty atra tu tāni ca//
T02divav33u:1140: p.92.5ab/.naṣṭaṃ paryupataptaṃ vā naitad asti^iti nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:1144: p.93.1ab/.na saṃhared bhedayed vā vāstukarma na sidhyati/
T02divav33u:1146: p.93.1c/.śreṇavindhaṃ ca rājā nu samayaṃ ca^atra kārayet//
T02divav33u:1147: p.93.2ab/.pragalbhaś ca sabhāśīlaḥ kṛtī ca^atra prajāyate/
T02divav33u:1149: p.93.3ab/.naṣṭaṃ vā^apy upataptaṃ vā; astīty evaṃ vinirdiśet/
T02divav33u:1151: p.93.4/.abhijiti na kurvīta brahma^devasya hy arcanaṃ//abhijiti//
T02divav33u:1152: p.93.5ab/.śravaṇe na ca kurvīta sarvāḥ saṃgrāmikāḥ kriyāḥ/
T02divav33u:1153: p.93.5cd/.gītaśikṣādhyayanaṃ ca na cireṇa hi sidhyati//
T02divav33u:1155: p.93.6cd/.dvijātīnāṃ tu karmāṇi sarvāṇy eva prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1156: p.94.7ab/.bali^kṛtyāni kurvīta darśayec ca balāny api/
T02divav33u:1159: p.94.8cd/.naṣṭaṃ ca labhyate tatra śravanasthe niśākare//śravaṇe//
T02divav33u:1163: p.94.10cd/.śreṣṭhinaṃ sthāpayed deśe gaṇādhyakṣaṃ gaṇeśv api//
T02divav33u:1164: p.94.11ab/.medhāvī ca yaśasvī ca mahā^bhogī mahā^dhanaḥ//
T02divav33u:1165: p.94.11cd/.bahv^apatyo mṛdur dānto mahā^ātmā ca^atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1166: p.94.11c/.pravarṣaṇaṃ ca devasya vidyāc ca^atra suvṛṣṭitāṃ//dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ//
T02divav33u:1168: p.94.12cd/.kīrtikarma ca kurvīta sidhyanty ātharvaṇāni ca//
T02divav33u:1169: p.94.13ab/.prasārayec ca paṇyāni śauṇḍikaṃ ca prayojayet/
T02divav33u:1170: p.94.13cd/.adadhiṃ khānāyet tatra tila^māṣāṃś ca vāpayet//
T02divav33u:1172: p.95.1cd/.ādeyaṃ ca tadā +adadyād vyayaṃ ca^atra na kārayet//
T02divav33u:1174: p.95.2cd/.bhiṣakkarma ca kurvīta bhaiṣajyāni ca saṃharet//
T02divav33u:1175: p.95.3ab/.nidhiṃ vā khānayet tatra nidadhyād api vā nidhiṃ/
T02divav33u:1176: p.95.3cd/.dhanaṃ ca^atra prayuñjīta bhiṣakkarma ca śikṣayet//
T02divav33u:1177: p.95.4ab/.athātra mṛgayen naṣṭaṃ labhyate tac cirād api/
T02divav33u:1178: p.95.4cd/.arogī krodhanaś ca^atra svapnaśīlaś ca jāyate/
T02divav33u:1186: p.96.1ab/.uttarasyāṃ tu kurvīta; āyuṣyaṃ puṣṭikarma ca/
T02divav33u:1187: p.96.1cd/.na ca dakṣinato gacchet puraṃ ca^atra pradāpayet//
T02divav33u:1188: p.96.2ab/.āyuṣmāṃś ca yaśasvī ca dhanavāṃś ca^atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1189: p.96.2cd/.atra^api triguṇaṃ vinded ādānaṃ yadi vā vyayaṃ/
T02divav33u:1192: p.96.3cd/.koṣṭha^āgārāṇi kurvīta kiṇvaṃ ca^atra na kārayet//
T02divav33u:1193: p.96.4ab/.surākarma ca kurvīta hiraṇyaṃ govrajāni ca/
T02divav33u:1194: p.96.4cd/.gosaṅghaṃ sthāpayec ca^atra gośālāṃ ca^atra kārayet/
T02divav33u:1195: p.96.4ef/.ācchādayen navaṃ vastraṃ hiraṇyam api dhārayet//
T02divav33u:1197: p.96.5cd/.jñātīnāṃ sevako nityaṃ dharma^jñaś ca^atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1199: p.97.1ab/.strī^puṃsam aśvinā yuñjyād aśvaśālāṃ ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1200: p.97.1cd/.aśvān prayojayed atra rathaṃ ca^atra prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1201: p.97.2ab/.ṛṇaḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo bījāny atra pravāpayet/
T02divav33u:1202: p.97.2cd/.yānāni ca hayān damyān dantinaś ca prayojayet//
T02divav33u:1203: p.97.3ab/.bhaiṣajyaṃ bhojayed atra bhiṣakkarma ca kārayet/
T02divav33u:1204: p.97.3cd/.medhāvī darśanīyaś ca rāja^yogyaś ca sampadā//
T02divav33u:1205: p.97.4ab/.arogo balavāṃc chūraḥ subhago hy atra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1208: p.97.5cd/.bhṛtyāṃś ca bhṛtakāṃś ca^api vṛṇuyād darśayet tathā//
T02divav33u:1209: p.97.6ab/.bhūtiṃ ca^upanayed atra bhāryāṃ ca na vivāhayet/
T02divav33u:1216: p.98.3ab/.teṣāṃ madhye yadā sarve śasyāny oṣadhayo +api ca/
T02divav33u:1217: p.98.3cd/.vanaspatayaś ca pīḍyante yatrāsau tiṣṭhate grahaḥ/
T02divav33u:1221: p.98.5/.catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi dhruvāṇi bhavanti tāni
T02divav33u:1222: vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chṛṇu/ tad yathā/ trīṇi uttarāṇi rohiṇī ca/ kṣeme
T02divav33u:1223: +adhyāvaset/ (99) bījāni ca^atra ropayed/ niveśataṃ ca^atra kalpayet/
T02divav33u:1224: rājānaṃ ca^abhiṣiñcayet/ yāni ca^anyāni uktāni karmāṇi tāni kārayet/
T02divav33u:1225: p.99.1ab/.atha naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ ca^api hṛtaṃ ca vā/
T02divav33u:1226: p.99.1cd/.evam abhinirdiṣṭāṃ vā svasti kṣipraṃ bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:1227: p.99.2ab/.athātra jāto dhanyo +asau vidyātmā ca yaśasvī ca/
T02divav33u:1229: p.99.3/.catvāri bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāṇi kṣiprāni bhavanti/ tad yathā puṣyo hastābhijid aśvino ceti/ eṣu kṣiprāṇi karmāṇi kārayec ca vicakṣaṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:1230: svādhyāyaṃ mantra^samārambhaṃ pravāsa^prasthānaṃ gāś ca turaṅgān apy atra yojayet/ dhūyāṇi yuktakarmāṇi ca^oṣadhīkarmāṇi ca/ bheṣajyāni sarvāṇy atra
T02divav33u:1232: p.99.4/.tatra yajña^samārambhaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ ca kārayet/ athātra naṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā svasti bhaviṣyati^iti vaktavyaṃ/
T02divav33u:1236: p.99.6cd/.kṣatriyaṃ dānaśīlaṃ ca brahmaṇaṃ ca purohitaṃ//iti/
T02divav33u:1237: p.99.7/.pañca khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatrāni dāruṇāni bhavanti/tad
T02divav33u:1239: p.99.8ab/.maghā trīṇi ca pūrvāṇi bharaṇī ceti pañcamī/
T02divav33u:1240: p.99.8cd/.athātra dagdhaṃ naṣṭaṃ vā viddhaṃ vā na bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:1242: ardha^rātrikāṇi ṣaṭ/ tad yathā/ ārdrā aśleṣā svātī
T02divav33u:1243: jyeṣṭhā (100)śatabhiṣā bharaṇī ceti/ navaṃśāḥ ṣaḍgrāsā dvikṣetrāṇi/ rohiṇī punarvasur viśākhā ca/ trīṇī uttarāṇi ceti/ ubhayato vibhāgāni/
T02divav33u:1244: pañca^daśakṣetrāṇi/ kṛttikā ca maghā mūlā grīṇi pūrvāṇi/ imāni ṣaṭ pūrvabhāgināni/ mṛgaśirā puṣyā hastā citrā anurādhā śravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā revatī aśvino ceti/ imāni nava nakṣatrāṇi paścād bhāgīyāni triṃśan^muhūrta^yogāni
T02divav33u:1246: p.100.1/.api ca brāhmaṇa śubhāś ca muhūrtā bhavanti/ aśubhāś ca muhūrtā
T02divav33u:1247: bhavanti/ śubha^aśubhāś ca muhūrtā bhavanti/ saṃprayuktanakṣatreṣu sarveṣu yadā śubha^muhūrta^samāpattayo bhavanti tadā śobhanā bhavanti/ yadā
T02divav33u:1248: +aśubha^muhūrtasamāpattayo bhavanti tadā na śobhanā bhavanti/ yadā tu punaḥ śubhāś ca^aśubhāś ca samāpattayo bhavanti tadā sādhāranā bhavanti/
T02divav33u:1250: p.100.2/.athātra kathaṃ rātridivasānāṃ hrāso vṛddhir vā bhavati^iti tad
T02divav33u:1251: ucyate/ varṣāṇāṃ prathame māse puṣya^nakṣatram amāvāsyāṃ bhavati/ śravaṇā
T02divav33u:1252: pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ aṣṭādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ dvādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/
T02divav33u:1253: ṣoḍaśāṅgula^kāṣṭhasya madhyāhne +ardhāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ āṣāḍhā rātriṃ nayati/ mṛgaśirasi ādityo gato bhavati/
T02divav33u:1254: varṣāṇāṃ dvitīye māse maghā +amāvāsyāṃ bhavati bhādrapadā pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ saptadaśa muhūrto divaso bhavati/ trayodaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ (101) dvi^aṅgulāyāṃ
T02divav33u:1255: chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ śravaṇā rātriṃ nayati/ puṣya ādityo gato
T02divav33u:1256: bhavati/ varṣāṇāṃ tṛtīye māse phalgunyam amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/ aśvinī
T02divav33u:1257: pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ ṣoḍaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ catur^daśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/
T02divav33u:1259: chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ pūrvabhādrapadā rātriṃ nayati/ maghā^ādityo
T02divav33u:1260: gato bhavati/ varṣāṇāṃ caturthe māse citrām amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati kṛttikā
T02divav33u:1262: rātriḥ/ ṣaḍaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ aśvino rātriṃ nayati/
T02divav33u:1265: pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/
T02divav33u:1266: aṣṭāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ kṛttikā rātriṃ nayati/ citrāyām ādityo gato bhavati/ hemantānāṃ dvitīye māse +amāvāsyāṃ jyeṣṭhā bhavati/
T02divav33u:1267: puṣyaḥ pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ trayodaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ saptadaśa^muhūrtā
T02divav33u:1268: rātriḥ/ daśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ mṛgaśirā rātriṃ nayati/
T02divav33u:1269: viśākhāyām ādityo gato bhavati/ (102) hemantānāṃ tṛtīye māse pūrvāṣāḍhām avāsyāṃ bhavati/ maghā pūrṇamāsyaṃ/ dvādaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/
T02divav33u:1270: aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ dvādaśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/
T02divav33u:1271: puṣyo rātriṃ nayati/ jyeṣṭhāyām ādityo gato bhavati/ hemantānāṃ caturthe māse śravaṇām āvāsyaṃ bhavati/ phalgunī pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ trayodaśa muhūrto divaso bhavati/ saptadaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ daśāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ
T02divav33u:1272: parivartate/ maghā rātriṃ nayati/ āṣāḍhāyām ādityo gato bhavati/
T02divav33u:1273: p.102.1/.grīṣmāṇāṃ prathame māse uttarabhādrapadām āvāsyayaṃ bhavati/
T02divav33u:1274: citrā pūrṇamāsyāṃ catur^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtā
T02divav33u:1275: rātriḥ/ (103) aṣṭāṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ phalgunī rātriṃ nayati/ śravaṇāyām ādityo gato bhavati/ grīṣmāṇāṃ dvitīye māse +aśvinī
T02divav33u:1276: amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/ viśākhā pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ pañca^daśa^muhūrto divaso
T02divav33u:1278: pañca^daśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ ṣaḍaṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/
T02divav33u:1279: citrā rātriṃ nayati/ uttarāyāṃ bhādrapadāyām ādityo gato bhavati/
T02divav33u:1280: grīṣmānāṃ tṛtīye māse kṛttikām amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/ jyeṣṭhā pūrṇamāsyāṃ/
T02divav33u:1281: ṣoḍaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ caturdaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/ catur^aṅgulāyāṃ
T02divav33u:1282: chāyāyām ādityāḥ parivartate/ viśākhā rātriṃ nayati/ kṛttikāyām ādityo gato
T02divav33u:1283: bhavati/ grīṣmāṇāṃ caturthe māse mṛgaśirā amāvāsyāyāṃ bhavati/ uttarāṣāḍhā
T02divav33u:1284: pūrṇamāsyāṃ/ saptadaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ trayodaśa^muhūrtā rātriḥ/
T02divav33u:1285: madhyāhne dvi^aṅgulāyāṃ chāyāyām ādityaḥ parivartate/ jyeṣṭhā rātriṃ nayati/ puṣya ādityo gato bhavati/
T02divav33u:1288: ūnarātrasya pūrṇarātrasya ca grahītavyaṃ/ tatra tṛtīye varṣe +adhiko māso
T02divav33u:1289: yujyate/ ṣaṇṇāṃ māsānām ahorātrāṇi samāni bhavanti/ ataḥ ṣaṇ^māsād divaso
T02divav33u:1290: vadhate/ ṣaṇ^māsād rātrir (104) vardhate/ ṣaṇ^māsād divaso māse māse samam eva hīyate/ ṣaṇ^māsād rātrir māse māse parihīyate/
T02divav33u:1291: p.104.1/.ṣaṇ^māsād ādityaḥ parivartate/ uttarāṃ diśaṃ saṃcarati/ ṣaṇ^māsād
T02divav33u:1292: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ/ ṣaṇ^māsāt samud(r)e udakaparimāṇasya hrāso vṛddhiś ca
T02divav33u:1294: bhavati/ atra gaṇanāpratijāgaraṇāsmaram ity evam eṣa saṃvatsaro vyākhyāto
T02divav33u:1297: p.104.2/.candra ādityaḥ śukro bṛhaspatiḥ śanaiścaro +aṅgārako budhaś ca/
T02divav33u:1298: ime grahāḥ/ eṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ bṛhaspatiḥ saṃvatsarasthāyo/ evaṃ śanaiścaro budho +aṅgārakaḥ śukraś ca^ime maṇḍala^cāriṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:1300: p.104.3/.bharaṇī kṛttikā rohiṇī mṛgaśirā etat sādhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ
T02divav33u:1301: maṇḍalaṃ/ ārdrā punarvasuḥ puṣyo +aśleṣā etat sādhāranaṃ dvitīyaṃ
T02divav33u:1302: maṇḍalaṃ/ maghā atha phalgunadvayaṃ hasto citrā etat sādhāraṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/ svātī viśākhā anurādhā etat sādhāraṇaṃ caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
T02divav33u:1303: jyeṣṭhā mūlāṣāḍhādvayam (105) atra sarvāṇi mahā^bhāyāni bhavanti/ idaṃ pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
T02divav33u:1304: abhijic chravaṇā dhaniṣṭhā śatabiṣā ubhe bhādrapade caitat sādhāraṇaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/ revatī avinī caitat sādhāraṇaṃ saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ/
T02divav33u:1305: saṃvatsaram eteṣu yad yan nakṣatra^maṇḍalaṃ pīḍayati tasya tasya
T02divav33u:1307: p.105.1/.dvādaśa^muhūrtāni divase dhruvāṇi dvādaśa rātrau/ ṣaṇ^muhūrtāḥ
T02divav33u:1308: sañcāriṇaḥ/ katame ṣaṭ/ nairṛto varuṇo vāyavo bhargo devo raudro vicārī
T02divav33u:1310: p.105.2/.athātra śrāvaṇe māse pūrṇe +aṣṭādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye
T02divav33u:1311: ca caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/ rohitasya ca muhūrtasya balasya
T02divav33u:1312: ca^antare madhyāhno bhavati/ sūryāvatāre tu vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1313: dvādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye ṣaṣṭhe muhūrte nayamano nāma muhūrto bhavati/ ātāpāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto rātryavasāne bhavati/
T02divav33u:1314: bhādrapade māse pūrṇe saptadaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye ca caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrtā bhavati/ madhyāhne +abhijito nāma muhūrto bhavati/ (106)
T02divav33u:1315: sūryāvatāre raudro nāma muhūrto bhavati/ trayodaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye vicārī nāma muhūrto bhavati/ ardha^rātre mahā^bhayo vāyāvo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1316: p.106.1/.rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/ aśvayuje māse pūrṇe ṣoḍaśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati/ sūrya^udaye caturojā nāma muhūrto
T02divav33u:1317: bhavati/ samudgatasya ca muhūrtasya abhijitasya ca^antare madhyāhno
T02divav33u:1318: bhavati/ sūryāvatāre bhargo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1319: p.106.2/.catur^daśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇe sūrye raudro nāma muhūrto
T02divav33u:1320: bhavati/ abhijitasya ca muhūrtasya bhīṣamāṇasya ca muhūrtasya
T02divav33u:1321: antareṇa^ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/ rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1322: p.106.3/.kārttike māse pūrṇe divasaḥ samarātrir bhavati/
T02divav33u:1323: pañca^daśa^muhūrto divaso bhavati pañca^daśa^muhūrto rātriḥ/ samāne
T02divav33u:1324: +ahorātre sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/ saṃmukho nāma muhūrto bhavati madhyāhne/ santato nāma muhūrtaḥ (107) sūryāvatāre/ rātrāv avatīrṇamātra sūrye bhrgo devo nāma muhūrto bhavati/ ardha^rātre +abhijin
T02divav33u:1326: rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1327: p.107.1/.mārgaśīrṣe māse ca pūrṇe catur^daśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye
T02divav33u:1328: caturojā evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/ viratasya saṃmukhasya ca
T02divav33u:1329: muhūrtasya^antare madhyāhno bhavati/ sūrya^avatāre varuṇo nāma muhūrto
T02divav33u:1330: bhavati/ ṣoḍaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye saṃtāpanaḥ saṃyamo nāma muhūrto bhavati/ rākṣasasyābhijitasya ca muhūrtasya^antare
T02divav33u:1332: bhavati/ rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1333: p.107.2/.pauṣamāse pūrṇe trayodaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā evaṃ nama muhūrto bhavati/ madhyāhne virato nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1334: sūryāvatāre nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/ saptadaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye varuṇo nāma muhūrto bhavati/ ardha^rātre rākṣaso nāma muhūrto bhavti/ rātryavasāne ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1335: p.107.3/.māgha^māse pūrṇe dvādaśa^muhūrte divase sūrya^udaye caturojā nāma muhūrto bhavati/ sāvitrasya ca viratasya ca muhūrtasya^antareṇa madhyāhno
T02divav33u:1336: bhavati/ sūryāvatāre vijayo nāma muhūrto bhavati/ aṣṭādaśa^muhūrtāyāṃ
T02divav33u:1337: rātrāv avatīrṇamātre sūrye nairṛto nāma muhūrto bhavati/ gardabhasya muhūrtasya ca rākṣasasya ca^antaram ardha^rātraṃ bhavati/ rātryavasāna ātapāgnir evaṃ nāma muhūrto bhavati/
T02divav33u:1338: p.108.1/.yathā śrāvaṇe tathā māghe/ yathā bhādrapade tathā phālgune/ yathā
T02divav33u:1339: +asvayuje tathā caitra/ yathā kārttike tathā vaiśākhe/ yathā mārgaśīrṣe tathā jyaiṣṭhe/ yathā pauṣe tathā +aṣāḍhe/ evam eteṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ
T02divav33u:1340: muhūrtānāṃ caritaṃ vicaritaṃ ca jñātavyaṃ/ nakṣatra^vicaraṇaṃ nāma prathamo +adhyāyāḥ/
T02divav33u:1342: ca^utkarṣāpakarṣau kartavyau/ hīyamāne vardhamāne vā divase vā māse vā pūrṇe +ardha^māse vā/ dvitīyā ṣaṣṭhī navamī dvādaśī caturdaśī atra^antare
T02divav33u:1343: divase kalā vardhate rātrau kalā hīyate/
T02divav33u:1348: p.108.4cd/.āpo indraś ca vāyuś ca tathāgnir bhagavān api//
T02divav33u:1349: p.108.5ab/.trayas tu te yatra bhavanti pakṣe ṣaḍeka^māse tu bhavanti vegāḥ/
T02divav33u:1350: p.108.5cd/.parasya cakrasya nidarśanaṃ syāt prakampate yatra mahī tv
T02divav33u:1355: p.109.2cd/.adhyardhaṃ tu pañca^pañcāśan māghe rātriśataṃ smṛtaṃ/
T02divav33u:1356: p.109.3ab/.ardhyardhaṃ phālgune māse caitre triṃśat tu rātrayaḥ/
T02divav33u:1358: p.109.4ab/.yadā sarveṣu māseṣu satataṃ kampate mahī/
T02divav33u:1359: p.109.4cd/.vṛkṣās tathā calanti sma jalaṃ vā yadi kampate/
T02divav33u:1360: p.109.4ef/.parvataḥ parṇavat kamped bhayam atra vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:1361: p.110.1ab/.nagarāṇy atha vā grāmā ghoṣā ye ca^atra saṃśritāḥ/
T02divav33u:1363: p.110.2ab/.aṭavyaḥ saṃpravartante daśa varṣāṇi pañca ca/
T02divav33u:1365: p.110.3ab/.kṛttikāsu caled bhūmir grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā/
T02divav33u:1366: p.110.3cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ mucyate hy agnir dahate satṛnālayān//
T02divav33u:1369: p.110.5ab/.ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca taṃ grāmam āśritāḥ/
T02divav33u:1372: p.110.6cd/.proptaṃ śasyaṃ na roheta bhavet phalasya kṛcchratā//
T02divav33u:1373: p.111.1ab/.gurviṇīnāṃ ca nārīṇāṃ garbho nipīḍyate bhṛśaṃ/
T02divav33u:1375: p.111.2ab/.mahā^ātmānaś ca rājānaḥ śrīmantaś ca narottamāḥ/
T02divav33u:1379: p.111.4ab/.soma^pītāś ca ye viprā vānaprasthāś ca tāpasāḥ/
T02divav33u:1381: p.111.5ab/.ārdrāyāṃ calitā bhūmir vṛkṣā naśyanti kṣīriṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:1383: p.111.6ab/.kūpakhāḥ parikhākhāś ca pāpakā ye ca taskarāḥ/
T02divav33u:1385: p.111.7ab/.punarvasau caled bhūmir maṇḍalaṃ kuṇḍikā^api ca/
T02divav33u:1389: p.112.1ab/.puṣyeṇa ca caled bhūmir brāhmaṇā nāyakās tathā/
T02divav33u:1390: p.112.1cd/.duraṅgamā vāṇijakāḥ sārthavāhāś ca ye narāḥ//
T02divav33u:1391: p.112.2ab/.pārthivāḥ pārvatīyāś ca ye ca tad bhaktigocarāḥ/
T02divav33u:1394: p.112.3ab/.aśleṣāyāṃ caled bhūmir nāgāḥ sarve sarīsṛpāḥ/
T02divav33u:1395: p.112.3cd/.kīṭāḥ pipīlikāḥ śvānā; eka^khurāś ca ye mṛgāḥ//
T02divav33u:1396: p.112.4ab/.vaidyā visakarāś ca^api ye ca satvā darīśrayāḥ/
T02divav33u:1399: p.112.5cd/.ye ca śrāddhā nivartante samājā; utsavās tathā/
T02divav33u:1400: p.112.5ef/.yajñāś ca deva^kṛtyaṃ ca sarvam atra nivartate//
T02divav33u:1401: p.112.6ab/.ye jātā ye ca saṃvṛddhā ye ca^anye +apy agrapaṇḍitāḥ/
T02divav33u:1402: p.112.6cd/.gandharvāś ca vinaśyanti narā ye ca mahā^kulāḥ/
T02divav33u:1404: p.112.7ab/.phalgunyāṃ calitā bhūmir ṛtur vyāvartate tadā/
T02divav33u:1405: p.112.7cd/.triyagvātaś ca^eva vāti kṛtaṃ naśyati śāśvataṃ/
T02divav33u:1407: p.113.1ab/.dharme ratā; āsanikā ye ca śulkopajīvinaḥ/
T02divav33u:1414: p.113.4cd/.gaṇamukhyā mahā^mātrāḥ senādhyakṣāś ca ye narāḥ//
T02divav33u:1418: p.113.6cd/.kumāryaḥ sarva^ratnaṃ ca sasyānāṃ bīja^kaiḥ saha//
T02divav33u:1421: p.113.8ab/.svātau pracalitā bhūmiś caurā ye ca kuśīlakāḥ/
T02divav33u:1427: p.114.2ab/.anurādhe caled bhūmir dasyūnām anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1428: p.114.2cd/.viṭā dyūta^karāś ca^eva granthibhedāś ca ye narāḥ//
T02divav33u:1429: p.114.3ab/.andhrāḥ puṇḍrāḥ pulindāś ca bhaye tiṣṭhanty anāśritāḥ//
T02divav33u:1430: p.114.3cd/.mitrabhedaś ca balavān tadā jagati jāyate//
T02divav33u:1432: p.114.4cd/.vāyasā vṛṣabhā vyāḍās tathā caṇḍamṛgāś ca ye//
T02divav33u:1434: p.114.5cd/.pratyarthikena śīghreṇa ye ca tad bhaktibhājanāḥ/
T02divav33u:1437: p.114.6cd/.grahāśrayāḥ piśācāś ca ye ca sattvā darīśrayāḥ/
T02divav33u:1439: p.115.1ab/.durbhikṣaṃ ca karoty āśu dhānyam alpa^udakaṃ bhavet/
T02divav33u:1446: p.115.4ab/.uttarasyāṃ caled bhūmiḥ śilpinām anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1448: p.115.5ab/.daridrā dhaninaś ca^api śilpino vividhā; api/
T02divav33u:1451: p.115.6ab/.vaiṣṇave calitā bhūmis tadeti yad anīpsitaṃ/
T02divav33u:1454: p.116.2ab/.kuśaṇḍāḥ śaradaṇḍāś ca ye narā rāja^pūjitāḥ/
T02divav33u:1456: p.116.3ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ caled bhūmir dhaninā manayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1459: p.116.4cd/.pārikūlāś ca bhojyāś ca hy anye sannāgarā; api/
T02divav33u:1461: p.116.5ab/.vāruṇye calitā bhūmir audakeṣv anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1463: p.116.6ab/.tadāsau vīrakān madrān bāhlīkān kekayān api/
T02divav33u:1465: p.117.1ab/.sājena calitā bhūmī rākṣasān ghātakāṃs tathā/
T02divav33u:1467: p.117.2ab/.vaṇijyajīvino vaiśyān śūdrāṃś ca karītīn api/
T02divav33u:1468: p.117.2cd/.yavanān mālavādyāṃś ca granthibhedāṃś ca nāśayet//
T02divav33u:1469: p.117.3ab/.ahirbudhnye caled bhūmir vaṇijām anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1470: p.117.3cd/.dharme ratāś ca ye siddhā ye ca śauktikakarmiṇaḥ//
T02divav33u:1471: p.117.4ab/.śibīn vatsān tathā vātsyān kṣatriyān ārjunāyanān/
T02divav33u:1473: p.117.5ab/.revatyāṃ calitā bhūmiḥ saṃgrāmaḥ syāt sudāruṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:1474: p.117.5cd/.grāma^ghātāś ca vartante grāmo grāmaṃ ca hiṃsati//
T02divav33u:1476: p.117.6cd/.sudhanvān abhisārāṃś ca sarva^senāṃś ca nirdahet//
T02divav33u:1477: p.118.1ab/.aśvinyāṃ calitā bhūmir aśvānām anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1478: p.118.1cd/.grāma^ghātāś ca vartante bhrātā bhrātṝn jighāṃsati//
T02divav33u:1479: p.118.2ab/.yā ca^atra gabham ādhatte ye ca jātāś ca tān iha/
T02divav33u:1480: p.118.2cd/.trīṇi varṣāṇy ato duḥkham upaiti ca nirantaraṃ//
T02divav33u:1481: p.118.3ab/.sahitāś citra^garbhāś ca ye hy anye ca^aṅganājanāḥ/
T02divav33u:1482: p.118.3cd/.ārjunāyanā rājanyāḥ suṣṭhu trīṃś ca^api hiṃsati//
T02divav33u:1483: p.118.4ab/.bharaṇyāṃ calitā bhūmiś caurāṇām anayo mahān/
T02divav33u:1484: p.118.4cd/.viṭā dyūta^karāś ca^eva granthibhedāś ca ye narāḥ//
T02divav33u:1486: p.118.5cd/.antāvaśāyinaḥ pāpāś caranti ye tu durjanāḥ/
T02divav33u:1488: p.118.6ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:1491: p.119.1cd/.indraś na varṣate tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
T02divav33u:1492: p.119.1ef/.[evaṃ nigaditaṃ nārthair indraś ca^atra pravarṣati//]
T02divav33u:1496: p.119.3cd/.lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tānn indrakampitān/
T02divav33u:1497: p.119.3ef/.sa nirdeśo bhavet tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
T02divav33u:1499: p.119.4cd/.vyavahārāṃś ca kurvīran nirbhayās tatra vāṇijāḥ/
T02divav33u:1501: p.119.5ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:1504: p.120.1cd/.anulomaṃ ca saṃyānti carantaḥ paścimāṃ diśaṃ//
T02divav33u:1507: p.120.3ab/.lakṣaṇaṃ tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāt tāñ jalakampitān/
T02divav33u:1508: p.120.3cd/.sa nirdeśo bhavet tatra maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā//
T02divav33u:1510: p.120.4cd/.sthāpyante tatra bījāni nimne naśyanti vai tadā//
T02divav33u:1513: p.120.6ab/.vepitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:1515: p.120.7ab/.dṛśyate kapilā sandhyā candra^sūryau tu lohitāu/
T02divav33u:1517: p.121.1ab/.tato bhavati nirdeśo maharṣer vacanaṃ yathā/
T02divav33u:1518: p.121.1cd/.na tatra pravaset prājña; ātmānaṃ ca^atra gopayet//
T02divav33u:1523: p.121.4ab/.kampitāyāṃ tu medinyāṃ bhaved rūpam anantaraṃ/
T02divav33u:1525: p.121.5ab/.sandhyā ca lohitā bhāti candra^sūryau tu lohitau/
T02divav33u:1527: p.121.6ab/.agnir dahati kāṣṭhāni rakṣitāni dhanāni ca/
T02divav33u:1528: p.121.6cd/.dṛśyante dhūmaśikharāḥ śastraṃ ca svidyate bhṛśaṃ//
T02divav33u:1529: p.121.7ab/.vīṇāś ca divi dṛśyante navamāsān na varṣati/
T02divav33u:1531: p.121.8a/.jayati; ahani pūrve kṣatriyān pārthivāṃś ca/
T02divav33u:1536: p.122.2b/.striyam api ca napuṃsaś ca^ardha^rātreṣv anantān/
T02divav33u:1541: p.122.3c/.viduṣi ca mṛdu^bhāvaṃ vindate yo hy adhīte/
T02divav33u:1548: p.123.3/.atha bhoḥ puṣkarasārin amīṣām aṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ roga^utpattiṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān/
T02divav33u:1549: p.123.4ab/.kṛttikāsu^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1550: p.123.4cd/.catūrātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1551: p.123.5ab/.agnir hi devatā tatra dadhnā hy asya baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1553: p.123.6ab/.rohiṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1554: p.123.6cd/.pañca^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1555: p.123.7ab/.devaḥ prajāpatis tatra śuddhamālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1557: p.123.8ab/.vyādhir mṛgaśirobhutaḥ striyo vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1558: p.123.8cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1559: p.123.9ab/.somo hi devatā tatra maṇḍena tu baliṃ haret/

T02divav33u:1562: p.124.1cd/.daśa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1563: p.124.2ab/.rudro hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1565: p.124.3ab/.punarvasau bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/

T02divav33u:1569: p.124.5ab/.puṣye samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/

T02divav33u:1575: p.124.8ab/.maghā^samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1576: p.124.8cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1577: p.124.9ab/.pitaro devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/

T02divav33u:1583: p.125.2ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1584: p.125.2cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu bhago py atra tu devatā//%aryaman
T02divav33u:1585: p.125.3ab/.hastenāpy utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1586: p.125.3cd/.pañca^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1587: p.125.4ab/.ravir hi devatā tatra gandha^puṣpair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1589: p.125.5ab/.citrāyām uttthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1590: p.125.5cd/.aṣṭa^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1591: p.125.6ab/.tvaṣṭā hi devatā tatra ghṛtam udgair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1593: p.125.7ab/.svātyāṃ samutthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1595: p.125.8ab/.devatā^atra bhaved vāyuś citra^mālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1597: p.125.9ab/.viśākhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1599: p.126.1ab/.(126) indrāgnī^devate tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1601: p.126.2ab/.anurādhā^utthito vyādiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1602: p.126.2cd/.ardha^māsaṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1603: p.126.3ab/.mitro hi devatā tatra ghṛta^pātraṃ baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1605: p.126.4ab/.jyeṣṭhāyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/

T02divav33u:1609: p.126.6ab/.mūle samutthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1610: p.126.6cd/.māsiko hi bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1611: p.126.7ab/.nairṛtir devatā tatra madya^māṃsair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1613: p.126.8ab/.pūrvāṣāḍhe bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1614: p.126.8cd/.sāṃkleśiko bhaved vyādhir aṣṭau māsān na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:1615: p.126.9ab/.āpo hi devatās tatra kṛsareṇa baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1617: p.126.10ab/.uttarāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1618: p.126.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1619: p.126.11ab/.viśvo hi devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1621: p.127.1ab/.(127) abhijid utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1622: p.127.1cd/.ṣaṇ^māsān saṃbhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//
T02divav33u:1623: p.127.2ab/.viṣṇuś ca devatā tatra dadhi^maṇḍaṃ baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1625: p.127.3ab/.śravaṇena^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1626: p.127.3cd/.guruko hi bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇaṃ dvādaśa^māsikaṃ//
T02divav33u:1627: p.127.4ab/.viṣṇur hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1629: p.127.5ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ bhaved vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1630: p.127.5cd/.guruko he bhaved vyādhiḥ pūrṇamāsān trayodaśa//
T02divav33u:1631: p.127.6ab/.vasavo devatās tatra ghṛta^mālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1633: p.127.7ab/.śatabhiṣā^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1635: p.127.8ab/.varuṇo devatā tatra pāyasena baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1637: p.127.9ab/.pūrvabhadra^utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1638: p.127.9cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu ahirbudhnyo +atra daivataḥ//
T02divav33u:1639: p.127.10ab/.uttarabhādrajo vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1640: p.127.10cd/.sapta^rātraṃ bhaved vyādhis tataś ca^ūrdhvaṃ vimucyate//

T02divav33u:1643: p.128.2ab/.revatyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1645: p.128.3ab/.pūṣā hi devatā tatra gandha^mālyair baliṃ haret/
T02divav33u:1647: p.128.4ab/.aśvinyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1649: p.128.5ab/.gandharvo devatā tatra yāvakena baliṃ haret/ %gandharva!
T02divav33u:1651: p.128.6ab/.bharaṇyām utthito vyādhiḥ striyā vā puruṣasya vā/
T02divav33u:1652: p.128.6cd/.na taṃ vaidyāś cikitsantu yamas tatra tu daivataḥ/
T02divav33u:1653: p.128.7ab/.śīlaṃ rakṣatu medhāvī tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati//
T02divav33u:1656: p.128.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin bandhana^nirmokṣaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:1658: p.129.1/.kṛttikāsu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa
T02divav33u:1659: mokṣyati^iti vaktavyaḥ/ rohiṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā tri^rātreṇa
T02divav33u:1660: mokṣyati^iti/ mṛgaśirasi baddho vā ruddho vā eka^viṃśati rātreṇa
T02divav33u:1661: mokṣyati^iti/ ārdrāyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā +ardha^māsena mokṣyati^iti/
T02divav33u:1662: punarvasau ruddho vā baddho vā sapta^rātrena/ puṣye tri^rātreṇa/ aśleṣāyāṃ
T02divav33u:1664: maghāsu ṣoḍaśa^rātreṇa/ citrāyāṃ sapta^rātreṇa/ svātyāṃ daśa^rātreṇa/
T02divav33u:1665: viśākhāyāṃ ṣaḍviṃśad^rātreṇa/ anurādhāyām eka^triṃśad rātreṇa/ jyeṣṭhāyām
T02divav33u:1668: ṣaḍ^rātreṇa/ śravaṇe dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ śatabhiṣāyāṃ pūrvabhadrapade uttarabhādrapade revatyāṃ
T02divav33u:1669: catur^daśa^rātreṇa/ aśvinyāṃ tri^rātreṇa/ bharaṇyāṃ baddho vā ruddho vā parikleśam avāpsyati^iti
T02divav33u:1672: p.129.3/.atha boḥ puskarasārin tilaka^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac
T02divav33u:1674: p.129.4/.mūrdhni tu yasyās tilako +asti sūkṣmaḥ snigdho bhavet
T02divav33u:1676: p.129.5/.rājā tu tasyā bhavati^iha bhartā stana^upariṣṭāt pratibimbam
T02divav33u:1678: p.130.1ab/.śīrṣe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syāt sūkṣmo bhaved
T02divav33u:1680: p.130.1cd/.senāpatis tasyā bhaved dhi bhartā stana^antare +asyāḥ
T02divav33u:1682: p.130.2ab/.bhrūvontare +asyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duṣcāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ
T02divav33u:1684: p.130.2cd/.pañca^eva tasyāḥ patayo bhavanti bahv^anna^pānaṃ labhate ca nārī//
T02divav33u:1685: p.131.1ab/.gaṇḍasya nāsādikam adhyadeśe bhavec ca bimbaṃ tilakasya yasyāḥ/
T02divav33u:1686: p.131.1cd/.tāṃ śoka^bhājaṃ pramadāṃ vadanti romapradeśe pratibimbam āhuḥ//
T02divav33u:1687: p.131.2ab/.karṇe tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād bahu^śrutāṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ vadanti/
T02divav33u:1688: p.131.2cd/.bahu^śrūtāṃ tāṃ śrutidhāriṇīṃ ca trike tu yasyāḥ pratibimbakaṃ
T02divav33u:1690: p.131.3ab/.yasya^uttaroṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syāt tāṃ bhinna^satyāṃ pramadāṃ
T02divav33u:1692: p.131.3cd/.kṛcchreṇa sā vai labhate hi vṛttim ūrau tu tasyās tila^bimbam
T02divav33u:1694: p.132.1ab/.yasyā +adharoṣṭhe tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ
T02divav33u:1696: p.132.1cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu ṛcchate sā tathā hi guhye pratibimbakaṃ
T02divav33u:1698: p.132.2ab/.cibuke tu yasyās tilaka^alakaḥ syād duścāriṇīṃ tāṃ pramadāṃ
T02divav33u:1700: p.132.2cd/.miṣṭa^anna^pānaṃ bahu sā labheta guhye dvitīyaṃ pratibimbakaṃ
T02divav33u:1703: p.132.4/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin nakṣatra^janma^guṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:1704: vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhavān triśaṅkko/
T02divav33u:1706: p.132.5b/.bhavec chūras tathā caṇḍaḥ priya^vādī ca mānavaḥ//
T02divav33u:1707: p.132.6a/.rohiṇyāṃ puruṣo jāto dhanavān dharmikas tathā/
T02divav33u:1708: p.132.6b/.vyavasāyī sthiraḥ śūro dhruvaṃ ca^asya sadā mukhaṃ//
T02divav33u:1709: p.133.1ab/.jāto mṛgaśire yas tu mṛduḥ saumyas tu mānavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1710: p.133.1cd/.darśanīyo bhavec ca^asau strī^kāntas tu viśeṣataḥ//
T02divav33u:1712: p.133.2cd/.rodrakarmā bhavec ca^asāv īścaraś ca śatair mahān//
T02divav33u:1713: p.133.3ab/.jātaḥ punarvasau yas tu hy alolo buddhimān naraḥ/
T02divav33u:1714: p.133.3cd/.dharma^śīlo bhavec ca^asau jāta^krodhaś ca mānavaḥ//
T02divav33u:1715: p.133.4ab/.puṣyeṇa puruṣo jātas tejasvī brāhmaṇo bhavet/
T02divav33u:1716: p.133.4cd/.kṣatriyaś ca bhaved rājā vaiśya^sūdrau ca pūjitau//
T02divav33u:1717: p.133.5ab/.śvasanaḥ krodhanaḥ krūro hy aśleṣā^sambhavo naraḥ/
T02divav33u:1718: p.133.5cd/.durmanuṣyaś ca caṇḍaś ca; iti sarvam ihādiśet//
T02divav33u:1720: p.133.6cd/.dhanavān dhānyavān bhogī maghāsu puruṣo bhavet//
T02divav33u:1721: p.133.7ab/.pūrvaphālgunī^jātas tu yaḥ kaścit puruṣo bhavet/
T02divav33u:1723: p.133.8ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu phālgunyāṃ jāto bhavati bhogavān/
T02divav33u:1724: p.133.8cd/.divyajñānaś ca vijñāne puruṣaḥ subhago bhavet//
T02divav33u:1725: p.133.9ab/.haste jātaś ca śuddha^ātmā vikrānto mṛdu^bhojanaḥ/
T02divav33u:1729: p.134.1ab/.svātyāṃ ca puruṣo jāto bandhuś lāghī cicakṣaṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:1731: p.134.2ab/.viśākhāsu naro jātas tejasvī dravyavān mahān/
T02divav33u:1732: p.134.2cd/.śūro vikramavān dakṣaḥ subhagaś ca bhaved asau//
T02divav33u:1734: p.134.3cd/.śuciś ca^eva kṛta^jñaś ca dharma^ātmā ca bhavec ca saḥ//
T02divav33u:1738: p.134.5cd/.dṛḍho vīro bhavec ca^asau kilviṣī ca sa mānavaḥ//
T02divav33u:1740: p.134.6cd/.matsya^māṃsa^priyaś ca^api ghātakaḥ syāt sa mānavaḥ//
T02divav33u:1741: p.134.7ab/.sa^anukrośaś ca dātā ca vidyāniṣṭhaḥ suhṛjjanaḥ/
T02divav33u:1742: p.134.7cd/.viśvadaive naro jāto bhaved api ca niścitaḥ//
T02divav33u:1743: p.134.8ab/.ācāryaḥ śāstra^kartā ca viśvāsī ca kriyāparaḥ/
T02divav33u:1744: p.134.8cd/.śravaṇe jata; āyuṣmān śrīmāṃś ca puruṣo bhavet//
T02divav33u:1747: p.135.1ab/.vāruṇe yadi nakṣatre jāto bhavati mānavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1748: p.135.1cd/.paruṣo kveṣaśīlaś ca parivādī ca sarvaśaḥ//
T02divav33u:1749: p.135.2ab/.jāto bhādrapadāyāṃ tu pūrvasyām iha mānavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1752: p.135.3cd/.medhāvī bahv apatyaś ca dharma^śīlo mahā^dhanaḥ//
T02divav33u:1756: p.135.5cd/.mahā^jana^priyaś ca^api śūraś ca subhagaś ca saḥ//
T02divav33u:1760: p.135.8/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko utpāta^cakraṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ/ kathayati ca/
T02divav33u:1764: u1.2ab/.māghasya prathame pakṣe śailo vā pārthivā yadi/
T02divav33u:1766: u1.2ef/.vidyuto vā^atha dṛśyante tadā vidyāj jana^kṣayaṃ//
T02divav33u:1767: u1.3ab/.aśvinyām arkato dhūmo nirgacchann api chādayet/
T02divav33u:1770: u1.4cd/.samantād vadhyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:1771: u1.5ab/.phālgune kṛttikāyāṃ tu; āditye parikho yadi/
T02divav33u:1772: u1.5cd/.naśyanti karvaṭās tatra yadi devo na varṣati//
T02divav33u:1773: u1.6ab/.caitra^māse yadā puṣye sūrye kṛṣṇāṃ pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:1776: u1.7cd/.saṃgrāmaṃ tatra jānīyād ubhau ghātyete pārthivau//
T02divav33u:1778: u1.8cd/.sa^amātyo vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre durbhikṣam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:1785: u1.12ab/.māse +atha śrāvaṇe mūle candra^sūryau na bhāsataḥ/
T02divav33u:1786: u1.12cd/.sphuliṅgāś ca^atra dṛśyante vidyād roga^bhayaṃ mahat//
T02divav33u:1791: u1.15ab/.ravivad bhāti tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta punaḥ punaḥ/
T02divav33u:1792: u1.15cd/.rājñāṃ vidyād dhatānāṃ vai bhūmiḥ pāstyati śoṇitaṃ//
T02divav33u:1793: u1.16ab/.bharaṇyāṃ māgha^māse tu kṛṣṇo vāyuḥ samutthitaḥ/
T02divav33u:1794: u1.16cd/.chādayec candra^sūryau tu śīghraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
T02divav33u:1795: u1.17ab/.māse tu phālgune vāyuḥ pāṃśuvarṣaṃ savidyutaṃ/
T02divav33u:1797: u1.18ab/.saha^ādityena candre +atha yadā kaścid grahaś caret/
T02divav33u:1798: u1.18cd/.vāyur vā viṣamo vātii vidyād rāja^vadhaṃ tadā//
T02divav33u:1803: u1.21ab/.jyeṣṭhe ca pāṃśur varṣeta; ādityaḥ pariviṣyate/
T02divav33u:1807: u1.23ab/.śrāvaṇe vāyavaḥ pītāḥ sadā kṛṣṇaṃ nabhas^talaṃ/
T02divav33u:1809: u1.24ab/.śrāvaṇe varṣate hy agniḥ pūrvabhādrapade divā/
T02divav33u:1811: u1.25ab/.yadā bhādrapade māse nabhaḥ syāc channa^garjitaṃ/(p.138)
T02divav33u:1814: u1.26cd/.pātayec ca^evam āghātaṃ kṛtsnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati//
T02divav33u:1815: u1.27ab/.kārttike śukla^trayodaśyāṃ yadā candre dhanur bhavet/
T02divav33u:1816: u1.27cd/.samantān naśyate rāṣṭraṃ madhye durbhikṣam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:1817: u1.28ab/.ulkā^pātā hy aśanayo māgha^māse bhavanti vā/
T02divav33u:1819: u1.29ab/.māse tu phālgune yatra; āgnivarṣaṃ nabhas^talāt/
T02divav33u:1820: u1.29cd/.bhavec chabdas tadākāśe tad^rāṣṭraṃ naśyate laghu//
T02divav33u:1821: u1.30ab/.svātyāṃ caitre yadā varṣaṃ niruddhaṃ vāta^varṣitaṃ/
T02divav33u:1823: u1.31ab/.bharaṇyāṃ jyeṣṭha^māse tu śabda; uttarato bhavet/
T02divav33u:1825: u1.32ab/.āṣāḍhe māsi puṣye +atha dṛśyante vyogni vidyutaḥ/
T02divav33u:1827: u1.33ab/.śrāvaṇe tu yadā mūle bahu devaḥ pravarṣati/
T02divav33u:1829: u1.34ab/.māse bhādrapade yatra nirghātaḥ patati kṣitau/
T02divav33u:1831: u1.35ab/.māse bhādrapade puṣye vidigbhyo niścared dhvaniḥ/
T02divav33u:1832: u1.35cd/.kṣatriyaḥ kupyate kṣipraṃ vipakṣā tu datā prajā//
T02divav33u:1833: u1.36ab/.bharaṇyām aśvayuje śabda upariṣṭād bhaved yadi/
T02divav33u:1835: u1.37ab/.kārttike tu yadā^ārdrāyāṃ śabdaḥ śrayeta bhairavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1838: u1.38cd/.vātāturas tadā rāṣṭre vyādhir bhavati dāruṇaḥ//
T02divav33u:1839: u1.39ab/.pauṣa^māse yadā svātyāṃ śabdo bhavati bhairavaḥ/
T02divav33u:1841: u1.40ab/.māghe śukle tu nirghāto nityaṃ śāmyed vasundharāṃ/
T02divav33u:1845: u1.42ab/.pūrvabhādrapadāyāṃ tu caitre kampet kṣitir divā/
T02divav33u:1846: u1.42cd/.tasmin varṣe ca tadrāṣṭre parasainyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:1847: u1.43ab/.pūrvāyāṃ ced āṣāḍhāyāṃ rātrau caitre ca niścalet/
T02divav33u:1848: u1.43cd/.asibhir hanyate rājā hanyate ca mahā^janaḥ//
T02divav33u:1849: u1.44ab/.vaiśākhe kampitā bhūmiḥ kṛṣṇa^pakṣe hy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ/
T02divav33u:1850: u1.44cd/.anāvṛṣṭyā tu durbhikṣaṃ māsān ṣaṭ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:1851: u1.45ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse bharaṇyāṃ tu divā kamped vasundharā/
T02divav33u:1853: u1.46ab/.jyeṣṭhe māse yadā mūle rātrau bhūmiḥ prakampate/
T02divav33u:1854: u1.46cd/.pratyanto vadhyate rājā rāṣṭre baliṃ samādiśet//
T02divav33u:1856: u1.47cd/.śasyaṃ vinaśyate tatra kalikarma ca jāyate//
T02divav33u:1857: u1.48ab/.prakampante yadā caityā; ādrāyāṃ vā maghāsu vā/
T02divav33u:1858: u1.48cd/.jvaleyuḥ prapateyur vā naśyed rāṣṭraṃ tadā laghu//
T02divav33u:1859: u1.49ab/.caityā yatra prakampante hasanti ca namanti ca/
T02divav33u:1860: u1.49cd/.sarāṣṭraḥ kṣitipas tatra na cirān nāśam arcchati//
T02divav33u:1862: u1.50cd/.sadā parājito rājā caura^rāṣṭre ca vadhyate//
T02divav33u:1864: u1.51cd/.dvāraṃ vā nagarasya^atha bhūyiṣṭhaṃ naśyate prajā//
T02divav33u:1865: u1.52ab/.vāme vā kaṣīṇe candroḥ śṛṅge tiṣṭhed bṛhaspatiḥ/
T02divav33u:1870: u1.54cd/.jñeyaṃ roga^bhayaṃ ghoraṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:1871: u1.55ab/.rāhuṇā nigṛhītas tu ca^ullkayā hanyate śaśī/
T02divav33u:1873: u1.56ab/.yasya caiva^atha nakṣatre śaśī sūryo vigṛhyate/
T02divav33u:1874: u1.56cd/.rāhuṇā kṣitiyo rājyaiḥ saha pīḍām avāpnuyāt//
T02divav33u:1875: u1.57ab/.rājño vai ca^atha nakṣatre candraṃ ketur yadā viśet/
T02divav33u:1879: u1.59ab/.bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca lohita^aṅgaḥ śanaiścaraḥ/
T02divav33u:1883: u1.61ab/.maghāyāṃ lohita^aṅgo vā śravaṇe vā bṛhaspatiḥ/
T02divav33u:1885: u1.62ab/.tiṣṭhec chukro +atha rohiṇyāṃ jyeṣṭhe māse kathaṃcana/
T02divav33u:1888: u1.63cd/.somo vā raviṇā sārdhaṃ para^cakra^bhayaṃ tadā//
T02divav33u:1889: u1.64ab/.kākāḥ śyenāś ca bṛdhrāś ca vaseyuḥ sahitā mudā/
T02divav33u:1890: u1.64cd/.maithunaṃ vāritaṃ veyuḥ paraiḥ saha raṇas tadā//
T02divav33u:1891: u1.65ab/.śyeno hastinivāse vā; abhirohet punaḥ punaḥ/
T02divav33u:1892: u1.65cd/.para^cakreṇa yuddhaṃ tu bhavec ca^api punaḥ punaḥ/.
T02divav33u:1894: u1.66cd/.strīṇām eva bhavet tatra maraṇaṃ hy atidāruṇaṃ//
T02divav33u:1895: u1.67ab/.garbha^sthā dārakā yatra hasanti ca vadanti ca/
T02divav33u:1897: u1.68ab/.eka^pādāṃ stripādāṃś ca catur^aṅgāṃs tathā^eva ca/
T02divav33u:1898: u1.68cd/.nāryo yatra prasūyante rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:1900: u1.69cd/.pramadā yatra deśe tu rājā tatra vinaśyati//
T02divav33u:1902: u1.70cd/.pramadā yatra sūyante rāṣṭraṃ tatra vinaśyati//
T02divav33u:1903: u1.71ab/.kharāś ca mahiṣāś ca^api paśavo +atha tathāvidhāḥ/
T02divav33u:1904: u1.71cd/.dvi^tri^śīrṣāḥ prasūyante deśe yatra sa naśyati//
T02divav33u:1906: u1.72cd/.jāyante yatra deśe tu sa deśo laghu naśyati//
T02divav33u:1907: u1.73ab/.pādāv ubhau yadā vaiśyā gurviṇī saṃprasūyate/
T02divav33u:1910: u1.74cd/.rājā vā rājāmātyo vā saha deśena naśyati//
T02divav33u:1912: u1.75cd/.trinetras trimukho vā^api vidyāt tatra mahad^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:1913: u1.76ab/.saukareṇa tu vakreṇa śarīraṃ mānuṣaṃ yadi/
T02divav33u:1914: u1.76cd/.sūtaṃ catur^diśaṃ rāṣṭraṃ hanyāt tatra na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:1915: u1.77ab/.ādityasya tu rūpeṇa mānuṣo yatra jāyate/
T02divav33u:1917: u1.78ab/.uttānaśāyī bālas tu deśaṃ yatra dvijottamaḥ/
T02divav33u:1918: u1.78cd/.dṛṣṭaḥ pravyāharan vedān kṣipraṃ deśo vinaśyatei//
T02divav33u:1919: u1.79ab/.kukṣiṃ bhitvā yadā bālo garbhān niṣkramate svayaṃ/
T02divav33u:1920: u1.79cd/.atrāṇāṃ mātaraṃ kṛtvā sa deśo naśyate laghu//
T02divav33u:1921: u1.80ab/.garbha^sthāḥ sūkarā; uṣṭrāḥ sarpāś ca śakunis tathā/
T02divav33u:1922: u1.80cd/.strīṇāṃ garbhāt prasūyante deśe tu bhayam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:1924: u1.81cd/.gāvo yatra prasūyante nirdiśed bhayam āgataṃ//
T02divav33u:1928: u1.83cd/.sajano jāyate yatra rāṣṭraṃ sādhipatiṃ dahet//
T02divav33u:1930: u1.84cd/.śuṣyeta sakalaṃ śasyaṃ janaś ca vilayaṃ vrajet/
T02divav33u:1932: u1.85cd/.svayaṃ kṣubhyeta tad^rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyeta na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:1933: u1.86ab/.phale phalaṃ yadā paśyet puṣpe vā puṣpam āśritaṃ/
T02divav33u:1934: u1.86cd/.garbhāḥ sraveyur nārīṇāṃ yuvarājaś ca vadhyate//
T02divav33u:1935: u1.87ab/.akāle pādapā yatra puṣpyanti ca phalanti ca/(p.143)
T02divav33u:1936: u1.87cd/.latā gulmo +atha vallī vā deśe tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:1938: u1.88cd/.kūjamānaṃ pataṅgaṃ vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:1939: u1.89ab/.vṛkṣāṇāṃ maṇḍapānāṃ vā chāyā na parivartate/
T02divav33u:1943: u1.91ab/.anāvartaṃ yadā puṣpaṃ phalaṃ ca^api pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:1944: u1.91cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya durbhikṣaṃ kalahaṃ vadet//
T02divav33u:1945: u1.92ab/.sthānāsthānaṃ gatā vṛkṣā dṛśyeyur yatra kutracit/
T02divav33u:1948: u1.93cd/.śastraṃ mūrcchayate tatra taskaraiś ca^api pūrvavat//
T02divav33u:1949: u1.94ab/.kampate rudate śāstā gacchan vā yatra dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:1951: u1.95ab/.devatā yatra deśe tu nṛtyanti ca hasanti ca/
T02divav33u:1952: u1.95cd/.aśrūṇi pātayeyur vā tadā vidyān mahad^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:1953: u1.96ab/.devatā yatra krīḍanti jvalanti nimiṣanti vā/
T02divav33u:1954: u1.96cd/.caleyur athavā yatra kṣiti^po +anyo bhavet tadā//
T02divav33u:1955: u1.97ab/.śivaliṅaṃ yadā kamped gagane vā^atha dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:1956: u1.97cd/.nimajjate dharaṇyāṃ vā dhruvaṃ rāja^vadho bhavet//

T02divav33u:1963: u1.101ab/.varṣate kusumaṃ yatra rakta^vindum atha^api vā/
T02divav33u:1964: u1.101cd/.prāṇino vividhān vā^api vidyāc caura^bhayaṃ tadā//

T02divav33u:1968: u1.103cd/.rājyakāmaḥ kumāro vā kṣubhyed viṭapako +api vā//

T02divav33u:1971: u1.105ab/.pated antaḥpure vidyud vṛkṣe vā^apy āśrame tathā/
T02divav33u:1972: u1.105cd/.puri caityacchāyāyāṃ vā rājārthe patitā hi sā//

T02divav33u:1982: u1.110cd/.śoṇitaṃ sakarakaṃ syāt tadā vidyāt parād bhayaṃ//

T02divav33u:1988: u1.113cd/.gaganaṃ dahyate tatra loka^pīḍā jvareṇa ca//
T02divav33u:1993: u1.116ab/.nāpsu majjati na^apy agnau pūrvavac ca na dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:1994: u1.116cd/.agnir utpatsyate tatra koṣṭha^āgāraṃ daheta saḥ//
T02divav33u:1997: u1.118ab/.jalaṃ jājvalyamānaṃ tu matsyo nirdahati svayaṃ/

T02divav33u:2003: u1.121ab/.kuśūlo yatra dṛśyeta kampayan tu vasundharāṃ/

T02divav33u:2010: u1.124cd/.tatas taṃ na cirāt paśyet saṃgrāmaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ//

T02divav33u:2013: u1.126ab/.prāsādāś ca prakampante śaraṇāni gṛhāṇi ca/
T02divav33u:2019: u1.129ab/.vṛkṣāḥ sarpāḥ prakampeyur mucyeyus tvaco vā tathā/
T02divav33u:2020: u1.129cd/.sarvasmin eva rāṣṭre tu vidyāc chatru^bhayaṃ mahat//
T02divav33u:2021: u1.130ab/.dine hy ulkā^prayuktir vā jvalantī yadi dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2023: u1.131ab/.asiṃ prajvalitaṃ paśyet tomaraṃ cakram eva ca/
T02divav33u:2025: u1.132ab/.dīrgham ucchvasate vā +aśvaḥ aśrūṇi ca nipātayet/
T02divav33u:2026: u1.132cd/.pādena karṣate śīghraṃ yuddhe rāja^vadho dhruvaṃ//

T02divav33u:2030: u1.134cd/.vināśaṃ tasya deśasya niyamāc chīghram ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2031: u1.135ab/.āravanti yadā ghoraṃ meghā vṛkamṛgās tathā/

T02divav33u:2034: u1.136cd/.gṛhāḥ śūnyodakena^api śuṣkās tatra bhayaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2038: u1.138cd/.anyad vā^api praharaṇaṃ parebhyo jāyate bhayaṃ//
