T02divav33u:2043: u1.141ab/.nirgranthā; ṛṣayaḥ santo deśān prakrameyur yataḥ/
T02divav33u:2044: u1.141cd/.nadīṃ bhitvā nikuñjānvā sa deśo naśyate +acirāt//
T02divav33u:2045: u1.142ab/.yatrauṣadhyaś ca virasā jalaṃ ca parihīyate/
T02divav33u:2047: u1.143ab/.matsyāḥ kūrmāś ca sarpāś ca mriyante yatra jāṅgalāḥ/
T02divav33u:2049: u1.144ab/.apūrvāḥ pakṣiṇo yatra sthale vāriṇi; eva vā/
T02divav33u:2051: u1.145ab/.mahā^patho yadā kakṣaiḥ prasṛtair apatho bhavet/
T02divav33u:2054: u1.147/.paṭha bhos triśaṅko puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu
T02divav33u:2056: u1.148/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin puruṣa^pinyādhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu
T02divav33u:2060: śīrṣa^mūrdhni eka^pāda^talaṃ bhavet/ catur^daśa gṛṣṭayo nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ
T02divav33u:2061: yatra saṃdṛśyate/ tad anyathā na bhavati/ nakṣatre yatra yo jātas tatra tatra saṃkṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2063: u2.1ab/.kṛttikāyāṃ hi jātasya mukhe vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
T02divav33u:2065: u2.2ab/.bhogavān yaśasā yuktaḥ paṇḍito jvalati śriyā/
T02divav33u:2066: u2.2cd/.kṛttikāsv atha jātasya bhavaty etad dhi lakṣaṇaṃ//
T02divav33u:2067: u2.3ab/.dṛśyate vraṇa; evāyaṃ yasya vai catur^aṅgulaḥ/
T02divav33u:2068: u2.3cd/.rohiṇyāṃ jātakaḥ so +api vidvān dharma^rataḥ sadā//
T02divav33u:2071: u2.5ab/.grīvāyām ardha^gṛṣṭyā tu dāho yasya pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2072: u2.5cd/.mṛgaśīrṣe hy asau jātaḥ śūro bhoga^samarpitaḥ//
T02divav33u:2073: u2.6ab/.ardha^dvitīya^gṛṣṭyā tu pinyo vāme hi yasya tu/
T02divav33u:2074: u2.6cd/.ārdrāyāṃ krodhano jāto mūrkho gopatikaś ca saḥ//
T02divav33u:2075: u2.7ab/.vāme kakṣe vraṇo yasya kṛṣṇaś ca^eva punarvasau/
T02divav33u:2078: u2.8cd/.cakra^madhye ca haste ca sūryaś candro virājate//
T02divav33u:2081: u2.10ab/.hṛdaye yasya dāhaḥ syād śleṣāyāṃ kali^priyaḥ/
T02divav33u:2082: u2.10cd/.duḥśīlo duḥkhasaṃvāso maithunābhir ataś ca saḥ//
T02divav33u:2083: u2.11ab/.adha; urasi pṛṣṭhe vā yasya vraṇaḥ pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2084: u2.11cd/.maghāyāṃ dhanavān jāto mahā^ātma dhārmiko naraḥ//
T02divav33u:2091: u2.15ab/.vyaṃjane yasya pinyas tu dṛśyate niyamenahi/
T02divav33u:2092: u2.15cd/.citrā^jātaḥ sa ced rogī nṛtyagītaratas tathā//
T02divav33u:2093: u2.16ab/.vyañjane +api ca; ūrdhve vā pītaḥ pinyaḥpradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2094: u2.16cd/.jātaḥ svātyām asau lubdho guṇadviṣṭo hy apaṇḍitaḥ//
T02divav33u:2095: u2.17ab/.kugṛṣṭyā yasya; ūrūbhyāṃ pinyo lohita; eva hi/
T02divav33u:2101: u2.20ab/.adho yasya^iha ca^ūrubhyāṃ pinyo jyeṣṭhe sa jāyate/
T02divav33u:2102: u2.20cd/.alpa^ayur apriyo duḥkhī duḥśīlaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā//
T02divav33u:2103: u2.21ab/.jānubhyām ūrdhvataḥ sūkṣmo vraṇo yasya^iha dṛśyate/(p.150)
T02divav33u:2104: u2.21cd/.mūlena bhāgyavān jātaḥ svagṛhaṃ nāśayel laghu//
T02divav33u:2108: u2.23cd/.yadi dṛśyet sa medhāvī bhogavān syāj jana^priyaḥ//
T02divav33u:2109: u2.24ab/.dvitīyaḥ pinyo dṛśyeta dhanavān bhogavān sadā/
T02divav33u:2111: u2.25ab/.dhaniṣṭhāyāṃ ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2113: u2.26ab/.dvikugṛṣṭyā ca jaṅghāyāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pinyaḥ pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2114: u2.26cd/.mūrkhaḥ śatabhiṣāyāṃ tu mriyate hy adakena saḥ//
T02divav33u:2115: u2.27ab/.adho jaṅghāṃ kugṛṣṭyā tu pūrvabhādrapade vraṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:2116: u2.27cd/.paropatāpako mūrkho daridraś caura; ity api//
T02divav33u:2117: u2.28ab/.kuguṣṭyā yasya pinyaḥ syāj jāto bhādrapada^uttare/
T02divav33u:2119: u2.29ab/.ubhayoḥ pādayoḥ sūkṣmaḥ pinyo yasya pradṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2120: u2.29cd/.revatyāṃ jāyate nīco nāpitaḥ sa havaty api//
T02divav33u:2122: u2.30cd/.arogo balavān nityam aśvinyāṃ jāta; eva saḥ//
T02divav33u:2123: u2.31ab/.atha pāṇitale pinyo bharaṇyām akṣayaḥ smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:2125: u2.32ab/.nakṣatrāṇāṃ padaṃ hy etad yena caryā prajāyate/
T02divav33u:2126: u2.32cd/.etad dhi loka^prajñānaṃ loko yatra samāśritaḥ//iti pinyādhyāyāḥ//
T02divav33u:2127: u2.33/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin piṭakādhyāyaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:2128: vyākhāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān trisaṅkuḥ/(p.151)
T02divav33u:2131: u3.1cd/.strīṇāṃ ca puruṣāṇāṃ ca piṭakaṃ sarva^karmakaṃ//
T02divav33u:2132: u3.2ab/.lābha^alābhaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2133: u3.2cd/.prājñā yenābhijānanti taṃ ca sarvaṃ nibodhatāṃ//
T02divav33u:2134: u3.3ab/.tatrābhighātadagdhā vā tilās tad rūpakā; api/
T02divav33u:2139: u3.5cd/.yadā savarṇa^piṭako mūrdhni rājā mahān smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:2140: u3.6ab/.śīrṣe tu dhana^dhānyābhyāṃ kāntaye subhagāya ca/
T02divav33u:2144: u3.8ab/.aśrūpātaḥ dhruvaṃ śokaḥ śravaṇe goṣu nāśakaḥ/
T02divav33u:2149: u3.10cd/.cibuke hanudeśe ca dhanaṃ gāvaḥ satāṃ śriyaḥ//
T02divav33u:2150: u3.11ab/.gale tu dānam āpnoti pānam ābharaṇāni ca/
T02divav33u:2152: u3.12ab/.jāto +ayaṃ śiraso mūle hanuni ca dhana^kṣayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2155: u3.13cd/.pārśve tu sukha^śayyāyai stane tu sutajanyatā//
T02divav33u:2157: u3.14cd/.bāhvoḥ śatru^vināśāya yuktaṃ strī^lābha; eva ca//
T02divav33u:2158: u3.15ab/.dadāty ābharaṇaṃ jātaḥ prabāhvoḥ kurpare kṣudhā/
T02divav33u:2160: u3.16ab/.saubhagaṃ dhana^lābhaṃca jātaḥ pāṇau dadāti ca/
T02divav33u:2161: u3.16cd/.puṣpito hy ekadeśe tu daśaneṣu nakheṣu ca//
T02divav33u:2164: u3.18ab/.jaghane vyasanaṃ vidyān nārya dauḥśīlyam eva ca/
T02divav33u:2165: u3.18cd/.putrotpattis tu vṛṣaṇe liṅge bhāryā tu śobhanā//
T02divav33u:2168: u3.20ab/.jānau śatru^bhayaṃ vidyāt tathā^eva ca dhana^kṣayaṃ/
T02divav33u:2169: u3.20cd/.jānu^saṃdhau vijānīyān meḍhrake hy atha jātakaiḥ/
T02divav33u:2171: u3.21ab/.strī^lābhaṃ vakṣasi ca^eva bhaved anyo nirarthakaḥ/
T02divav33u:2172: u3.21cd/.jaṅghāyāṃ parasevā tu paradeśāt tu bhujyate//
T02divav33u:2173: u3.22ab/.maṇibandhe tu piṭako bandhanaṃ nirdiśed dhruvaṃ/(p.153)
T02divav33u:2174: u3.22cd/.parivādhaṃ sa labhate bandhanaṃ ca na saṃśayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2175: u3.22ef/.pārśve gulphe ca jānīyāc chastreṇa maraṇaṃ dhruvaṃ//
T02divav33u:2178: u3.24ab/.yasya pāda^tale jātas tathā hasta^tale +api ca/
T02divav33u:2179: u3.24cd/.dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ sutā gāvaḥ striyo yānāni ca^apnuyāt//
T02divav33u:2180: u3.25ab/.snigdhaṃ snigdheṣu vijñeyaṃ caleṣu ca calaṃ phalaṃ/
T02divav33u:2181: u3.25cd/.sthāna^sthe vipulaṃ dadyāt phalaṃ nṛṇāṃ śubhodayaṃ//
T02divav33u:2182: u3.26ab/.vivarṇo viparītaś ca phalaṃ sarvaṃ prayacchati/
T02divav33u:2183: u3.26cd/.puṃsāṃ madhye ye snigdhāś ca deśe dakṣiṇataś ca ye/
T02divav33u:2184: u3.26ef/.tathā ca^abhyantare ca^eva sthāne tu pratipūjitāḥ//
T02divav33u:2185: u3.27ab/.strīṇāṃ mṛduṣu deśeṣu vaktrān teṣu ca parvataḥ/
T02divav33u:2186: u3.27cd/.tattvaṃ vijñāya pinyānaṃ sthānaṃ varṇaṃ ca janma ca//
T02divav33u:2187: u3.28ab/.sthāna^asthānaṃ ca matimān vikāraṃ gatim eva ca/
T02divav33u:2188: u3.28cd/.ādiśet tu naraḥ paścād yatha^evaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ//
T02divav33u:2189: u3.29ab/.vāmabhāge tu nārīṇāṃ vijñeeyāḥ piṭakāḥ śubhāḥ/
T02divav33u:2190: u3.29cd/.dakṣiṇe tu manuṣyāṇāṃ bhavanti hy artha^sādhakāḥ//
T02divav33u:2191: u3.30ab/.viparītās tu piṭakā moghās tu bahavaḥ smṛtāḥ/
T02divav33u:2192: u3.30cd/.yathoktānaṃ ca sandhisthāḥ sarve viphaladāḥ smṛtāḥ//
T02divav33u:2193: u3.31ab/.siddhāḥ dhruvā vraṇā bhidyās tathā sadyaḥ^kṛtāś ca ye/
T02divav33u:2194: u3.31cd/.dharma^kīlasamāś ca^eva sarve te piṭakāḥ smṛtāḥ//
T02divav33u:2196: u3.32cd/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ śiṣyebhyo nitya^darśanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2197: u3.33ab/.na nakhena na śastreṇa na^āyasena kathaṃcana/(p.154)
T02divav33u:2198: u3.33cd/.kāñcanena suvarṇena dahed viprāṃś ca bhojayed//
T02divav33u:2200: u3.35/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac
T02divav33u:2203: u4.1ab/.śubha^aśubhaṃ ca svapnānāṃ yat phalaṃ samudāhṛtaṃ/
T02divav33u:2205: u4.1ef/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
T02divav33u:2206: u4.2ab/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante rājānnaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
T02divav33u:2207: u4.2cd/.suvarṇaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca^eva kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
T02divav33u:2208: u4.3ab/.sārasāṃś ca śukān haṃsān krauñcān śvetāṃś ca pakṣiṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:2209: u4.3cd/.yas tu paśyati svapne vai kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate/
T02divav33u:2210: u4.4ab/.samṛddhāni ca śasyāni navāni surabhīṇi ca/
T02divav33u:2211: u4.4cd/.padminīṃ puṣpitāṃ ca^api purṇa^kumbhāṃs tathā^eva ca//
T02divav33u:2212: u4.5ab/.prasannam udakaṃ ca^eva puṣpāṇi vividhāni ca/
T02divav33u:2213: u4.5cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
T02divav33u:2214: u4.6ab/.pāṇau pāde +atha vā jānau śasterṇa dhanuṣā^api vā/
T02divav33u:2217: u4.7cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kuṭumbaṃ tasya vardhate//
T02divav33u:2220: u4.9ab/.patitaś ca^aruhed bhūyas tatrasthaś ca vibudhyate/(p.155)
T02divav33u:2222: u4.10ab/.goyutaṃ ca rathaṃ svapne hayaṃ vā yo +abhirohati/
T02divav33u:2226: u4.12ab/.āsane śayane yane śarīre +atha gṛhe kṣayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2227: u4.12cd/.yeṣām ārohaṇaṃ śastaṃ teṣām ārohaṇāt kṣayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2228: u4.12ef/.yeṣām ārohaṇād doṣās teṣām ārohaṇād guṇāḥ//
T02divav33u:2229: u4.13ab/.tri^sāhasraṃ bhavet kaṇṭhe daśa śīrṣasya chedane/
T02divav33u:2232: u4.14cd/.śuṣka^udapāna^ṃ tu labhate svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:2234: u4.15cd/.ajāṃ vā paśyataḥ svapne vyādhi^kleśaṃ vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2235: u4.16ab/.kākaṃ śyenam ulūkaṃ vā gṛdhraṃ vā^apy atha vartakaṃ/
T02divav33u:2236: u4.16cd/.mayūraṃ paśyataḥ svapne tasya vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2237: u4.17ab/.nagnaṃ paśyati hy ātmānaṃ pāṃśunā dhvastam eva vā/
T02divav33u:2239: u4.18ab/.kuṇḍthāḥ striyo +atha saṃlokya caurān dyūta^karāṃs tathā/
T02divav33u:2240: u4.18cd/.kuśīlāṃś cāraṇān dhūrtān svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:2242: u4.19cd/.udvartanaṃ vā kurvāṇaḥ svapna^ante rogam arcchati//
T02divav33u:2243: u4.20ab/.dhvajaṃ chatraṃ vitānaṃ vā svapna^ante yasya dhāryate/
T02divav33u:2245: u4.21acd/.antrais tu yasya nagaraṃ samantāt parivāryate/(p.156)
T02divav33u:2247: u4.22ab/.manuṣyaṃ bhūmi^bhāgaṃ vā svapna^ante grasate yadi/
T02divav33u:2248: u4.22cd/.hradaś ca vā samudro +ayaṃ mahad^aiśvaryam āpnuyāt//
T02divav33u:2249: u4.23ab/.dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śastraṃ raktam ābharaṇaṃ dhvajaṃ/
T02divav33u:2250: u4.23cd/.kavacaṃ vā labhet svapne dhana^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2251: u4.24ab/.prapātaṃ parvataṃ tālaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ kuñjaraṃ hayaṃ/
T02divav33u:2253: u4.24ef/.svapne prapatitau dṛṣṭvā rājñāṃ vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2255: u4.25cd/.tayor astaṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājño vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2257: u4.26cd/.valmīkaṃ bhasma^rāśiṃ vā svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2258: u4.27ab/.kṛṣṇa^vastrā tu yā nārī kālī kāmayate naraṃ/
T02divav33u:2260: u4.28ab/.tamasi praviśet svapne śambhor vā ca^amaraṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2261: u4.28cd/.vṛkṣād vā prapatet svapne maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2262: u4.29ab/.vṛkṣāṃ kāṣṭhaṃ tṛṇaṃ vā^api virucaṃ yas tu paśyati/
T02divav33u:2263: u4.29cd/.svapne śīrṣaṃ śarīraṃ vā maraṇaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2264: u4.30ab/.devo vā varṣate yatra yatra ca^eva^aśaniḥ patet/
T02divav33u:2265: u4.30cd/.bhūmir vā kampate yatra svapne vyasanam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2266: u4.31ab/.candra^ādityau yadi svapne khaṇḍau bhinnau ca paśyati/
T02divav33u:2267: u4.31cd/.patitau patamānau vā cakṣus tasya vinaśyati//
T02divav33u:2271: u4.33cd/.labdhvā tu puruṣaḥ svapne dhana^nāśaṃ samarcchati//
T02divav33u:2272: u4.34ab/.gāyantī vā hasantī vā nṛtyantī vā vibudhyate/
T02divav33u:2277: u4.36cd/.krīḍed akuśalāṅkair vā svapne dṛṣṭvā dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
T02divav33u:2278: u4.37ab/.āsane śayane yane vāstre sābharaṇe gṛhe/
T02divav33u:2279: u4.37cd/.naṣṭe bhraṣṭe viśīrṇe vā; āyāsam adhigacchati//
T02divav33u:2283: u4.39cd/.utpadyate dhruvaṃ tasya skandha^nyāso na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2284: u4.40ab/.abhīkṣṇaṃ varṣate devo jalaṃ pāṃśum atha^api vā/
T02divav33u:2285: u4.40cd/.aṅgāraṃ vā^api varṣeta maraṇaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2287: u4.41cd/.rajju jālena vā svapne para^cakrād vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2291: u4.43cd/.gāyate hasate ca^eva prahāraṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2292: u4.44ab/.yaṃ kṛṣṇa^vasanā nārī; ārdrā vā malinātha vā/
T02divav33u:2293: u4.44cd/.pariṣvajet naraṃ svapne bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2294: u4.45ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpo yadi svapne hy abhirohati yaṃ naraṃ/
T02divav33u:2295: u4.45cd/.gātrāṇi veṣṭayed vā^api bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2296: u4.46ab/.latābhiḥ sthāṇu^vṛndair vā yantrai vā parivāryate/(p.158)
T02divav33u:2297: u4.46cd/.svapna^ante puruṣo yas tu bandhanaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2299: u4.47cd/.yasya chidyeran svapna^ante bandhanāt sa vimucyate//
T02divav33u:2300: u4.48ab/.viṣamāṇi ca nimnāni parvatān nagarāṇi ca/
T02divav33u:2301: u4.48cd/.yas tu paśyati svapna^ante kṣipraṃ kleśād vimucyate//
T02divav33u:2302: u4.49ab/.pūtanā vā piśācā vā duścalā malinā^atha vā/
T02divav33u:2303: u4.49cd/.evaṃrūpāṇi rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā svapne dhruvaṃ kaliḥ//
T02divav33u:2304: u4.50ab/.susnātaṃ ca suveśaṃ ca sugandhaṃ śukla^vāsasaṃ/
T02divav33u:2305: u4.50cd/.puruṣaṃ vā^atha nārīṃ vā dṛṣṭvā svapne mahat^sukhaṃ//
T02divav33u:2306: u4.51ab/.tṛṇaṃ vṛkṣama atho kāṣṭhaṃ virūḍhaṃ yatra dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2307: u4.51cd/.gṛhe vā yadi vā kṣetre kṣipraṃ dravya^kṣayo bhavet//
T02divav33u:2309: u4.52cd/.naro vā labhate nārīṃ nārī vā labhate naraṃ//
T02divav33u:2311: u4.53cd/.svapna^ante yas tu paśyeta strī^lābhaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2312: u4.54ab/.yas tu hy annāni paśyeta bhūṣaṇaṃ nigaḍais tathā/
T02divav33u:2313: u4.54cd/.naras tu labhate bhāryāṃ nārī vā labhate patiṃ//
T02divav33u:2314: u4.55ab/.mekhalāṃ karṇikāṃ mālāṃ strīṇām ābharaṇāni ca/
T02divav33u:2315: u4.55cd/.labdhvā naro labhed bhāryāṃ nārī ca labhate patiṃ//
T02divav33u:2317: u4.56cd/.abhivadeta yā nārī patiṃ sā labhate +acirāt//
T02divav33u:2318: u4.57ab/.eṣām anyatamaḥ kuṣau praviśec ca yadi striyāḥ/
T02divav33u:2320: u4.58ab/.phalāni ca samagrāṇi vanāni haritāni ca//
T02divav33u:2323: u4.59cd/.labdhā nārī tu svapna^ante śrīmat^putraṃ prasūyate//
T02divav33u:2324: u4.60ab/.upāyana^sūtrayor antaḥ sajjaṃ tatra tu piṇḍakaṃ/
T02divav33u:2325: u4.60cd/.svapne yā labhate nārī sā^api putraṃ prasūyate/
T02divav33u:2326: u4.60ef/.yamaṃ tu bhājanaṃ ca^api yamaṃ tu sā prasūyate//
T02divav33u:2327: u4.61ab/.mlāyantīm atha grīṣmān te taruṇīm ātmikām api/
T02divav33u:2328: u4.61cd/.śuṣkāṃ dṛṣṭvā tathā svapne svapakṣa^maraṇaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2329: u4.62ab/.bāhavo yasya vardhante cakṣur aṅgulayo +api vā/
T02divav33u:2330: u4.62cd/.jñātayo tasya vardhante śatruṇāṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2331: u4.63ab/.badhyante bāhavo yasya cakṣuś ca vyākulaṃ bhavet/
T02divav33u:2332: u4.63cd/.bāhur vā prapated yasya sva^pakṣa^maranaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2333: u4.64ab/.devo vā yadi vā preto nāryā vastraṃ phalāni vā/
T02divav33u:2334: u4.64cd/.svapne prayacchate yasyāḥ putras tasyāḥ prajāyate//
T02divav33u:2335: u4.65ab/.apakṛṣṭo rudanyo vā nagno +atha malinaḥ kṛśaḥ/
T02divav33u:2337: u4.66ab/.carma yantraṃ gaṇitaṃ vā kīlaṃ vā^atha kilāṭakaṃ/
T02divav33u:2338: u4.66cd/.svapne labdhvā ca prāpnu[jānī]yād dhruvaṃ vastra^āgamo bhavet//
T02divav33u:2339: u4.67ab/.amānuṣo +atha rājā vā devaḥ preto +atha brāhmaṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:2340: u4.67cd/.svapne yathā te jalpa^nti sa tathā^artho bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:2342: u4.68cd/.yac ca^anusmarate dṛṣṭvā yac ca^api bahu paśyati//
T02divav33u:2344: u4.69cd/.viṣamaṃ vā tathā^adhvānaṃ chidraṃ vā pratipadyate//
T02divav33u:2345: u4.70ab/.agniṃ prajvalitaṃ taptaṃ śamitvā tu praśasyate/(p.160)
T02divav33u:2346: u4.70cd/.gṛhāṇāṃ karaṇaṃ śastaṃ bhedanaṃ na praśasyate//
T02divav33u:2347: u4.71ab/.nirmalaṃ gaganaṃ śastaṃ sameghaṃ na praśasyate//
T02divav33u:2348: u4.71cd/.prasannam udakaṃ śastaṃ kaluṣaṃ na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2349: u4.72ab/.adhvānaṃ gamanaṃ śastaṃ na kvacit saṃnivartanaṃ/
T02divav33u:2351: u4.73ab/.māṃsasya darśanaṃ sādhu bhakṣaṇaṃ na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2352: u4.73cd/.madyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ pānaṃ tu na praśasyate//
T02divav33u:2353: u4.74ab/.pṛthivī haritā śastā vivarṇā na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2355: u4.75ab/.svapneṣu ruditaṃ śastaṃ hasitaṃ na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2357: u4.76ab/.mālyasya darśanaṃ śastaṃ dhāraṇaṃ na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2358: u4.76cd/.gātraṃ vikartitaṃ sādhu prokṣitaṃ na praśasyate//
T02divav33u:2360: u4.77cd/.vyādhito malinaḥ śasto bhūṣito na praśasyate/
T02divav33u:2362: u4.78ab/.dhūmrā ghanā dundubhi^śaṅkha^śabdo vāto +abhra^vṛṣṭiś ca tathā samantāt/
T02divav33u:2363: u4.78cd/.sarva^sthirāṇāṃ ca calaś ca yaḥ syād ye ca^antare doṣa^kṛtā
T02divav33u:2365: u4.79ab/.pūrveṣu rūpeṣu yathāvad iṣṭā rāja^rṣayo deva^gaṇāś ca sarve/
T02divav33u:2366: u4.79cd/.yad brāhmaṇa^gātra^vikartanaṃ ca; etāni sarvāṇy api śobhanāni//
T02divav33u:2367: u4.80ab/.yat pūrva^rūpeṣu bhavet praśastaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni śamaṃ nayanti/
T02divav33u:2368: u4.80cd/.gāvaḥ pradānaṃ dvija^pūjanaṃ ca duḥsvapnam etena parijitaṃ syāt//
T02divav33u:2369: u4.81ab/.devaṃ ca yaṃ bhaktigato manuṣyas taṃ tu parāṃś ca^arcayituṃ
T02divav33u:2370: u4.81cd/.svapnaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā prathame pradoṣe saṃvatsara^ante +asya vipākam
T02divav33u:2372: u4.82ab/.ṣaṇ^māsikaṃ yac ca bhaved dvitīye ṣaṭpākṣikaṃ yat tu bhavet tṛtīye/
T02divav33u:2373: u4.82cd/.adhyardha^māse taram eva yat syāt phalec caturthe
T02divav33u:2376: u4.83cd/.pūjā gurūṇāṃ parimiṣṭam annaṃ duḥsvapnam etāni vināśayanti//
T02divav33u:2377: u4.84ab/.ayaṃ bhoḥ puṣkarasārin svapna^adhyāya^nāma^adhyāyaḥ/ atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārinn aparam api svapna^adhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/
T02divav33u:2381: u5.1cd/.nimittaṃ yādṛśaṃ yasya śṛṇu vakṣyāmi tatvataḥ//
T02divav33u:2382: u5.2ab/.jāgrato yadi vā trasto divā svapnāni paśyati/
T02divav33u:2383: u5.2cd/.na tu bhayaṃ bhavet tasya jānīyād eva buddhimān//
T02divav33u:2384: u5.3ab/.yasya tu yo bhavec chatrur yasya vidheyam icchati/
T02divav33u:2385: u5.3cd/.svapne tu kalahaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣipraṃ prītir bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:2387: u5.4cd/.adhvānaṃ cira^kālena tathā hy eṣa nivartate//
T02divav33u:2388: u5.5ab/.madhyame bhavate naiva kṣipraṃ bhavati paścime/
T02divav33u:2390: u5.6ab/.dṛṣṭvā jalacarān matsyān evaṃ jānīta buddhimān/
T02divav33u:2391: u5.6cd/.yat kiñcid ārabhiṣyāmi kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:2392: u5.7ab/.campāyāṃ dhṛṣaṇaṃ haste dhṛṣet svapna^antareṣu vā/
T02divav33u:2394: u5.8ab/.sarvāṇi khalu pānāni madhurāṇi sukhāni ca/
T02divav33u:2395: u5.8cd/.yas tu pibati svapna^ante sa ca lābhaiḥ prayujyate//
T02divav33u:2397: u5.9cd/.pratibuddhas tu jānīyāt śatrur eva pramūrcchati//
T02divav33u:2398: u5.10ab/.upari kākā gṛdhrāś ca dhāvanty upari yānti ca/
T02divav33u:2401: u5.11cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād bhāryā me jāram icchati//
T02divav33u:2402: u5.12ab/.ekaś ca dharaṇau pādo dvitīyaḥ śirasi sthitaḥ/
T02divav33u:2404: u5.13ab/.samudraṃ yadi paśyed vā pātum icchati tajjalaṃ/
T02divav33u:2406: u5.14ab/.vṛkṣaṃ parvatam āruhya nāgaṃ ca turagaṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2408: u5.15ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet pitṝn yān iha ca^anyathā/
T02divav33u:2409: u5.15cd/.tathā mātā pitā ca^eva tasya jīvanti te ciraṃ//
T02divav33u:2412: u5.17ab/.ānanaṃ ca^udake dṛṣṭvā madhye +agnau ca vidhāvitaṃ/
T02divav33u:2416: u5.19ab/.caurāṇām api sāmagrīṃ svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
T02divav33u:2418: u5.20ab/.kṛṣṇa^sarpa^gṛhītaṃ tu svapna^ante yas tu paśyati/
T02divav33u:2421: u5.21cd/.yas tu ca^ābharaṇaṃ paśyed bandhu^vargo bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:2424: u5.23ab/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyec ca^ātmānam agnitāpitaṃ/
T02divav33u:2430: u5.26ab/.yastu bānara^yuktena gacchate pur imāṃ diśaṃ/
T02divav33u:2431: u5.26cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād rātrir eṣā hy apaścimā//
T02divav33u:2434: u5.28ab/.sumanāṃ vārṣikaṃ [kīṃ] ca^eva kumudāny utpalāni ca/
T02divav33u:2437: u5.29cd/.pratibuddho vijānīyād yakṣā me hy anukampakāḥ//
T02divav33u:2441: u5.31cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyet subhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2442: u5.32ab/.suvarṇaṃ ca tathā rūpyaṃ muktāhāraṃ tathāiva ca/
T02divav33u:2443: u5.32cd/.yas tu svapna^antare paśyan nidhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2444: u5.33ab/.bandhanaṃ bahu dṛṣṭvā tu chedanaṃ kuṭṭanaṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2448: vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chūyatāṃ/ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ//(E)35
T02divav33u:2450: u6.1/.yadi phālgune māse nirghoṣa upari bhavet manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ
T02divav33u:2452: codayati/ yadi devo garjati prathamaṃ mahā^sasyāni bhavanti/ paścimasasyaṃ na bhavet/ kalahaṃ
T02divav33u:2453: u6.2/.yadi caitre māse devo garjati tadā sarva^sasya^samutpattiṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2454: yadi candra^graho bhavati mahān sannipāto bhavati/ śūnyāni grāma^kṣetrāṇi
T02divav33u:2455: bhaviṣyanti/ yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2456: u6.3/.yadi vaiśākhe māse devo garjati subhikṣaṃ codayati/ yadi pūrve paścime śaṅkhe candra^graho bhavati kṣemaṃ codayati/ yadi ca^ulkā^pāto
T02divav33u:2457: bhavati yasmiṃś ca janapade nipatati tatra deśe pradhāna^puruṣasya vināśo
T02divav33u:2458: bhavati/ yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati subhikṣaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2459: u6.4/.yadi jeyṣṭhe māse devo garjati rogaṃ codayati/ yadi sūrya^graho
T02divav33u:2460: bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśaṃ codayati/ pūrve paścime vā śaṅkhe yadi candrasya sūryasya kiñcin nimittaṃ lakṣyate tadā kṣemaṃ codayati/ yadi
T02divav33u:2461: madhya^rātrau candra^graho bhavati manuṣyāṇām anyonya^ghātaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2462: yadi ca^upari nirghoṣo bhavati adhyakṣa^puruṣasya pīḍāṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2465: u6.5/.āṣāḍhe māse yadi sūrya^graho rucira^ābhāso bhavati subhikṣaṃ codayati/ yadi candra^graho bhavati rogaṃ codayati/ yadi vidyun niścarati
T02divav33u:2466: kalpāṇaṃ codayati/ yadi nīhāraṃ bhūmiṃ chādayati/
T02divav33u:2467: u6.6/.śrāvaṇa^māse yadi sūrya^graho bhavati rājyaṃ parivartate/ yadi
T02divav33u:2468: candra^graho bhavati prathame māse durbhikṣaṃ codayati/ śarabhaiḥ
T02divav33u:2469: śobhana^śasyanāśo bhaviṣyati/ yadi (p.165) tārakā yatra deśe patanti tatra yuddhaṃ codayati/ yadi ca^atiśayaṃ bhūmi^cālo bhavati rogaṃ codayati/ yadi nirghoṣo bhavati tatra gṛhe yo gṛha^svāmī bhavati tasya vināśaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2470: atra ca māse +abhinavaṃ prāvaraṇaṃ na prāvaritavyaṃ/ āvāho vivāho na
T02divav33u:2472: u6.7/.yady aśvayuje māse devo garjati manuṣyāṇāṃ vināśanaṃ codayati/ yadi
T02divav33u:2473: sūrya^uparāgo bhavati mahā^puruṣa^vināśaṃ codayati/ yadi pūrve yāme
T02divav33u:2474: candrasya nimittaṃ dṛśyate subhikṣaṃ codayati/ yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati ākulaṃ codayati/ pararājā deśaṃ haniṣyati/ tatra ca manuṣyā anyonyaṃ
T02divav33u:2476: u6.8/.yadi kārttike māse devo varṣati mahad^ākulaṃ codayati/ prāṇakāś ca dhānyaṃ khādiṣyanti/ yady eka^antarūpaṃ vāto vāti tatra ca manuṣyā jalena
T02divav33u:2477: vibhramiṣyanti/ mahā^ātmanaḥ puruṣasya vināśaṃ codayati/ yadi pūrve yāme
T02divav33u:2478: utpāto bhavati mahā^varṣaṃ bhavati/ mahā^puruṣasya ca maraṇaṃ bhavati/
T02divav33u:2480: u6.9/.yadi mārgaśīrṣe māsi devo garjati śasya^vināśo bhavati/ anyaś ca tatra svāmī bhavati/ yadi ca^ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati yat pūrva^bhāgīyā
T02divav33u:2481: manuṣyās teṣām āmayaṃ codayati/ yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati yas tatra janapade
T02divav33u:2483: u6.10/.yadi pauṣe māse devo garjati prathame yāme janapada^nāśo bhavati/
T02divav33u:2484: dvitīye mahā^ātmanaḥ puruṣasya bandhanaṃ codayati/ prathame yāme ca yadi
T02divav33u:2485: candra^uparāgo bhavati lohita^varṇaś ca dṛśyate udaka^āgamaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2486: mahā^ātmamanuṣyaṃ codayati/ yadi sūrya^graho bhavati śuddhapuruṣaṇāṃ raṇaṃ/ yadi tārakāḥ patantyo vidṛśyante tatra janapade ākulaṃ codayati/
T02divav33u:2487: yaty ākāśe nirghoṣo bhavati manuṣyāṇāṃ maraṇaṃ codayati/ yadi dvitīye nirghoṣo bhavati amnuṣyāś caurair hanyante/ yady atraiva māse tārakā utsṛṣṭā na candro dṛsyate sasyaṃ saṃcodayati/ yadi bhūmi^cālo bhavati mahāmanuṣyasya maraṇaṃ bhavati/ atraiva māse deva^sthānaṃ kartavyaṃ/ vṛkṣā
T02divav33u:2491: vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ//mchecked
T02divav33u:2497: u7.3ab/.tatra sarve pravarteyur yatra yeṣu bhaved bhavet/
T02divav33u:2500: u7.4cd/.kṛkare svalpa^celatvaṃ purīṣe tu dṛśaṃ śravaḥ//
T02divav33u:2501: u7.5ab/.bhasme vivādam aphalaṃ vālukāyāṃ tu saṃbhramaḥ/
T02divav33u:2505: u7.6cd/.pakṣayā carate vyādhiḥ patito mṛtyum ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2507: u7.7cd/.vṛkṣa^agre vidyate pānaṃ gṛheṣv atha ... lasaḥ//
T02divav33u:2509: u7.8cd/.amṛtaṃ ca sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā; odanaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2510: u7.9ab/.gavāṃ pṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ siddhir aśvapṛṣṭhe dhruvaṃ jayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2511: u7.9cd/.avikānām ajānāṃ ca pṛṣṭhe sarvatra śasyate//
T02divav33u:2512: u7.10ab/.uṣṭrapṛṣṭhe ghruvaṃ kleśaḥ śvānapṛṣṭhe ca vidravaḥ/(p.167)
T02divav33u:2513: u7.10cd/.pṛṣṭhe ca gardabhasya^iha maraṇaṃ na^atra saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2514: u7.11ab/.kīle tu maraṇaṃ vidyād yūpa^agre ca na saṃśayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2515: u7.11cd/.kumbha^sthāne śmaśāne vā mṛto vā yatra dṛśyate//
T02divav33u:2516: u7.12ab/.antarīkṣe praḍīnaṃ tu; aphalaṃ tu vinirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2520: u7.13cd/.sameṣu samake kṣetre samān varṇān vinirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2524: u7.14ef/.tāṃ diśaṃ gamanaṃ vidyād yathā tasya tathā punaḥ//
T02divav33u:2525: u7.15ab/.kīṭā vā^atha pataṅgā vā bhayaṃ yad iha dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2527: u7.16ab/.apāṃ samīpe gajamastake vā sūrya^udaye brāhmaṇa^sannidhau vā/
T02divav33u:2528: u7.16cd/.mukhya prakāśe +apy ahimastake vā yaḥ paśyate khañjanakaṃ sa
T02divav33u:2530: u7.17ab/.mātaṅga^rājo matimāṃs triśaṅkuḥ provāca tattvaṃ kañjanaṃ ca
T02divav33u:2532: u7.17cd/.snigdhe sarukṣe viṣame same ca ādeśa yad doṣa^guṇair yathoktaiḥ/
T02divav33u:2533: u7.17ef/.tamādiśet tatra samīkṣya vidvān śubha^aśubhaṃ tatphalam ādiśec ca//
T02divav33u:2535: u7.19/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃvyākhyāsyāmi/
T02divav33u:2536: tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2537: u8.1/.namaḥ sarveṣām āryāṇāṃ/ namaḥ sarveṣāṃ satyavādināṃ/ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ tapasā vīryeṇa ca imaṃ śivā^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāmi/
T02divav33u:2538: u8.2/.ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/ śāṇḍilyam idam abravīt/ yādṛśaṃ ca yathā vāśet teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāśān śṛṇotha me/ pūrvasyāṃ diśi yadi vāśet śivā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā trīn vārān vāśed vṛddhiṃ nivedayati/ caturo vārān yadi vāśed atra maṅgalaṃ nivedayati/ pañca vārān vāśed varṣāṃ
T02divav33u:2539: nivedayati/ ṣaḍvārān vāśet para^cakra^bhayaṃ nivedayati/ saptavārān vāśed bandhanaṃ
T02divav33u:2540: nivedayati/ aṣṭa vārān vāśet priya^samāgamaṃ nivedayati/ abhīkṣṇaṃ vāśet para^cakra^bhayaṃ nivedayati/ ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2541: u8.3/.dakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśed `atṛ atṛ' kurute maraṇaṃ tatra nivedayati/ caturo vārān vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ sthitvā dakṣiṇāyā eva diśāyāḥ priya^samāgamaṃ nivedayati/ artha^lābhaṃ ca
T02divav33u:2542: nivedayati/ pañca^vārān vāśed arthaṃ nivedayati/ ṣaḍvārān vāśet siddhiṃ
T02divav33u:2543: nivedayati/ saptavārān vāśed vivāda^kalahaṃ nivedayati/ aṣṭavārān vāśed bhayaṃ
T02divav33u:2544: nivedayati/ abhīkṣṇaṃ vāśed ākulaṃ nivedayati/ ety āha bhagavāṃs
T02divav33u:2546: u8.4/.paścimāyāṃ paścima^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā śivā trivārān vāśati maraṇaṃ nivedayati/ caturvārān vāśati bandhanaṃ nivedayati/ pañca^vārān vāśati varṣaṃ nivedayati/ ṣaḍvārān vāśati anna^pānaṃ nivedayati/ saptavārān vāśati maithunaṃ nivedayati/ aṣṭavārān vāśati artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2547: abhīkṣṇaṃ vāśati mahā^meghaṃ nivedayati/ ity āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2548: u8.5/.uttarasyāṃ diśi uttara^abhimukhaṃ sthitvā trivārān vāśati puruṣasya prasthitasya nirarthakaṃ gamanaṃ bhavati/ caturvārān vāśati rāja^pratibhayaṃ nivedayati/ pañca^vārān śāśati vivādaṃ nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2549: ṣaḍvārān vāśati kuśalaṃ nivedayati/ saptavārān vāśati varṣāṃ nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2553: u8.6/.diśi vidiśi ca^eva giri^prāgbhāreṣu śikhareṣu nirdeśaṃ taṃ ca śṛṇotha me/ ``amūṃ tuṣyet pipāsārtā vidyāsiddhyai tathā^eva ca''/
T02divav33u:2556: u8.8/.sarvatra siddhiṃ nirdiśet/ na ca śṛgāla^bhaye śivā (vā) me sameti apramattena smṛtimatā pūjayitavyā śivā nityaṃ/ gandha^puṣpa^upahāreṇa
T02divav33u:2557: śuśrūṣā kartavyā/ evam arcāyamānā (?) sarva^siddhiṃ nivedayiṣyati/ evaṃ
T02divav33u:2559: krauṣṭriko yadi vāśati artha^lambhaṃ nivedayati/ adhomukho yadi vāśati nidhānaṃ tatra nivedayati/ ūrdhva^mukho yadi vāśati varṣāṃ tatra nivedayati/ dvipathe yadi vāśati pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā artha^lābhaṃ nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2560: dakṣiṇa^abhimukho yadi vāśati yathā priya^samāgamanaṃ nivedayati/ dvipathe
T02divav33u:2561: paścima^abhimukho yadi vāśati kalahaṃ vivādaṃ vigrahaṃ maraṇaṃ ca
T02divav33u:2562: nivedayati/ kūpakaṇṭhake yadi vāśati arthaṃ tatra nivedayati/ śādvale yadi vāśati artha^siddhiṃ
T02divav33u:2563: nivedayati/ atimṛdukaṃ yadi vāśati vyādhikaṃ tatra nivedayati/ gītahāreṇa yadi vāśati artham anarthaṃ ca nivedayati/ tribhir vārair arthaṃ caturbhir anarthaṃ pañcabhiḥ priya^samāgamaṃ ṣaḍbhir bhojanaṃ saptabhir bhayam aṣṭabhir vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ ca/ ity āha bhagavāṃs trisaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2564: u8.9/.``atha bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi anupūrvaṃ śṛṇotha me'' /
T02divav33u:2565: nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati mārge saṃsthitasya^api sarvaṃ vakṣyāmi taṃ śṛṇotha me/
T02divav33u:2566: saṃprasthitasya puruṣasya śivā vāśati vā yā pūrva^mukhaṃ sthitvā
T02divav33u:2567: kṣipra^gamanam artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/ atha dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ vāśati yā artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/ pañcān mukhaṃ vāśati bhayaṃ nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2569: vāśati artha^lābhaṃ nivedayati/ atha saṃprasthitasya vāśati yā purataḥ sthitvā upakleśaṃ nivedayati/ atha dakṣiṇe vāśati yadi dakṣiṇa^mukhā eva diśaḥ (p.170) karma^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/ paścimato yadi vāśati caurato
T02divav33u:2570: +ahitam asya duḥkha^daurmanasyaṃ nivedayati/ atha mārge vrajato dakṣiṇato vāśati mahā^vyādhim anarthaṃ caurā muṣanti tan nivedayati/ glānasya yadi vāśati dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ, ``na sa cikitsituṃ śakyo mṛtyu^dūtena
T02divav33u:2571: coditaḥ''/ glānasya yadi vāśati uttara^mukhaṃ sthitvā ārogyadhana^lābhaṃ
T02divav33u:2572: ca nivedayati/ atha mūrdhnā vāśati yā upakreśaṃ nivedayati/ atha paścimamukhaṃ sthitvā yā anyonyaṃ vyāharate yama^śāsanaṃ [nivedayati]/
T02divav33u:2573: nānā^āhāre yadi vāśati, yā saṃkṣobhaṃ nivedayati/ ity āha bhagavāṃs
T02divav33u:2575: u8.10/.śivā purataḥ puruṣasya mārga^prayātasya yadi vāśati, yā agrataḥ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/ artha^siddhiṃ nivedayati/ mārgaṃ vrajato +asya
T02divav33u:2576: śivā vāmena^āgatya gacchate dakṣiṇa^mukhaṃ kṣema^mārgaṃ vijānīyād
T02divav33u:2577: artha^siddhiṃ ca nivedayati/ mārge vrajataḥ puruṣasya śivā vāmena^āgatya
T02divav33u:2578: puratā vāśati yā tathā sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijñāpayati/ nivarteta vicakṣaṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:2579: dakṣiṇāṃ diśaṃ vāmaṃ gatvā vāmataḥ parivarteta ``na tan mārgeṇa gantavyaṃ
T02divav33u:2581: purataḥ śivā gatvā agrataś ca niṣīdati sabhayaṃ mārgaṃ vijānīyāt/ nivarteta vicakṣaṇaḥ/ śivā purata āgatya vāmena parivartate bhayam etīha+a tena^api bhayaṃ jānīyād vicakṣaṇaḥ/ senāyām āvāhitāyāṃ śivā vaśati paścimaṃ nivartanaṃ nivedayati/ yadi gacchet parājayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2582: senā na gacchet/ senāyāṃ vraja^mānāyāṃ śivā āgacched agrataḥ senājayaṃ
T02divav33u:2583: nivedayati/ para^cakra^parājayaṃ ca nivedayati/ sārthasya vrajamānasya śivā gacchaty agrataḥ kṣemamārgaṃ nivedayati/ artha^siddhiṃ tathā^eva ca/
T02divav33u:2584: puruṣasya pathi vrajato vāmato vāśati mārgaṃ nivedayati/ ``tanmārgeṇa [hi}
T02divav33u:2587: pūrveṇa^uttareṇa^api śivā vāśati kṣemaṃ tatra nivedayati/ dakṣiṇe paścime yadi vāśati yā bhayaṃ tatra nivedayati/
T02divav33u:2588: u8.12ab/.vāmato na praśaṃsanti tathā^eva vidiśāsu ca/
T02divav33u:2590: u8.13ab/.adharāṃ tu bhayaṃ vakṣye triśaṅku^vacanaṃ yathā//
T02divav33u:2593: u8.15/.vyādhir upadravāś ca, ``sava tu praśamaṃ yānti triśaṅku^vacanaṃ
T02divav33u:2595: śivā^rutasya^upacāro dig^vidiśāsu nimittā grahītavyāḥ/ yaḥ śivāyā divaso bhavati sa divaso jñātavyaḥ/ puṣpa^gandha^mālya^upahāras
T02divav33u:2597: daivyāgurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ/ devyai śuśrūṣā kartavyā/ sarvārthān
T02divav33u:2600: u8.16/.yat kiñcit kāryam ārabhiṣyati tatsarvaṃ nivedayati/ devyai sarjjaraso guggulu ca dhūpayitavyaṃ/ puṣpa^baliś ca yathā^kāle
T02divav33u:2606: chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2611: u9.2cd/.tatra jātaṃ sukhataraṃ dvitīyā jñānam antare//
T02divav33u:2612: u9.3ab/.tṛtīyā sā lekhā yatra pradeśinyā pravartate/
T02divav33u:2615: u9.4cd/.dviniḥsṛto viśuddha^ātmā jīved varṣaśataṃ hi saḥ//
T02divav33u:2616: u9.5ab/.triṃśat tribhāgena jāyīyād ardhe pañcāśad āyuṣaḥ/
T02divav33u:2622: u9.8ab/.dīrghāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dīrghalekhā tu yā bhavet/
T02divav33u:2623: u9.8cd/.hrasvāyuṣaṃ vijānīyād dhrasvalekhā tu yā bhavet//
T02divav33u:2625: u9.9cd/.divā tu janma nirdiṣṭam aṅguṣṭha^yavake dhravaṃ//
T02divav33u:2626: u9.10ab/.avyakto yavako yatra tatra lagnaṃ vinirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2628: u9.11ab/.divasaṃ janma nirdiśed rātrau strī^saṃjñako bhavet/(p.173)
T02divav33u:2629: u9.11cd/.rātriḥ sandhyā samākhyātā bhāgair anyair na saṃśayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2633: u9.13ab/.yavamālā ca matsyaḥ syād aṅguṣṭha^yavako ratau/
T02divav33u:2635: u9.14ab/.yasya syād yavakaś ca^api ca^apo vā svastikas tathā/
T02divav33u:2636: u9.14cd/.taleṣu yeṣu dṛśyante dhanyās te puruṣā hy amī//
T02divav33u:2637: u9.15ab/.matsyo dhānyaṃ bhaved bhogāyāmiṣādau yave dhanaṃ/
T02divav33u:2639: u9.16ab/.patākābhir dhvajair vā^api śaktibhis tomarais tathā/
T02divav33u:2642: u9.17ab/.prekṣyante śākhyā pañca haste catvāra eva ca/
T02divav33u:2643: u9.17cd/.kṣatriyo vā bhaved bhogī rājabhiś ca^api satkṛtaḥ//
T02divav33u:2644: u9.18ab/.vaiśyo +atha kṣatriyo vāgmī dhana^dhānyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2646: u9.19ab/.satatam abhipūjyaḥ syāt sarveṣāṃ ca priyaṃvadaḥ/
T02divav33u:2647: u9.19cd/.viśīlaḥ śīlakuñco vā bahubhir na bahus tathā//
T02divav33u:2648: u9.20ab/.śyāmavarṇā +atha bhinnā vā sā lekhā duḥkhabhāginī/
T02divav33u:2649: u9.20cd/.ktilekhā yasya dṛśyante yasya pūrṇāḥ karathitāḥ/
T02divav33u:2650: u9.20ef/.mahā^bhogo mahā^vidvān jīved varṣaśataṃ ca saḥ//
T02divav33u:2652: u9.21cd/.taleṣu yasya dṛśyante taṃ vidyāt pṛthivīpatiṃ//
T02divav33u:2653: u9.22ab/.bhagas tu bhāgyāya dhvajaiḥ patākair hastyaśvamālāṅkuśataś ca
T02divav33u:2655: u9.22cd/.matsyo nu pānāya yavo dhanāya vedis tu yajñāya gavāṃ ca goṣṭhaḥ//
T02divav33u:2656: u9.23ab/.anāmikāparva atikramed yadi kaniṣṭhikā varṣaśataṃ sa jīvati/
T02divav33u:2657: u9.23cd/.sametvaśītir varṣāṇi saptabhir yathā nadīnāṃ bharitāya nirdiśed//
T02divav33u:2658: u9.24ab/.śarīravarṇa^prabhavāṃ tu lekhāṃ savaiśikhāṃ varṇa^vihīnakāṃ ca/
T02divav33u:2666: u9.26cd/.dvir api ca [sa] bhava^antare mahā^ātmā vippuladhana^śriya āha
T02divav33u:2668: u9.27ab/.dadati satatam unnatas tu pāṇir bhavati cirāya tu
T02divav33u:2674: u9.28cd/.bhavati rudhirasannibhaḥ suraktaś ciram iha piṇḍitapāṇirīśvaraḥ syāt//
T02divav33u:2676: u9.29cd/.bhavati bahu^dhano nigūḍhapāṇiś ciram iha jīvati
T02divav33u:2678: u9.30ab/.subhaga iha tathoṣṇadīrghapāṇir dhruvam iha śītalapāṇikas tu
T02divav33u:2680: u9.30cd/.iha hi bahu^dhano balena yuktaḥ sutanu susañcitapāṇirekhako yaḥ//
T02divav33u:2681: u9.31ab/.dhanam upanayatīha pāṇilekhā kṛta^janitā jalavac ca yā
T02divav33u:2684: u9.32ab/.dhanam upalabhate surakta^pāṇir vipulamatho ca nirantarāṅguliḥ
T02divav33u:2686: u9.32cd/.bali^puruṣam api tyajeddhi vittaṃ ditavivaśā ca viśīrṇavarṇa^lekhā//
T02divav33u:2687: u9.33ab/.apagataghṛta^varṇa^pāṇilekho bhavati naro dhanavān balena yuktaḥ/
T02divav33u:2690: u9.34ab/.bhavati bahu^dhano dhanair vihīnaḥ śrutam adhigamya
T02divav33u:2695: u9.36/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vāyasa^rutaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/ namo +arhatāṃ/
T02divav33u:2699: u10.1cd/.jayam parājayaṃ ca^eva lābha^alābhaṃ tathā^eva ca//
T02divav33u:2702: u10.3ab/.devāḥ pravadanti śreṣṭhā vāyasānāṃ namā namaḥ/
T02divav33u:2709: u10.6cd/.asūpaṃ nirdiśed bhojyaṃ guḍamiśraṃ tu gorasaṃ//
T02divav33u:2712: u10.8ab/.rūkṣaṃ nirgharṣate tuṇḍaṃ śiraś ca parimārjati/
T02divav33u:2713: u10.8cd/.saphalaṃ vṛkṣam āsthāya dhruvaṃ māṃsena bhojanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2715: u10.9cd/.vyādhena ca hataṃ māṃsaṃ nivedayati bhojanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2718: u10.11ab/.śuṣkavṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
T02divav33u:2719: u10.11cd/.kalahaṃ sumahat kṛtvā na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
T02divav33u:2720: u10.12ab/.kṣīravṛkṣe niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
T02divav33u:2721: u10.12cd/.krameṇa yugamātreṇa na ccārthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
T02divav33u:2725: u10.14cd/.pṛṣṭhena darśayed bhāraṃ kṣudhāpīḍāṃ ca nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2726: u10.15ab/.pakṣaṃ vidhūyamāno yaḥ paśyan pathasya vāśati/
T02divav33u:2727: u10.15cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kuryāc cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
T02divav33u:2728: u10.16ab/.rajjuṃ vā phalakaṃ vā^api yadi karṣati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2729: u10.16cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ śreyaś cauraiḥ patham upadrutaṃ//
T02divav33u:2730: u10.17ab/.gomaye śuṣkakāṣṭhe vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2731: u10.17cd/.kalahaḥ kuvaco vyādhir na ca^arthaṃ tatra sidhyati//
T02divav33u:2732: u10.18ab/.tṛṇaṃ vā yadi vā kāṣṭhaṃ darśayec ca yadā khagaḥ/(p.177)
T02divav33u:2733: u10.18cd/.purataḥ śuṣkapāṇis tu tatra caura^bhayaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2734: u10.19ab/.sārthopari niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
T02divav33u:2736: u10.20ab/.yadā pradakṣiṇaṃ trastaṃ vāśanti vividhaṃ khagāḥ/
T02divav33u:2738: u10.21ab/.bhītas trastaḥ parītaś ca yas tu vyāharate khagaḥ/
T02divav33u:2739: u10.21cd/.paribādhan diśaḥ sarvās tatra bhayam upasthitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2740: u10.22ab/.gacchantaṃ samanugacchet puraḥ sthitvā tu vyāharet/
T02divav33u:2741: u10.22cd/.na tatra gamanaṃ kkuryān mārgam atra praśātanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2742: u10.23ab/.vāstumadhye pratisthāne kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vyāharet/
T02divav33u:2743: u10.23cd/.vyādhiṃ tatra vijānīyād vāse vā gṛha^svāmināṃ//
T02divav33u:2744: u10.24ab/.śakaṭasya yathā śabdaṃ viśrabdhaṃ vāśati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2747: u10.25cd/.niṣaṇṇo vāśate kākaḥ prasiddhaṃ gamanaṃ dhruvaṃ//
T02divav33u:2748: u10.26ab/.āsane śayane vā^api sthito vāśati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2752: u10.28ab/.brahma^sthāne niṣīditvā kṣāmaṃ dīnaṃ ca vāśati/
T02divav33u:2753: u10.28cd/.sandhisthāne harec cauras tatra vai nāsti saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2758: u10.31cd/.yasya yasya haret tasya dravya^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2760: u10.32cd/.kāṣṭhaṃ vā vāyasā yatra gṛham āropayanti ca/
T02divav33u:2761: u10.32ef/.nigadanty atra vijānīyād yācakāt tu mahā^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:2762: u10.33ab/.nīlaṃ pītaṃ lohitaṃ ca pratisaṃharaṇāni ca/
T02divav33u:2763: u10.33cd/.nigṛhṇanti yatra kākā vyādhiṃ tatra vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2764: u10.34ab/.grāmante bhayam ākhyāti kāko vā vāśati dhruvaṃ/
T02divav33u:2765: u10.34cd/.pratyekato vā vāśanti vidyāt tatra mahā^bhayaṃ//
T02divav33u:2767: u10.35cd/.niṣīdan saphale vṛkṣe sa vaden māṃsa^bhojanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2768: u10.36ab/.yasya śīrṣe niṣīditvā karṇaṃ karṣati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2778: u10.41ab/.prakāre toraṇa^agre vā yadi vāśati vāyasaḥ/
T02divav33u:2779: u10.41cd/.abhīkṣṇaṃ gharṣate tuṇḍaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2780: u10.42ab/.maṇḍalāni vāvartāni bahir vā nagarasya ca/
T02divav33u:2781: u10.42cd/.vairaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ghoraṃ tatra ca^eva vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2782: u10.43ab/.grāme vā nagare vā^api kurvate yatra maṇḍalaṃ/(p.179)
T02divav33u:2784: u10.44ab/.pūrveṇa ca^eva grāmasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
T02divav33u:2786: u10.45ab/.purastād dakṣiṇe pārśve yadi sūyati vāyasī/
T02divav33u:2787: u10.45cd/.varṣati prathame māse paścād devo na varṣati/
T02divav33u:2792: u10.47cd/.madhyamaṃ ca bhaved varṣaṃ madhya^śasyaṃ ca jāyate//
T02divav33u:2794: u10.48cd/.aśanir nipatet tatra bhayaṃ ca mṛgapakṣīṇāṃ//
T02divav33u:2799: u10.51ab/.yadā tu madhye vṛkṣasya nilayaṃ karoti vāyasī/
T02divav33u:2801: u10.52ab/.skandha^mūle tu vṛkṣasya yadā sūyati vāyasī/
T02divav33u:2802: u10.52cd/.anāvṛṣṭir bhaved ghorā durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2803: u10.53ab/.caturaḥ pañca vā potān yadā sūyati vāyasī/
T02divav33u:2804: u10.53cd/.subhikṣaṃ ca bhavet tatra phalānām uditaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2806: u10.55/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvāra^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:2807: vyākhyāsyāmi tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:2809: u11.1ab/.māhendram atha divyaṃ ca māṅgalyaṃ pūrvataḥ smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:2810: u11.1cd/.dakṣiṇe tu diśo bhāge pūṣā ca pitryam eva ca//
T02divav33u:2813: u11.3cd/.atha vai dhanmitraṃ ca paramaṃ maitram eva ca//
T02divav33u:2816: u11.5ab/.samaṃ syāc caturasraṃ ca vistīrṇā ca^eva mṛttikā/
T02divav33u:2819: u11.6cd/.rakta^pāṃśur bhaved yatra rājñāṃ tat tu praśasyate//
T02divav33u:2820: u11.7ab/.trikoṇaṃ kuśasaṃstīrṇam uttānaṃ madhuraṃ ca yat/
T02divav33u:2821: u11.7cd/.vyāyām ato jalaṃ ca^eva vāstu tasya dhanauṣadhī//
T02divav33u:2823: u11.8cd/.anāvāsyaṃ ca tat proktaṃ yac ca putrakṣayāvahaṃ//
T02divav33u:2824: u11.9ab/.yat tu kañjalakakṣais tat tyaktaṃ varṣodakena ca/(p.181)
T02divav33u:2827: u11.10cd/.daśa dvādaśakaṃ vaiśye śūdrasya tatra lekhanaṃ//
T02divav33u:2832: u11.13ab/.uttarāyāṃ tu kartavyaṃ varcaḥ sthānām anuttaraṃ/
T02divav33u:2833: u11.13cd/.aiśānyām eva sarvāṇi prāsādaś ca puromukhaḥ//
T02divav33u:2838: u11.16ab/.vidviṣasya salokasya dvāre syān nu karagrahaḥ/
T02divav33u:2839: u11.16cd/.mahendre pure vā rājyaṃ sūrye sūraprabhāvatā//
T02divav33u:2842: u11.18ab/.puṣpe tu subhago nityaṃ vitathe +apy aśubho bhavet/
T02divav33u:2843: u11.18cd/.śoke bhūta^vikāraḥ syāt soṣe tasya viṣaṇṇatā//
T02divav33u:2845: u11.19cd/.hrade reṇu pariśrāva āditye tu kalir dhruvaṃ//
T02divav33u:2847: u11.20cd/.bhaved asya ca yad dvāraṃ tatra^agni^bhayam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2848: u11.21ab/.kṣayaṃ vidyāt tasya tasya dhanasya ca kulasya ca/
T02divav33u:2849: u11.21cd/.yame mṛtyuṃ vijānīyāt kule śreṣṭha^uttamasya ca/
T02divav33u:2851: u11.22ab/.bhṛṅge krodhaḥ kaliś ca^eva pitari bhoga^sampadaḥ/
T02divav33u:2854: u11.23cd/.asurare maraṇaṃ ghoraṃ roge tu bahu^doṣatā//
T02divav33u:2855: u11.24ab/.balīṃś ca upahārāṃś ca pravakṣyāṃi yathāgṛhaṃ/
T02divav33u:2856: u11.24cd/.cicitrair vidiśair gandhaiḥ praipūjya baliṃ haret//
T02divav33u:2858: u11.25cd/.mahendre mukta^puṣpāṇi pāvake ca payo dadhi//
T02divav33u:2859: u11.26ab/.āditye parideyaṃ tu bhaktaṃ ca^eva priyaṅgavaḥ/
T02divav33u:2860: u11.26cd/.antarīkṣe jalaṃ divyaṃ puṣpāṇi jalajāni ca//
T02divav33u:2861: u11.27ab/.nandā pratipādā jñeyā ṣaṣṭhī trayodaśī jayā/
T02divav33u:2862: u11.27cd/.tāsu tāsu dhruvaṃ kuryāt prājño hy evaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ//
T02divav33u:2864: u11.29/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin dvādaśa^rāśikaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:2871: u12.2cd/.dvādaśaiva tu cittās te ye loke pracaranti vai//
T02divav33u:2872: u12.3ab/.tān ahaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi śṛṇu tattvena me tataḥ/
T02divav33u:2873: u12.3cd/.dvādaśa^eva tu kuryāc ca maṇḍalāni vicakṣaṇaḥ/.
T02divav33u:2874: u12.4ab/.prathamaṃ meṣo nāma syād dvitīyaṃ tu vṛṣaḥ smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:2875: u12.4cd/.tṛtīyaṃ mithunaṃ nāma caturthaṃ ca^api karkaṭaḥ//
T02divav33u:2876: u12.5ab/.pañcamaṃ ca^api siṃhas tu ṣaṣṭhaṃ kanyā iti smṛtaṃ/
T02divav33u:2877: u12.5cd/.tulā tu saptamaṃ jñeyā vṛścikas tu tahtāṣṭamaṃ//
T02divav33u:2878: u12.6ab/.dnavī tu navamaṃ jñeyā daśamaṃ makaraḥ smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:2879: u12.6cd/.kumbhaś caikādaśaṃ jñeyo dvādaśaṃ mīna ucyate//
T02divav33u:2880: u12.7ab/.horā śarīraṃ jātasya dvitīye cintitaṃ dhanaṃ/
T02divav33u:2881: u12.7cd/.tṛtīye bhrātura ca^eva caturthe svajanas tathā//
T02divav33u:2882: u12.8ab/.cintyate pañcame putraḥ ṣaṣṭhe maṇḍale śatrutā/
T02divav33u:2883: u12.8cd/.saptame dārasaṃyogo hy aṣṭame naidhanaṃ smṛtaṃ//
T02divav33u:2884: u12.9ab/.navame cintyate dharmo daśame darmajaṃ phalaṃ/
T02divav33u:2886: u12.10ab/.ete dvādaśa^cittās tu yathā dṛṣṭā maharṣibhiḥ/
T02divav33u:2888: u12.11ab/.āgastya pṛcchate kaścit prathamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.184)
T02divav33u:2889: u12.11cd/.śiras tu spṛśate yaś ca śabdaś ca upalakṣyate//
T02divav33u:2890: u12.12ab/.vyādhitaṃ ca^eva hy ātmānam āgneyāś ca vinaṣṭayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2891: u12.12cd/.yadi brūyāt tadā tasya ātmārthaṃ cintitaṃ bhavet//
T02divav33u:2892: u12.13ab/.kāñcanaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ lauhaṃ ca^eva bhṛśaṃ havet/
T02divav33u:2893: u12.13cd/.sa ca sarva^gataś ca^eva agnir aśnāti niścitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2895: u12.14cd/.yādṛśaś ca bhavec chabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2896: u12.15ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvitīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2897: u12.15cd/.grīvāṃ vā parimārjayed galaṃ ca cibukaṃ punaḥ//
T02divav33u:2898: u12.16ab/.yadi śabdaś ca śrūyeta dṛṣṭā gāvas tathā^eva ca/
T02divav33u:2899: u12.16cd/.īdṛśaṃ ca dṛXṭvotpātaṃ gośabdaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2900: u12.16ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitam//
T02divav33u:2901: u12.17ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya tṛtīyaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2902: u12.17cd/.mārjayen mukhadeśaṃ tu strī^cittaṃ tasya nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2903: u12.18ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra śrūyantāṃ tādṛśās tu te/
T02divav33u:2904: u12.18cd/.jātaṃ prajātam upajātaṃ tathā jāto bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:2906: u12.19cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2907: u12.20ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya caturthaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2908: u12.20cd/.kacchapaṃ spṛśate yas tu kalahaṃ tatra nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2909: u12.20ef/.svajanaṃ vyavahāras tu sati kalahe na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2910: u12.21ab/.ākaṭṭā kaṭṭeti śabdā bhavanti ca nirantaraṃ/(p.185)
T02divav33u:2912: u12.22ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya pañcamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2913: u12.22cd/.hṛdayaṃ spṛśate yas tu apatyaṃ tatra cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2915: u12.23cd/.śastra^dravyaṃ ca yat tasya brāhmaṇānaṃ kule sthitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2916: u12.24ab/.atha śabdo bhavet tatra yaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu maharṣibhiḥ/
T02divav33u:2917: u12.24cd/.putraputreti yacchabdo yad gataṃ gatam eva ca/
T02divav33u:2919: u12.25ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2920: u12.25cd/.spṛśate ca^api pārśvāni gātracintā tu cintitā//
T02divav33u:2921: u12.26ab/.vigrahas tu mahā^ghoraḥ śatruś ca^api pravadhyate/
T02divav33u:2922: u12.26cd/.atha vā tatra ye śabdāḥ śrotavyās te na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2923: u12.27ab/.ayaṃ tu prakṣaraś ca^eva hataś ca vihatas tathā/
T02divav33u:2925: u12.27ef/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2926: u12.28ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatāy saptamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2927: u12.28cd/.hastena mardayed hastaṃ tathā nāḍīṃ ca mardayed//
T02divav33u:2929: u12.29cd/.tatreme bhavanti śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhūmim icchatā//
T02divav33u:2930: u12.30ab/.sthitaṃ niviṣṭaṃ vartañ ca kṛtaṃ hasta^gataṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2932: u12.30ef/.yādṛśo vā śrutaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2933: u12.31ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya aṣṭamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.186)
T02divav33u:2934: u12.31cd/.udaraṃ ca^eva phicakaṃ dve ime parimārjayet//
T02divav33u:2935: u12.32ab/.nidhanaṃ dṛśyate tasya maraṇaṃ ca^api dṛśyate/
T02divav33u:2936: u12.32cd/.yadi bhaved bhaven mṛtyur yaś ca^anya^priya^saṅgamaḥ//
T02divav33u:2937: u12.33ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā mṛta eva bhaviṣyati/
T02divav33u:2939: u12.34ab/.puruṣaḥ kaś cid āgatya navamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2940: u12.34cd/.ūruṃ ca spṛśate bhūyā dharma^cintā ca cintitā//
T02divav33u:2941: u12.35ab/.tatra śabdāś ca śrotavyā bhavanti hi na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2942: u12.35cd/.yaja hi yājakaś ca^eva yajamānas tathāiva ca/
T02divav33u:2944: u12.36ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya daśamaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/
T02divav33u:2946: u12.37ab/.spṛśate jānunī ca^eva karma^cintāṃ tu nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2947: u12.37cd/.tatra śabdā ahbvantīme śrotavyāś ca na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:2948: u12.38ab/.bhūmikarma ca kṣetraṃ ca kṣetrakarma tathāiva ca/
T02divav33u:2950: u12.39ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya ekādaśaṃ tu saṃspṛśet/
T02divav33u:2951: u12.39cd/.jaṅghe tu spṛśate bhūyo hy artha^lābhaṃ vinirdiśet//
T02divav33u:2952: u12.40ab/.tatreme śabdāḥ śrotavyā bhavantīha na saṃśayaḥ/
T02divav33u:2954: u12.41ab/.etādṛśaṃ ravaṃ śrūtvā hiraṇyaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2955: u12.41cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ phalam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2956: u12.42ab/.puruṣaḥ kaścid āgatya dvādaśaṃ maṇḍalaṃ spṛśet/(p.187)
T02divav33u:2957: u12.42cd/.pādau ca spṛśate pṛcchan cittaṃ vā^apy anarthikaṃ//
T02divav33u:2958: u12.43ab/.yas tu tac cintito hy artha^āśā āgantukā ca yā/
T02divav33u:2960: u12.44ab/.nirāśaś ca^eva ghoṣaś ca nirāśaṃ tasya nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:2961: u12.44cd/.atha vā yādṛśaḥ śabdas tādṛśaṃ tena cintitaṃ//
T02divav33u:2963: u12.46/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin kanyā^lakṣaṇaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:2967: u13.1ab/.tatvaṃ vijñāyate yena yena śubham upasthitaṃ/
T02divav33u:2968: u13.1cd/.ninditaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca strīṇāṃ vakṣyāmi lakṣaṇaṃ//
T02divav33u:2969: u13.2ab/.pitaraṃ mātaram ca^eva mātulaṃ bhrātaraṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2972: u13.3cd/.tad vijñaiḥ saha saṅgamya kanyāṃ paśyeta śāstra^vit//
T02divav33u:2973: u13.4ab/.hastau pādau nirīkṣeta nakhāni hy aṅgulīs tathā/
T02divav33u:2974: u13.4cd/.pāṇilekhāś ca jañghae ca kaṭinābhyūrum eva ca//
T02divav33u:2975: u13.5ab/.oṣṭhau jihvāṃ ca dantāṃś ca kapolau nāsikāṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:2976: u13.5cd/.akṣibhravau lalāṭaṃ ca karṇau keśāṃs tathā^eva ca//
T02divav33u:2977: u13.6ab/.romarājīṃ savaraṃ varṇaṃ mantritaṃ gatim eva ca/(p.188)
T02divav33u:2979: u13.6ef/.tatra pūrvaṃ parīkṣeta svayam eva vicakṣaṇaḥ//
T02divav33u:2982: u13.8ab/.avyāvartāś catvāro yasyāḥ sarve ca^eva pradakṣiṇāḥ/
T02divav33u:2985: u13.9cd/.dhanyān sā janayet putrāṃs teṣāṃ prītiṃ ca bhuñjate//
T02divav33u:2986: u13.10ab/.yasyāḥ pāṇitale vyaktaḥ kacchapaḥ svastiko dhavajaḥ/
T02divav33u:2988: u13.10ef/.ekaṃ sā janayet putraṃ taṃ ca rājānam ādiśet//
T02divav33u:2995: u13.14ab/.sūkṣmā ca tuṅganāsā ca muktam āraktimodarī/
T02divav33u:2996: u13.14cd/.subhrūḥ suvarakeśāntā sā tu kanyā bahu^prajā//
T02divav33u:2999: u13.16ab/.yasyāvartau samau snighdau ubhau pārśvau susaṃsthitau/
T02divav33u:3003: u13.18ab/.ūrū jaṅghe ca pārśve ca tathā vikramaḥ saṃsthitaḥ/
T02divav33u:3004: u13.18cd/.rakta^ante vipule netre sā kanyā sukhamedhate//
T02divav33u:3006: u13.19cd/.yukta^nāmā tu yā nārī rājānam upatiṣṭhite//
T02divav33u:3011: u13.22ab/.kānta^jihvā tu yā nārī rakta^uṣṭhī priya^bhāṣiṇī/
T02divav33u:3014: u13.23cd/.sahasrāṇāṃ bahūnāṃ tu svāminī sā bhaviṣyati//
T02divav33u:3017: u13.25ab/.kīrtitās tu mayā dhanyā maṅgalya^lakṣaṇāḥ striyaḥ/
T02divav33u:3019: u13.26ab/.ūrdhva^prekṣī adhaḥprekṣī yā ca tiryak ca prekṣiṇī/
T02divav33u:3026: u13.29cd/.trīṃś ca sā puruṣān hanti devaraṃ śvaśuraṃ patiṃ//
T02divav33u:3027: u13.30ab/.pārśvato roma^rājī tu vinatā ca kaṭir bhavet/
T02divav33u:3028: u13.30cd/.dīrgham āyur avāpnoti dīrgha^kālaṃ ca duḥkhitā//
T02divav33u:3029: u13.31ab/.kāka^jaṅghā ca yā nārī rakta^akṣī vardhasvarā/
T02divav33u:3030: u13.31cd/.niḥsukhā ca nirāśā ca varjitā naṣṭa^bāndhavā//
T02divav33u:3033: u13.33ab/.yā tu sarva^samācārā mṛd^vaṅgī samatāṃ gatā/
T02divav33u:3034: u13.33cd/.sarvaiḥ samair guṇair yuktā vijñeyā kāma^cāriṇī//
T02divav33u:3035: u13.34ab/.yasyā roma^cite jaṅghe mukhaṃ ca parimaṇḍalaṃ/
T02divav33u:3036: u13.34cd/.putraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā^api jāram icchati tādṛśī//
T02divav33u:3038: u13.35cd/.uttaroṣṭhe ca romāṇi sā tu bhakṣayate patiṃ//
T02divav33u:3039: u13.36ab/.yasya hastau ca pādāu ca chidrau danta^antarāṇi ca/
T02divav33u:3040: u13.36cd/.patinā^upārjitaṃ dravyaṃ na tasyā ramate gṛhe//
T02divav33u:3043: u13.38ab/.yasyāḥ kaniṣṭhikā pāde bhūmiṃ na spṛśate +aṅguliḥ/
T02divav33u:3044: u13.38cd/.kaumāraṃ sā patiṃ syaktvā ātmanaḥ kurute priyaṃ//
T02divav33u:3046: u13.39cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ bandhakītvena jīvati//
T02divav33u:3049: u13.41ab/.āvartaḥ pṛṣṭhato yasyā nābhī sā ca^anubandhati/(p.191)
T02divav33u:3050: u13.41cd/.na sā ramati kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ labhate patiṃ//
T02divav33u:3053: u13.43ab/.yasyās tu hasamānāyā gaṇḍe jāyati kūpakaṃ/
T02divav33u:3054: u13.43cd/.agnikārye +api sā gatvā kṣipraṃ doṣaṃ kariṣyati//
T02divav33u:3055: u13.44ab/.sama^asama^gatā subhrūr gaṇḍa^āvartā ca ya bhavet/
T02divav33u:3056: u13.44cd/.pralambhoṣṭhī tu yā nārī naikatra ramate ciraṃ//
T02divav33u:3058: u13.45cd/.aṣṭau bhakṣayate vīrān navame tiṣṭhate ciraṃ//
T02divav33u:3059: u13.46ab/.na devikā na nadikā na ca daivata^nāmikā/
T02divav33u:3061: u13.47ab/.nakṣatra^nāmā yā nārī yā ca gotra^sanāmikā/
T02divav33u:3062: u13.47cd/.suguptā rakṣitā vā^api manasā pāpām ācaret//
T02divav33u:3063: u13.48ab/.dārān vivarjayed etān yā mayā parikīrtitāḥ/
T02divav33u:3064: u13.48cd/.praśastā yās tu pūrvoktās tādṛśīyān naraḥ sadā//
T02divav33u:3070: u13.51/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin vastra^adhyāyaṃ vyākhāsyāmi/ tac
T02divav33u:3071: chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavān triśaṅkuḥ//
T02divav33u:3075: u14.2ab/.punarvasuś ca dhanyā syāt puṣye vai vastravān bhavet/
T02divav33u:3076: u14.2cd/.aśleṣāsu bhaven moṣaḥ śmaśānaṃ maghayā vrajet//
T02divav33u:3077: u14.3ab/.phālgunīsu bhaved vidyā uttarāsu ca vastravān/
T02divav33u:3079: u14.4ab/.svātyāṃ ca śobhanaṃ vastraṃ viśākhā priya^darśanaṃ/
T02divav33u:3082: u14.5cd/.uttarā mṛṣṭa^bhojī syāc chravaṇe cakṣuṣo rujaṃ//
T02divav33u:3086: u14.7cd/.bharaṇī ca bhaya^ākīrṇā caura^gamyā ca sā bhavet//
T02divav33u:3088: u14.8/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin luṅgādhyāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi/ tac
T02divav33u:3091: u15.1ab/.kutra^utpannā ime bījāḥ (?) śasyānāṃ ca yavādayaḥ/
T02divav33u:3092: u15.1cd/.yair idaṃ dhriyate viśvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sthāvara^jaṅgamaṃ//
T02divav33u:3093: u15.2ab/.vāpayet tu kathaṃ bījaṃ lāṅgalaṃ yojayet kathaṃ/
T02divav33u:3095: u15.3ab/.śāradaṃ vā^atha graiṣmaṃ tu kasmin māse tu vāpayet/
T02divav33u:3096: u15.3cd/.nimittaṃ kati śasyante kāni vā parivarjayet/
T02divav33u:3097: u15.3ef/.kasya vā dāpayed dhūpaṃ kena mantreṇa dāpayet//
T02divav33u:3099: u15.4cd/.tadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dahati citra^mukhy api//
T02divav33u:3100: u15.5ab/.darbha^sūcī^mukhī vā^api kāraṇaṃ tatra ko bhavet/
T02divav33u:3101: u15.5cd/.kati saubhikṣikā luṅgaḥ kati daurbhikṣikāḥ smṛtāḥ/
T02divav33u:3102: u15.5ef/.kati varṇāḥ samākhyātāḥ kati varṇā nidarśitāḥ//
T02divav33u:3104: u15.6cd/.nirghāto vā bhavet tīvro +athavā^api medinī calet//
T02divav33u:3105: u15.7ab/.śasyaṃ phalasya kiṃ tatra nimittam upalakṣayet/
T02divav33u:3106: u15.7cd/.sarvam etat samāsena śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ//
T02divav33u:3110: u15.9cd/.sāgarād amṛtaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ manthite tu samudbhavaṃ//
T02divav33u:3111: u15.10ab/.amṛte bhakṣyamāṇe tu bhāgaṃ prārthitavān dvijaḥ/(p.194)
T02divav33u:3112: u15.10cd/.tato dattāḥ surair bhāgā amṛtād daśavindavaḥ//
T02divav33u:3113: u15.11ab/.tata utpannā ime bījā bhuvi loka^sukha^āvahāḥ/
T02divav33u:3115: u15.12ab/.śyāmakaṃ saptamaṃ vidyād ikṣuś ca^aṣṭamakaḥ smṛtaḥ/
T02divav33u:3116: u15.12cd/.śeṣās tu saṅgatā jātā bahavaḥ śasya^jātayaḥ//
T02divav33u:3119: u15.13ef/.mūleṣu ca^eva sarveṣu vindur ekaḥ prapātitaḥ//
T02divav33u:3122: u15.15ab/.kārttike mārgaśīrṣe vā grīāma dhānyāni vāpayet/
T02divav33u:3124: u15.16ab/.trayodaśyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ tathā hi navamīṣu ca/
T02divav33u:3125: u15.16cd/.viśeṣatas tu nimneṣu sarva^bījāni hy utsṛjet//
T02divav33u:3131: u15.19ab/.grāma^kṣetre ca yad bījaṃ gṛhe ca gṛha^devatā/
T02divav33u:3133: u15.20ab/.brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ kanyām arciṣmantaṃ ca pāvakaṃ/(p.195)
T02divav33u:3134: u15.20cd/.vāraṇa^indraṃ vṛṣaṃ ca^eva hayaṃ vā svabhyalaṃkṛtaṃ//
T02divav33u:3135: u15.21ab/.pūrṇa^kumbhaṃ dhvajaṃ chatram āmāmāṃsaṃ surāṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:3136: u15.21cd/.uddhṛtāṃ dhāraṇīṃ ca^eva baddham eka^paśuṃ dadhi//
T02divav33u:3137: u15.22ab/.cakra^ārūḍhaṃ ca śakaṭaṃ kāka^ārūḍhāṃ ca sūkarīṃ/
T02divav33u:3139: u15.23ab/.sarve dakṣiṇato dhanyāḥ puraś ca mṛga^pakṣiṇaḥ/
T02divav33u:3141: u15.24ab/.ajo vā vāmataḥ śasyo jambukaś ca praśasyate/
T02divav33u:3142: u15.24cd/.vikṛtaṃ kubja^kuṣṭhiṃ ca mukhaṃ śmaśrudharaṃ tathā//
T02divav33u:3145: u15.25ef/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
T02divav33u:3146: u15.26ab/.tilasya bahu(?) pūrṇasya bhāṇḍe syād vapanam tathā/
T02divav33u:3147: u15.26cd/.śrūtvā hy etāni vrajatāṃ sasya^sampattim ādiśet//
T02divav33u:3148: u15.27ab/.rāśisthaṃ grathitaṃ dhautaṃ svasthamaṃ kuritaṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:3149: u15.27cd/.śrūtvā saṃmārjitaṃ ca^eva ity āśukṛtinaṃ viduḥ//
T02divav33u:3150: u15.28ab/.śrūtvā mlānaṃ ca śuṣkaṃ ca manda^vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:3151: u15.28cd/.śrūtvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ praveśayet//
T02divav33u:3152: u15.29ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ varṣate yadi vāsavaḥ/
T02divav33u:3153: u15.29cd/.svayam eva tu tac chasyaṃ kāmaṃ kālena bhujyate//
T02divav33u:3154: u15.30ab/.nīyamānaṃ ca yad bījaṃ kampate yadi medinī/
T02divav33u:3155: u15.30cd/.bhramyate karṣakaḥ sthānān na tac chakyaṃ tu vāpituṃ//
T02divav33u:3159: u15.32cd/.dṛṣṭvā nivartayed bījaṃ punar grāmaṃ niveśayet//
T02divav33u:3161: u15.33cd/.kṛtvā suvipulāṃ vedīṃ darbhān āstīrya sarvataḥ/
T02divav33u:3163: u15.34cd/.veda^śāntiṃ japet pūrvaṃ śasyāśāntim ataḥ praṃ/
T02divav33u:3164: u15.35ab/.jayet pārāśaraṃ pūrvaṃ priyataṃ vācayed dvijaiḥ/
T02divav33u:3165: u15.35cd/.prathamaṃ prāṅmukhaṃ bījaṃ prakṣiped uttare +atha vā//
T02divav33u:3166: u15.36ab/.pipīlikā yadā kṣetre bījaṃ kurvanti saṅcayaṃ/
T02divav33u:3167: u15.36cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā/
T02divav33u:3168: u15.37ab/.haranti cet tṛṇād bījaṃ tṛṇe śasya^apahā api/
T02divav33u:3169: u15.37cd/.prasparaṃ ca hiṃsanti dhānyaṃ ca nidhanaṃ vrajet//
T02divav33u:3171: u15.38cd/.dṛṣṭvā tu sañcayaṃ nimne +anāvṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:3172: u15.39ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījaṃ sapta^rātreṇa jāyate/
T02divav33u:3173: u15.39cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^śasyeṣu sampadā//
T02divav33u:3174: u15.40ab/.yadā tu proṣitaṃ bījam ardha^māsena jāyate/
T02divav33u:3175: u15.40cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra jāyate//
T02divav33u:3176: u15.41ab/.tri^rātrāc catūrātrād vā yadi luṅgaḥ prajāyate/
T02divav33u:3178: u15.42ab/.luṅgasya tu ye pādāḥ pañca sapta navā tathā/
T02divav33u:3179: u15.42cd/.suvṛṣṭiṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca sarva^sasyeṣu sampadā//
T02divav33u:3180: u15.43ab/.syāl luṅgasya tu ye pādāś catvāroṣṭapadā^atha vā/(p.197)
T02divav33u:3181: u15.43cd/.alpaṃ niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:3182: u15.44ab/.luṅgasya yadi pādās tu dṛśyante dvādaśa kvacit/
T02divav33u:3183: u15.44cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ drubhikṣaṃ kvacid ādiśet/
T02divav33u:3185: u15.45ab/.yadā pūrva^mūkhī luṅgā kṣemaṃ vṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:3186: u15.45cd/.yadā paścān mukhī luṅgā ativṛṣṭiṃ ca nirdeśet//
T02divav33u:3190: u15.47cd/.kvacin niṣpadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ tatra nirdiśet//
T02divav33u:3191: u15.48ab/.yadā nāga^mukhī luṅgā dṛśyate yatra vā kavcit/
T02divav33u:3192: u15.48cd/.kvacin niśyadyate śasyaṃ durbhikṣaṃ ca^atra nirdiśet/
T02divav33u:3193: u15.48ef/.tatra^aśani^bhayaṃ ca^api bhayaṃ meghān na saṃśayaḥ//
T02divav33u:3196: u15.50ab/.nākṛṣer dharmam āpnoti nākṛṣeḥ sukham āpnuyāt/
T02divav33u:3197: u15.50cd/.dharmam arthaṃ tathā kāmaṃ sarvaṃ prāpnoti karṣakaḥ//
T02divav33u:3199: u15.52ab/.punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^adhipatim etad
T02divav33u:3201: u15.53ab/.kathaṃ pṛthivyāṃ nāgāś ca kena vā vinivāritāḥ/(p.198)
T02divav33u:3203: u15.54ab/.kutaś ca^abhrāṇi jāyante nānā^varṇā diśo daśa/
T02divav33u:3204: u15.54cd/.kasya^eṣa mahataḥ śabdaḥ śrūyate dundubhis varaḥ//
T02divav33u:3205: u15.55ab/.ko hi sṛjati durbhikṣaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca^eva prāṇināṃ/
T02divav33u:3206: u15.55cd/.kas tatra sa muni^śreṣṭho nāma gotraṃ bravīhi me//
T02divav33u:3207: u15.56ab/.daivatāni ca me brūhi vidhānāni svayambhuvaḥ/
T02divav33u:3208: u15.56cd/.yajñaṃ ca yajña^bhāgaṃ ca hotavyaś ca yathā baliḥ//
T02divav33u:3209: u15.57ab/.pṛthivyāṃ daivataṃ brūhi āśrame daivataṃ brūhi/
T02divav33u:3210: u15.57cd/.deve tu daivataṃ brūhi kena devo sā kalpitā//
T02divav33u:3212: u15.58cd/.karake daivataṃ brūhi tathā sthālyāṃ ca daivataṃ//
T02divav33u:3214: u15.59cd/.vāyu^skandhaiś ca katibhiḥ śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
T02divav33u:3215: u15.60ab/.atha triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad
T02divav33u:3217: u15.61ab/.pṛthivī vā vāyur ākāśam apo jyotiś ca pañcamaṃ/
T02divav33u:3218: u15.61cd/.tatra saṃvartate piṇḍaṃ tato meghaḥ pravartate//
T02divav33u:3219: u15.62ab/.eṣa vyāpnoti ca^ākāśaṃ vāyunā janyate ghanaḥ/
T02divav33u:3222: u15.63cd/.vāyur nabho garjayate agnir vidyotate diśaḥ//
T02divav33u:3223: u15.64ab/.marutā kṣipyate piṇḍaṃ sannipātaś ca garjate/(p.199)
T02divav33u:3224: u15.64cd/.virodhanaṃ tu vāyoś ca agnaś ca anilasya ca//
T02divav33u:3225: u15.65ab/.ākāśe vartate piṇḍaṃ paścāt patati medinīṃ/
T02divav33u:3229: u15.66cd/.yatra satyaṃ ca dharmaś ca havirmeghaś ca vartate//
T02divav33u:3232: u15.67ef/.dantāśanī tṛtīyā tu aśanis tu caturthikā//
T02divav33u:3233: u15.68ab/.pañcamī krimayaḥ proktāḥ ṣaṣṭhī tu śalabhās tathā/
T02divav33u:3235: u15.69/.navamī sambaraḥ proktā ity āha bhagavāms triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:3236: u15.70ab/.etāstv aśanyo vyākhyātās tāsāṃ vai devatāḥ śṛṇu/
T02divav33u:3238: u15.71ab/.dantāśanī tu sainyānāṃ grahā vātāśanī smṛtā/
T02divav33u:3242: u15.73ab/.[samba]rasya tu parjanyam ākhyātāḥ nava devatāḥ/
T02divav33u:3245: u15.74cd/.varuṇaṃ paścime vidyād uttare dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ/(p.200)
T02divav33u:3246: u15.74ef/..... tyā daivataṃ viZṇur āśramaṃ viśva^daivataṃ//
T02divav33u:3253: u15.77ef/.vāyu^skandhaiś caturbhis tu śukro vegaṃ pramuñcati//
T02divav33u:3256: u15.79ab/.aty āha bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/ punar api puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇas triśaṅkum evam āha/
T02divav33u:3257: u15.80ab/.kim artham āśrame nityaṃ hūyate havya^vāhanaḥ/
T02divav33u:3261: u15.81ef/.praśamec ca samāsena tad bhava^arthaṃ tu ..... //
T02divav33u:3262: u15.82/.evam ukte triśaṅkur mātaṅga^adhipatir brāhmaṇaṃ puṣkarasāriṇam etad avocat/
T02divav33u:3267: u16.2cd/.tatra dagdhā anekā hi nāgāḥ koṭī^sahasraśaḥ//
T02divav33u:3271: u16.4cd/.tadā^prabhṛti bhūtānāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vai trāsitaṃ manaḥ//
T02divav33u:3272: u16.5ab/.agninā tāpitāḥ kecid vāṇair anye ca sūditāḥ/
T02divav33u:3276: u16.7ab/.sahāmpatis tu nāmnā sa śasya^kāle tadāśrame/
T02divav33u:3279: u16.8cd/.dig^bhāgeṣu ca bhūtānāṃ teṣām arthaṃ dine dine//
T02divav33u:3282: u16.10ab/.sadhūmlaṃ jvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānaṃ tu pāvakaṃ/
T02divav33u:3287: u16.13/.atha khalu bhoḥ puṣkarasārin tithi^karma^nirdeśaṃ nāma^adhyāyaṃ
T02divav33u:3288: vyākhyāsyāmi/ tac chrūyatāṃ/ atha kiṃ/ kathayatu bhagavāṃs triśaṅkuḥ/
T02divav33u:3299: u17.6ab/.bhadrā ca saptamī khyātā śreṣṭhā sā saukṛte +adhvani/
T02divav33u:3300: u17.6cd/.nṛpāṇāṃ śāsane chatre śayyānāṃ karaṇeṣu ca//
T02divav33u:3303: u17.8ab/.agrasenā tu navamī tasyāṃ kuryād ripu^kṣayaṃ/
T02divav33u:3308: u17.10cd/.kārayen nagaraṃ guptaṃ vivāhaṃ śāstra^karma ca//
T02divav33u:3309: u17.11ab/.yaśeti dvādaśīmm āhur vaire +adhvani ca garhitā/
T02divav33u:3310: u17.11cd/.vivāhe ca girau kṣetre gṛha^kramasu pūjitā//
T02divav33u:3311: u17.12ab/.jayā trayodaśī sādhvī maṇḍaleṣu ca yoṣitāṃ/(p.203)
T02divav33u:3313: u17.13ab/.ugrā caturdaśī tu syāt kārayed abhicārakaṃ/
T02divav33u:3314: u17.13cd/.vadha^bandha^prayogāṃś ca pūrvaṃ ca prahared api//
T02divav33u:3317: u17.15ab/.nanda^ādīnāṃ kriyā pūrve ṣaṣṭhy^ādīnāṃ tu madhyame/
T02divav33u:3323: u17.18/.syāt te brāhmaṇa kākṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūt/ na hy evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/ aham eva sa
T02divav33u:3324: tena kālena tena samayena brahmā devānāṃ pravaro +abhūvaṃ/ so +ahaṃ tataś cyutaḥ samāna indraḥ kauśiko +abhūvaṃ/ tataś cyutaḥ samāno +araṇemir
T02divav33u:3325: gautamo +abhūvaṃ/ tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śvetaketur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/
T02divav33u:3326: tataś cyutaḥ samānaḥ śuka^paṇḍito +abhūvaṃ/ mayā te tadā brāhmaṇa catvāro vedā vibhaktāḥ/
T02divav33u:3327: u17.19/.(p.204)tad yathā puṣyo bahavṛcānāṃ paṃktiś chandogānāṃ/
T02divav33u:3328: eka^viṃśati^caraṇā adhvaryavaḥ/ kratur artha^vaṇikānāṃ/ syāt tava brāhmaṇa
T02divav33u:3329: kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūt/ na hy evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/ aham eva sa tena kālena tena
T02divav33u:3330: samayena vasur nāma maharṣir abhūvaṃ/ mayā sā takṣakavadhūkāyāḥ kapilā nāma māṇivikā
T02divav33u:3331: duhitā +asāditā bhāryā^arthāya/ so +ahaṃ tatra saṃrakta^citta ṛddhyā bhraṣṭo dhyānebhyo vañcitaḥ parihīnaḥ/ so +aham ātmānaṃ jugupsamānas tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthāṃ babhāṣe/ oṃ bhubhuvaḥ svaḥ/ tatsavitur vareṇyaṃ bhargā devasya dhīmahi/ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt/
T02divav33u:3332: u17.20/.so +ahaṃ brāhmaṇa tvāṃ bravīmi sāmānya^saṃjñā mātrakam idaṃ lokasya brāhmaṇa iti vā kṣatriya iti vā vaiśya iti vā śūdra iti vā/ ekam
T02divav33u:3333: eva^idaṃ sarvaṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ/ putrāya me śārdūlakarṇāya prakṛtiṃ duhitaram anuprayaccha bhāryā^arthāya/ yāvatakaṃ kula^śulkaṃ manyase tāvatakam anupradāsyāmi/ idaṃ ca vacanaṃ punaḥ śrūtvā triśaṅkor
T02divav33u:3336: u17.21ab/.bhagavān śrotriyaḥ śreṣṭhas tvatto bhūyān na vidyate/
T02divav33u:3338: u17.22ab/.putrāya te bhoḥ prakṛtiṃ dadāmi (p.205) śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair
T02divav33u:3340: u17.22cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtis tu bhadrā ubhau rametāṃ rucitaṃ
T02divav33u:3342: u17.23/.tatra tāni pañca^mātrāṇi māṇavaka^śatāni uccaiḥ śabdāni procur
T02divav33u:3343: mahā^śabdāni/ mā tvaṃ bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ rocaya/ na^arhasi bho upādhyāya vidyamāneṣu brāhmaṇeṣu cāṇḍālena sārdhaṃ sambandhaṃ kartum/
T02divav33u:3344: u17.24/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ nidānaṃ nidāya śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya nipatya ślokena^etān arthān abhāṣata/
T02divav33u:3345: u17.25ab/.evam etad yathā hy eṣa triśaṅkur bhāṣate giraṃ/
T02divav33u:3346: u17.25cd/.tatvaṃ hy avitathaṃ bhūtaṃ satyam nityaṃ tathā dhruvaṃ//
T02divav33u:3347: u17.26/.atha brāhmaṇaḥ puṣkarasārī teṣāṃ māṇavakānāṃ taṃ mahāntaṃ śabdaṃ saṃsthāpya (p.206) triśaṅkuṃ mātaṅga^rājam idam avocat/ ayaṃ bhos triśaṅko
T02divav33u:3348: brahmaṇā sahāpatinā cāturmahā^bhautiko mahā^puruṣaḥ prajñaptaḥ/ yasya/
T02divav33u:3349: u17.27ab/.śiraḥ satāraṃ gaganam ākāśam udaraṃ tathā/
T02divav33u:3350: u17.27cd/.parvatāś ca^apy ubhāv ūrū pādau ca dharaṇī^talaṃ//
T02divav33u:3352: u17.28cd/.sāgarāś ca^apy amedhyaṃ vai nadyo sūtra^sravo +asya tu//
T02divav33u:3353: u17.29ab/.aśrūṇi varṣaṇaṃ cārasya eṣa brahmā sahāpatiḥ/
T02divav33u:3354: u17.29cd/.bhavāṃs tu parama^jño +asi tan me brūhi yathā tathā//
T02divav33u:3355: u17.30/.iha bhos triśaṅko kim āha svalakṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratyavekṣasva/
T02divav33u:3356: pitrā ca mātrā ca kṛtāni karmāṇi bhavanti/ aśvastanā stena vañcitāḥ/
T02divav33u:3357: u17.31ab/.gacchanti sattvā bahu^garbha^yoniṃ na ca^eva kaścin manujo hy
T02divav33u:3359: u17.31cd/.samasta jātau pracaranti sattvā na mārutāj jāyate kaścid eva//
T02divav33u:3362: u17.32cd/.sarvatra kāṇāḥ kuṇinaś ca khañjāḥ kuṣṭhī kilāsī hy apasmāriṇo 'pi//
T02divav33u:3363: u17.33ab/.kṛṣṇāś ca gaurāś ca tathā^eva śyāmāḥ sattvāḥ prajā hy anyatame viśiṣṭāḥ/(p.207)
T02divav33u:3366: u17.33ef/.na ca^indriyāṇāṃ praviviktir asti tasmān na varṇāś caturo
T02divav33u:3368: u17.34ab/.mantrair hi yadi labhyeta svargaṃ tu gamanaṃ dvijaḥ/
T02divav33u:3370: u17.34ef/.yasmāt kṛṣṇāni śuklāni karmāṇi saphalāni hi/
T02divav33u:3372: u17.35/.mānavaka^śateṣu sa tatra vinihato mahā^yaśasā triśaṅkunā puṣkarasārī brāhmaṇo +abravīt/ brāhmaṇo +asau mātaṅga^rājo hi triśaṅkur nāma/ bhavān hi brahmā indraś ca kauśikaḥ/ tvam araṇemiś ca gautamaḥ/ tvaṃ śvetaketuś ca śuka^paṇḍitaḥ/ vedaḥ samākhyātas tvayā caturdhā/ bhagavān
T02divav33u:3374: u17.36ab/.jñānena hi tvaṃ parameṇa yuktaḥ svaṣu śāstreṣu bhavān kṛtārthaḥ/
T02divav33u:3375: u17.36cd/.śreṣṭho viśiṣṭo paramo +asi loke bhavān hi vidyā^caraṇena
T02divav33u:3377: u17.37ab/.dadāmi te +ahaṃ prakṛtiṃ mamāmalāṃ śīlena rūpeṇa guṇair upetaḥ/
T02divav33u:3378: u17.37cd/.śārdūlakarṇaḥ prakṛtiś ca bhadrā ubhau rametaṃ rucitaṃ
T02divav33u:3380: u17.38ab/.pragṛhya bhṛṅgāram udaka^prapūrṇam āvarjito brāhmaṇo hṛṣṭa^cittaḥ/(p.208)
T02divav33u:3381: u17.38cd/.anupradāsīd udakena kanyakāṃ śārdūlakarṇasya iyam astu bhāryā//
T02divav33u:3383: u17.40ab/.kṛtvā niveśaṃ sa tadātmajasya gatvā^āśrame +asau nagaraṃ
T02divav33u:3385: u17.40cd/.dharmeṇa vai kārayati svarājyaṃ kṣemaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca
T02divav33u:3387: u17.41/.syād bhikṣavo yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā/ anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena triśaṅkur nāma mātaṅga^rājo +abhūvaṃ/ syād evaṃ ca bhikṣavo yusmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro +abhūt/ naiva draṣṭavyaṃ/ eṣa sa ānando bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śārdūlakarṇā nāma mātaṅga^rāja^kumāro
T02divav33u:3388: +abhūt/ syād evaṃ yuṣmākam anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/ naiva draṣṭavyaṃ/ eṣa śāradvatīputro bhikṣuḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasārī nāma brāhmaṇo +abhūt/ na^anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā duhitā^abhūt/ na^evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ/ eṣā sā prakṛtir bhikṣuṇī tena kālena
T02divav33u:3389: tena samayena puṣkarasāriṇo brāhmaṇasya prakṛtir nāma māṇavikā
T02divav33u:3390: duhitā^abhūt/ sā etarhi (p.209) tena^eva snehena tena^eva premṇā +anandaṃ
T02divav33u:3391: bhikṣuṃ gacchantam anugacchati tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati/ yad yad eva kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviśati tatra tatra^eva dvāre tūṣṇīṃ bhūtā +asthāt/
T02divav33u:3392: u17.42/.atha khalu bhagavān etasmin nidāne etasmin prakaraṇe tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthām abhāṣata/
T02divav33u:3394: u17.43cd/.etena jāyate prema candrasya kumude yathā//
T02divav33u:3396: abhisamayāya, adhimātraṃ vīryaṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ śabdāpayāmi/ utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena apramādato yogaḥ caraṇīyaḥ/
T02divav33u:3397: drutam eṣāṃ caturṇā duḥkhasya^ārya^satyasya duḥkha^samudayanya nirodhasya
T02divav33u:3398: nirodha^gāminyāḥ pratipada ārya^satyasya amīṣāṃ caturṇām ārya^satyānām
T02divav33u:3399: anabhisamitānām abhisamayāya^adhimātraṃ tīvra^cchando vīryaṃ vyāyāma utsāha unnatir aprativāṇiḥ smṛtyā saṃprajanyena^apramādato yogaḥ
T02divav33u:3401: u17.45/.(p.210) asmiṃś ca khalu punar dharma^paryāye bhāṣyamāṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭi^mātrāṇām anupādāyāsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni/ saṃbahulānāṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ brahmaṇāṃ gṛhapatīnaṃ ca virajaskaṃ vigata^malaṃ dharma^cakṣur
T02divav33u:3403: u17.46/.idam avocad bhagavān/ ātta^manasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam
